Details: IT Pros can manage Active Directory or hybrid Azure Active Directory joined Windows 10 Enterprise multi-session Windows Virtual Desktop VMs with Microsoft Endpoint Manager (MEM).

Description: Microsoft Lists: iOS Intune support (MAM CA)
Details: Microsoft is currently working on getting the Lists app for iOS into the Intune console, for Mobile App Management (MAM) policies. Learn more how to enable Intune app protection policies (APP) with Microsoft Lists; : https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/intune-customer-success/support-tip-how-to-enable-intune-app-protection-policies-app/ba-p/2100061.
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Germany, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: Microsoft Teams: Scheduled access reviews for Guest users
Details: Scheduled access reviews for guests will streamline the experience of managing Guest users. The system will automatically schedule periodic guest access reviews across Teams, delivering better identity security hygiene. Scheduled access reviews will be turned on by default.

Description: Outlook on the Web: New calendar board view
Details: With Outlook Calendar board view people can organize and manage their time, beyond the hour to hour time slots in a redesigned free-flow view of the things that are important.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Operator Connect (Public Preview)
Details: Operator Connect is a new way for customers to simply and quickly enable PSTN calling for Teams, using services from non-Microsoft telephony operators. Administrators can select their desired operator in the Teams Admin Center, and provision phone numbers to their users in just hours, with no required hardware.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Teams Connect
Details: With Microsoft Teams Connect we are making it easier to collaborate with anyone outside your organization. You can use Team’s full suite of collaboration capabilities with external partners in other Azure AD orgs the same way you use them with colleagues from your organization.  Shared channels enables people from different orgs to work together as one team in a shared space for a more structured, deeper and longer-term collaboration.
Tags - Platform: Android, Mac, Education, iOS, Linux, Desktop, Mobile

Description: Microsoft Teams: App customization and branding
Details: Now you  can customize app properties like app name, description, icons, and more to deliver a branded app experience right within Teams.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Anonymous user usage reports
Details: While all Teams reports can only be viewed by approved roles, an extra layer of data privacy will be added. Teams admins will have the option to anonymize user data, protecting user privacy while viewing, downloading, sharing, and accessing the Teams usage report data. Once enabled, personally identifiable information like username, email addresses, and Active Directory IDs will be anonymized.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Teams Connect in Teams Admin Center
Details: With Microsoft Teams Connect we are making it easier to collaborate with anyone outside your organization. Admins can manage the Shared channel lifecycle and membership from the Teams admin center.  They can also use a Teams policy to decide who can create shared channels and who can invite external users to a shared channel.

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: New predictive coding module in Advanced eDiscovery
Details: To help cull and reduce data, right where Microsoft 365 data is created, shared, and stored, legal practitioners can use our new predictive coding module without moving data outside the Microsoft 365 security and compliance boundary. As part of this preview release, legal practitioners can organize content for review faster by going through training rounds of relevant and non-relevant content to iteratively train and tune the model performance by starting with as little as 50 items. This is an improvement from traditional models that require customers to train upwards of 10 times more documents to get started and see the output of the model.

Description: Microsoft Viva: Support for types of topics
Details: Support for categories or types of topics, such as projects, products or organizations.

Description: Microsoft Viva: Improvements for Topic Management
Details: This update will empower Knowledge Managers, providing additional metadata for sorting and filtering through the list of topics, including additional quality and usage columns, and segmentation to help manage topics at scale.

Description: Microsoft Viva: Resolve topic name similarities
Details: Allows users to select a topic among several when they share similar or matching names (disambiguation).

Description: Microsoft Viva: Topics available in GCC
Details: Availability for Viva Topics in GCC.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Get Template Graph API
Details: Get team templates list and team template details via Graph API.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Manage meeting options for DoD
Details: Organizers will now be able to modify the user experience, or customize the safety and security settings for their meetings using the new “Meeting Options” feature.

Description: Microsoft Viva: Topics in Microsoft Search in Bing
Details: Display topic cards in search results when Microsoft Search is invoked from a Bing search.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Task publishing editing
Details: Task publishing enables corporate teams to create and publish tasks to, for example, all frontline locations and other configurable attributes of a distributed workforce. Corporate teams can now edit published tasks without having to recall the entire task list.

Description: SharePoint and Microsoft Teams: Rich previews for pages and news articles
Details: When users paste links to SharePoint news posts and modern pages in Teams chat/channels, those links will convert into rich cards displaying the page title, image, author and published date.

Description: Outlook for Android:  Start a Chat in Teams with email recipients
Details: When reading an email, have the option to start a Chat in Teams with the people in your organization who are included in the address of an email or conversation.  You can see their presence status to inform you if it's a good time to chat online.

Description: Outlook for iOS:  Start a Chat in Teams with email recipients
Details: When reading an email, have the option to start a Chat in Teams with the people in your organization who are included in the address of an email or conversation.  You can see their presence status to inform you if it's a good time to chat online.

Description: Outlook for Windows:  Editor
Details: Based on Microsoft intelligent technology, Editor in Outlook will help with checking your spelling, identify optional grammar corrections and provide writing style suggestions while composing or replying to emails.
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: Yammer: Nested Replies in Yammer
Details: Yammer conversations will soon have nested replies. This threading makes it easier for users to read and engage with conversations that have many comments by organizing replies together in a way that maintains context. This feature also includes improvements to: deleting comments, allowing users to deep link to specific replies, and improved community feed ordering.
Tags - Platform: Android, Mac, iOS, Web, Desktop, Mobile

Description: SharePoint: SharePoint News Boost
Details: Show important news and announcements at top of news feeds across Microsoft 365. You can prioritize visibility of a news article for a set time that you manage.

Description: Outlook for iOS: Support .ICS calendar attachments
Details: Support for .ICS file attachments that enable you to add events received in email to your Outlook Calendar.

Description: Outlook: Share photos through Outlook for Android
Details: Choose how you'd like to share photos through Outlook for Android.    Outlook makes it easier to send one or many photos from your gallery or cloud sources: as an attachment or embedded in your message.

Description: SharePoint Syntex: Content type synchronization enhancements
Details: Changes to the way content type publishing works in SharePoint, moving from a “push everywhere” model to a “pull as needed” model to help improve reliability and performance of the service.
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Germany, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: Office App: Office App for Desktop Improvements
Details: The new version of the Office App for Windows has improved performance, reliability, and includes the ability to open multiple instances of the app. This update is specifically for the Office app on Windows and does not impact individual applications within the Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, etc.). This update contains an update to the app header, and users can now open more than one app window at a time. Performance updates include efficiency improvements, like faster app loading time. This update should not impact the end user experience.

Description: SharePoint: Audience Targeting capability for Events Web Part
Details: We are adding the ability to target specific audiences per event within the Events Web Part. With it, you target specific events to different audiences, helping you provide more personalized experiences on SharePoint pages.
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Germany, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: Microsoft Teams: Attachments to approvals
Details: Attach files to approvals directly from OneDrive and SharePoint, or attach a generic link to content hosted outside of Microsoft 365. Approval is connected to the latest version of the file.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Markdown support in approvals
Details: For approvals, use Markdown formatting in adaptive cards and the details view, to ensure all approvals are formatted correctly.

Description: SharePoint: Portal launch scheduler UX
Details: The Portal Launch Scheduler is designed to help you follow a wave / phased roll-out approach by managing the redirects for the new portal. During each of the waves, you can gather user feedback and monitor performance during each wave of deployment. This has the advantage of slowly introducing the portal, giving you the option to pause and resolve issues before proceeding with the next wave, and ultimately ensuring a positive experience for your users.

Description: Outlook: Introducing suggested replies in Outlook for Windows
Details: When you receive a message in email that can be answered with a short response, Outlook may suggest three responses that you can use to reply with a couple of clicks. This capability already exists in Outlook on the web, and in Outlook iOS and Android.

Description: Microsoft Information Protection: Mandatory labeling in Office apps for gov clouds
Details: Office apps (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook) will now respect the Admin policy setting to require users to apply a label to documents and emails on Windows, Mac, iOS, and Android (for the Office 365 subscription version of the apps).

Description: Microsoft Information Protection: Migrate legacy exchange DLP policies to the Microsoft 365 compliance center
Details: The Exchange DLP migration wizard will enable you to seamlessly migrate the exchange DLP policies managed in the exchange admin center to the compliance center. Microsoft 365 compliance center provides access to advanced classification capabilities like EDM, ML etc. along with rich alerts, incident management features and more.

Description: SharePoint: Events web part will display event images
Details: Page authors in SharePoint who use the Events web part will be able to turn on an option to show event images within the web part. When the option is on, each Event shown in the web part will display the image used in the title area of the Event page. Existing Event web parts will not be updated to display event images; however new web parts added to pages and news will default to show images.
Tags - Release phase: General Availability, Targeted Release (Entire Organization), Targeted Release (Select People)
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Germany, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: SharePoint: Scoping Control for SharePoint Online
Details: Scoping control is available for SP page, site, list and library, for users to search faster with specified scope.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Customized Website Tab Apps in Team Templates
Details: This feature enables Admins to add customized website tab apps in custom team templates.

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Microsoft Information Protection & Governance now supports 7 languages for the Threat, Targeted Harassment and Profanities classifiers
Details: Trainable classifiers in Information Protection & Governance can now detect threat, targeted harassment, and profanities in the following languages: English, French, Spanish, German, Portuguese, Italian, Japanese, and Chinese.

Description: SharePoint Syntex: Form processing - support for custom Power Platform environments
Details: When using Form Processing model, you'll be able to specify that AI Builder and Dataverse storage can be hosted in custom Power Platform environments.  Previously, this was limited to the default tenant environments.

Description: SharePoint: Microsoft Lists: Visualize with Power BI
Details: Visualize your list in Power BI. This is a new view and author experience that auto-generates an initial report for you based on the information in your list. You can specify fields to create from, or update the visuals shown in the report. If you want more advanced report authoring capabilities, you can move into Edit mode and further refine. To create a report from a list, click the Integrate menu, choose Power BI and then you will see "Visualize the list".
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Germany, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: New Advanced eDiscovery solution for DoD
Details: The Advanced eDiscovery solution in Microsoft 365 builds on the existing eDiscovery and analytics capabilities in Office 365. This new solution, called Advanced eDiscovery, provides a workflow to identify, preserve, collect, review, analyze, and export content that's responsive to your organization's internal and external investigations. It also lets legal teams manage the entire legal hold notification workflow to communicate with custodians involved in a case.

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Data loss prevention (DLP) solution overview page
Details: The DLP solution overview page will appear in the Microsoft 365 compliance center and house policy recommendation widgets and other actions and guidance related to your available DLP solutions.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Templates for creation of a new Team
Details: With templates in Teams, users can choose from a variety of customizable templates when creating a new team, helping them get started quickly. IT Admins can also create custom templates for their organization, allowing them to standardize team structures, preinstall relevant apps, and scale best practices.

Description: SharePoint: New leadership connection site template
Details: The template brings together conversations from Yammer, news, resources, and showcases upcoming events.

Description: Microsoft Information Protection: Configure sensitivity labels for encrypt-only protection on Outlook messages
Details: In the Microsoft 365 compliance center, you can now create labels that enforce the encrypt-only restriction (available within Office 365 Message Encryption) when applied to Outlook email messages. With encrypt-only, users can send encrypted email to any recipient, whether they are inside or outside the organization, and the protection follows the lifecycle of the email.

Description: Microsoft Information Protection: Outlook support for DisableMandatoryInOutlook and OutlookDefaultLabel settings
Details: Outlook clients will now support the advanced Azure Information Protection (AIP) settings DisableMandatoryInOutlook and OutlookDefaultLabel.

Description: SharePoint: Focus mode for modern SharePoint pages
Details: SharePoint page authors and viewers will be able to focus on page content by using the Expand content button on the command bar to hide the site header, site navigation, and global navigation bar. Focus mode will persist when page viewers select links to pages within a site, but not when they select links to pages outside of the site (even if they are within a hub site).
Tags - Release phase: General Availability, Targeted Release (Entire Organization), Targeted Release (Select People)
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Germany, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: Microsoft Teams: Manage meeting options for GCC-High
Details: Organizers will now be able to modify the user experience, or customize the safety and security settings for their meetings using the new “Meeting Options” feature.

Description: OneDrive: Quickly change permissions in OneDrive/SharePoint share controls.
Details: Users can now have the ability to change permissions more easily from the OneDrive/SharePoint share controls.
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Advanced eDiscovery: Collection of Teams conversation as transcript
Details: eDiscovery managers will soon have the flexibility to collect Teams messages as transcript items. Transcripts will aggregate and thread messages in the same Teams conversations into a single HTML file that is available for review and export. Customers will continue to have the ability to collect Teams messages as individual items as offered today.

Description: Microsoft Defender for Endpoint: Endpoint discovery for Microsoft Defender for Endpoint
Details: Endpoint for Microsoft Defender for Endpoint enables organizations to discover and secure unmanaged endpoints. Once discovered integrated workflows can be used to secure the devices using Defender for Endpoint’s threat and vulnerability management, threat detection and automated incident responses capabilities.

Description: Outlook for Windows: Share to Teams
Details: Share an email or a conversation from Outlook to a person or channel in Teams.  The option to Share to Teams will be available in the Simplified Ribbon as well as part of the options behind the ellipses when reading emails.

Description: Outlook for Android: Sync contact subfolders as category labels
Details: Outlook contacts and contact subfolders in Outlook for Windows, Outlook for Mac, and Outlook on the web will be synced to Outlook for Android. They will be labeled with a contact category based on the name of the original contact subfolder.
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: Outlook: My Day pane available in Office.com
Details: The My Day pane from Outlook is now available to users in Office.com. The My Day pane allows users to quickly glance at their Outlook calendar, join meetings, and monitor their To Do list.
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Germany, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: Outlook for iOS: Play My Emails reminders
Details: You can set reminders for yourself to use Play My Emails in Outlook for iOS so you can stay on top of what's new in your inbox as part of your daily routine.

Description: Office, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, OneNote: iPad Fluent redesign - Ribbon header and commands
Details: The Fluent Design System brings a more coherent, productive experience to customers.

Description: Excel: Ink editor support in Excel Online
Details: Pen Tool to help you handwrite to enter data and make quick edits to your data.

Description: Visio: AWS content in Visio
Details: Over 400 new shapes for Amazon Web Services (AWS) architecture.

Description: Yammer: Suggested communities
Details: This new section on the Yammer homepage will suggest relevant communities for people discover and join.

Description: Microsoft Viva: Topics in Yammer - Preview
Details: Display topic highlights and access topic cards in Yammer conversations.

Description: Microsoft Viva: Extended language support
Details: Support for topic identification from content authored in additional languages.

Description: Microsoft Viva: Graph connected content indexed into topic card - Preview
Details: Preview - Include content from Microsoft Graph Connectors MediaWiki and ServiceNow for topic discovery.

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Audit search enhancements
Details: This update provides various service optimizations for Audit search, including speed and workflow improvements. For example, you can track status of the searches.

Description: Microsoft Viva: Discover experts and answers from Topics
Details: Questions on topics will receive automated answers or get referred to subject matter experts.

Description: Microsoft Viva: Topics in Teams
Details: Add topics to chat messages and display topic cards in Microsoft Teams.

Description: Microsoft Information Protection: New named entities SITs and enhanced unified policy authoring templates
Details: Named entities are sensitive information types (SITs) that can’t easily be identified by a regular expression or a function; these include person names, physical addresses, and medical terms & conditions. This update adds 52 new SITs representing named entities, and 10 enhanced policy templates that can be used in solutions such as DLP and auto-labeling, and cover important regulations, such as US HIPAA and EU GDPR.

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Automated testing and documentation of scored actions in Compliance Manager
Details: Automated testing and documentation of scored actions in Compliance Manager with the ability to view or download evidence for an automatically scored action.
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: Azure Active Directory: Access Tokens issued by Azure AD will have lifetime of 60-90 minutes.
Details: Access Tokens issued by Azure AD will have default lifetime between 60-90 minutes.
Tags - Platform: Android, Mac, Education, Developer, iOS, Web, Desktop, Engineering, Mobile

Description: Microsoft Defender for Identity: Alert exclusion in Microsoft 365 security center
Details: One of the most widely used features relating to alerting in Defender for Identity is being able to tune them and make sure you are only alerted on what should be getting your attention. With the exclusion capability landing in Microsoft 365 security center for Defender for Identity, you can tune the alerts and filter the detections based on entities that matter to you. We are also improving the experience in the allow-list functionality, making sure you can allow entities across all detections as opposed to allowing them per detection.

Description: Visio: Visio web app in Microsoft 365
Details: Microsoft 365 for commercial users now includes core functionalities of Visio - a Visio web app that allows anyone to create, edit, and share professional diagrams and integrates with a variety of Microsoft solutions, including Microsoft Teams for a collaborative diagramming experience.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Reading Progress in Teams for Education - reading practice and review software
Details: Reading Progress is a reading practice and fluency experience that is part of Microsoft Teams for Education Assignments. Reading Progress saves teachers time in capturing audio/video reading fluency practice and helps students practice reading out loud independently in a private and non-stigmatizing way. Reading Progress also provides insights and analytics to educators.
Tags - Platform: Android, Mac, Education, iOS, Web, Desktop

Description: Microsoft Information Protection: Auto-classification with sensitivity labels in SPO, EXO, OneDrive for DoD
Details: Auto-classification with sensitivity labels in OneDrive, SharePoint Online, and Exchange Online will soon be available in DoD environments. Sensitivity labels are central to Microsoft Information Protection, enabling you to label important content to associate it with protection policies and actions like encryption and visual marking. With this release, you can start using sensitivity labels at scale for documents stored on OneDrive and SharePoint Online, and for emails in transit in Exchange Online automatically without manual user input.

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: New named entities SITs and enhanced unified policy authoring templates (Public Preview)
Details: Named entities are sensitive information types (SITs) that can’t easily be identified by a regular expression or a function; these include person names, physical addresses, and medical terms & conditions. This update adds 52 new SITs representing named entities, and 10 enhanced policy templates that can be used in solutions such as DLP and auto-labeling, and cover important regulations, such as US HIPAA and EU GDPR.

Description: Outlook for iOS: format options for signatures
Details: The text box to create a signature for your mobile email messages will support HTML formatting if you cut and paste from another source. Rich formatting such as bold, italics, underline, and links will also be available.
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: Microsoft Teams: Pairing the channel and the corresponding SharePoint folder name.
Details: This feature has been updated to reflect new timing. When renaming a Teams’ channel, the corresponding SharePoint folder will be renamed and reflect the new name. This will help create consistency across Microsoft 365 endpoints, making it easier on users to find their files from anywhere.  This new feature will be available for all Standard and Private channels. For Standard channels – The corresponding folder in SharePoint will be renamed. For Private channels – The corresponding site name and the folder in SharePoint will be renamed. For legacy Teams channels that were renamed prior to this rollout, there will be no change in experience. When a legacy channel is renamed after this release, it will simultaneously rename the corresponding SharePoint folder.  This feature has been updated to reflect new timing.

Description: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Built-In Protection
Details: We are introducing Built-In Protection for Microsoft Defender for Office 365 to automatically elevate all users within your organization to the base level of security protection. Built-In Protection will implement a low impact version of Safe Attachments and Safe Links, removing burden on admins to configure users with recommended security settings and policies. This new preset security policy will require no admin action and will be turned on by default for all new and existing customers. As a result, customers will be automatically protected from unintentional configuration gaps in their policies and experience overall improved protection against phish and malicious message delivery to end users.
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: Outlook: Renaming of Notifications pane on web
Details: Outlook on the web will change the Notifications pane title to Activity.
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Germany, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: Outlook: For iOS - More actions available in press and hold menus
Details: This coming Outlook for iOS release will make Book a Workspace available in the New Message and New Event press and hold menus.

Description: Exchange and Outlook: Ability to book time to travel and transportation on web.
Details: Now when you need to go to a different building or place between meetings, Outlook will enable you to book travel time and way of transportation between the places you need to go.

Description: Outlook: Dictate emails on Android
Details: Use speech-to-text to dictate email messages, available starting in EN-US.

Description: OneDrive and SharePoint: Adjusting version retention for PST files
Details: This update will help customers manage PST file versions from consuming storage capacity for OneDrive & SharePoint Online. PST files are a type of Outlook Data File which can consume a lot of storage - especially when versions are considered. The service will now limit the number of PST versions retained, often resulting in less storage consumption.

Description: Whiteboard: Whiteboard on Android ready for General Availability
Details: Microsoft Whiteboard provides a freeform intelligent canvas where teams can ideate, create, and collaborate visually via the cloud. We released the Whiteboard Public Preview App on Android in March 2021 & plan to revamp it to provide support for Microsoft (M365) accounts as well, as part of this update. This update to our Android App also adds marquee features such as the ability to insert templates, images & stickers among others thus, adhering to Microsoft's strong emphasis on end-user centricity.

Description: Microsoft Search: Microsoft Search in GCC
Details: Microsoft Search: Organization-wide Search via Search Box in SharePoint, Office.com, and on Microsoft Search in Bing. Customizable Bookmarks, and QnA Answers.

Description: Word, Excel, PowerPoint:  Recommended files in Office
Details: Microsoft Office displays a list of recommended files on the File tab, or start page, of Word, Excel, or PowerPoint on Windows. This list allows you to keep track of work around you and quickly access files with activity you value most such as edits, mentions, comments by people you interact with. This feature uses machine learning to predict which files you're most likely to want to work on next and presents those as a set of cards you can choose from. Only files that you have access to in OneDrive or SharePoint are suggested. For each recommended file you'll see a card with a thumbnail of the file, information about what kind of activity has been happening with that file, and when that activity occurred.
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: Microsoft Project: Import Project desktop files to Project for the web
Details: Use a button on the Project Home to import your .mpp files into Project for the web

Description: Microsoft Graph: Connector results on All vertical
Details: Microsoft Graph connectors for Microsoft Search provide a set of out-of-the-box search connectors and search and indexing APIs that enable Microsoft 365 customers to connect Microsoft Search to data sources outside of Microsoft 365. With this feature, users can explore results from Microsoft Graph connectors in the All vertical. With this feature, users can explore results from Microsoft Graph connectors in the All tab in the end-points mentioned here.

Description: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Advanced Delivery for SecOps Mailboxes and Third-Party Phishing Simulations
Details: Advanced delivery gives admins the ability to configure advanced message delivery for special scenarios, including third-party phishing simulation campaigns and SecOps mailboxes. Advanced delivery will deliver unfiltered messages in these cases and clearly mark messages as part of each scenario across all admin surfaces.
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Out-of-the-box assessments for non-Microsoft 365 assets
Details: Introducing pre-configured templates that extend Compliance Manager capabilities beyond Microsoft 365 assets.
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: SharePoint: Swap root site from SharePoint admin center for customers with 10k+ seats
Details: Customer tenants with      more than 10K seats or more can now swap their SharePoint root site from      within the SharePoint admin center user interface.
Tags - Release phase: General Availability, Preview, Targeted Release, Targeted Release (Entire Organization)
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Germany, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: Microsoft Information Protection: New conditions for auto-labeling in Exchange Online
Details: An auto-labeling policy can now apply a label to Exchange Online email based on sender, recipient, subject, or header matches without requiring a scan for sensitive content.

Description: Power BI: New sharing experience
Details: We're introducing a new sharing capability in Power BI that will allow reports to be shared with people within the organization through shareable links.
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Germany, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Communication Compliance for DoD
Details: Communication Compliance is an insider risk solution in Microsoft 365 that helps minimize communication risks by helping you detect, capture, and act on inappropriate messages in your organization.

Description: Azure Active Directory: Location Based Access Control Public Preview
Details: You are now able to create Conditional Access policies to allow/deny access using a new type of Named Location known as GPS. For these policies, the user will need to share their GPS location from the mobile device on which Microsoft Authenticator is installed.

Description: OneDrive: Android - Night time reading mode for PDF viewing
Details: Users of OneDrive for Android will be able to change the appearance of PDFs in three main color modes which are day mode, night mode and sepia to enhance viewing.
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Germany, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: Outlook: Updates to attachments in received mail
Details: We are consolidating the options to manage a received file under a single dropdownmenu similar to Outlook for Windows and Mac. For customers with OneDrive enabled, we are adding the ability to directly edit Word, Excel, and PowerPoint attachments in the corresponding desktop or web app.
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: Outlook: Admin-set organization logos in Outlook for iOS and Android
Details: Admins can set an organization logo through Azure Active Directory, and users will see this logo in certain multi-account scenarios to better differentiate between work and personal mail.
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: Microsoft Information Protection: Configure sensitivity labels for encrypt-only protection on Outlook messages
Details: In the Microsoft 365 compliance center, you can now create labels that enforce the encrypt-only restriction (available within Office 365 Message Encryption) when applied to Outlook email messages. With encrypt-only, users can send encrypted email to any recipient, whether they are inside or outside the organization, and the protection follows the lifecycle of the email.
Tags - Platform: Android, Mac, iOS, Web, Desktop, Mobile

Description: Microsoft Information Protection: Outlook support for DisableMandatoryInOutlook and OutlookDefaultLabel settings
Details: Outlook clients will now support the advanced Azure Information Protection (AIP) settings DisableMandatoryInOutlook and OutlookDefaultLabel.

Description: OneDrive: Request Files for GCC High and DoD
Details: The Request Files feature is now available for the GCCH and DoD environments.

Description: Microsoft Information Protection: Teams location picker supports security groups and distribution lists (GCC-H)
Details: Data loss prevention (DLP) for Microsoft Teams will now support security groups and distribution lists as part of the Teams location picker, enabling more granular control of DLP policy scope (i.e. to include/exclude particular departments, business units, geo-specific security groups, etc.)

Description: Microsoft Information Protection: Teams location picker supports security groups and distribution lists (DoD)
Details: Data loss prevention (DLP) for Microsoft Teams will now support security groups and distribution lists as part of the Teams location picker, enabling more granular control of DLP policy scope (i.e. to include/exclude particular departments, business units, geo-specific security groups, etc.)

Description: Microsoft 365 admin center:  New guide with scripts and tools for Microsoft Edge IE mode and site discovery
Details: Enterprise Site Discovery provides a way for you to detect which of your users' frequently visited sites need to use Internet Explorer mode (IE mode) in Microsoft Edge. In this step-by-step guide, you’ll get scripts to automate configuration of Enterprise Site Discovery, get IE mode recommendations from a cloud-based tool, and create an Enterprise Mode Site List that you'll deploy to your users.

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: New Permissions management page
Details: We’re adding a new Permissions page within the Microsoft 365 compliance center. Admins will be able to use this new page to view and assign user roles and create and modify custom role groups - activities currently managed within the legacy Office 365 Security & Compliance Center.

Description: Microsoft Information Protection: Ability to test Exact Data Match
Details: After setting up EDM-based classification, tenant admins will now be able to test EDM sensitive information types (SITs) via the Microsoft 365 compliance center and via PowerShell cmdlet. Classification results returned will include the sensitive type, its count, and confidence.
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: Azure Active Directory: GPS based named locations public preview
Details: Now, admins will have the ability to create Conditional Access policies to allow/deny access using a new type of Named Location based off GPS data. When the policy is enabled, end users will need to share their GPS location from the mobile device on which Microsoft Authenticator is installed. The user's mobile device is a good indication of the user's actual location at the time.

Description: Azure Active Directory: Temporary Access Pass
Details: Temporary Access Pass (TAP) is a time-limited passcode that can be used to registration Passwordless FIDO2 and Phone Sign-in. TAP also makes recovery easier when a user has lost or forgotten their strong authentication methods and needs to sign in to register new authentication methods.

Description: Azure Active Directory: Application Proxy traffic optimization
Details: You now can now designate which region your Application Proxy service connector group should use.  By choosing the closest region to your applications and connectors, you can improve performance and reduce the latency to the App Proxy service.

Description: Azure Active Directory: B2C Identity Protection & Conditional Access
Details: You can enhance the security of Azure AD B2C implementation with Azure AD’s Identity Protection and Conditional Access capabilities. Identity Protection allows organizations to automate the detection and remediation of identity-based risks, investigate risks, and export risk detection data to third-party utilities for further analysis. Conditional Access is the policy engine that brings signals together to make decisions and enforce organizational policies. Together, these capabilities give application owners significantly greater control over risky authentications and access policies.

Description: Azure Active Directory: Conditional Access authentication context
Details: Conditional Access authentication context lets you target policies for data and actions within an app so you can refine your Zero Trust policies for least privileged access while minimizing user friction.

Description: Azure Active Directory: verifiable credentials
Details: Verifiable credentials let organizations confirm information about someone without collecting and storing their personal data. Organizations will be able to issue digital versions of a variety of credentials such as physical badges, loyalty cards, and government-issued paper documents based on open standards.

Description: Access: SQL Monaco Editor
Details: Use the embedded Monaco Editor, the same editor used for Visual Studio Code, in Access.
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Germany, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: Access: New (Modern) Web Browser Control (to support Chromium Edge)
Details: Improve and increase the efficiency of your browsing capabilities through our Modern Web BrowserControl, which will support our new Chromium Edge browser.
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Germany, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: Access: Enabling Large Address Aware (LAA) for 32-Bit Access
Details: 32-bit Access will become Large Address Aware (LAA) to address 4G of memory, rather than 2G.
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Germany, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: Access: New Microsoft Graph Data Connector
Details: Link to or import from Microsoft Graph services to build Access applications that can leverage the smart contextual data stored in the Graph.
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Germany, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: Microsoft Teams: Answer Meeting Nudges with Video for iOS
Details: This feature brings the ability for iOS devices to automatically answer incoming meeting nudges with their video on. The feature availability is controlled through AutoAnswerwithVideo.
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: Yammer: Yammer profile page updates
Details: Revamped profile page with cover photo, followers/following, right rail and joined communities.
Tags - Platform: Android, Mac, iOS, Web, Desktop, Mobile

Description: Microsoft Teams: Admin notifications for Custom app submissions
Details: When a developer submits a custom app for IT admin approval, admins will receive a notification in a dedicated Teams channel, so they can review and take next steps to publish the app.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Pin chat messages
Details: Pin a Teams chat message to drive awareness and provide the chat members with quick access to important content. Pinning will help your team stay in sync on what’s relevant in a timely manner.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Video Streams Out via AJA or Blackmagic Design Hardware.
Details: Isolated video streams can be sent out of Teams meetings via AJA and Blackmagic Design hardware devices.

Description: Microsoft Graph: Webhooks for To-Do Tasks (Preview)
Details: Developers can now create webhook subscriptions allowing their applications to receive notifications when To-Do Tasks change.

Description: Excel: Import data from dynamic arrays
Details: You can now import, shape and refresh data from dynamic arrays in the current workbook.

Description: Visio: Custom colors in Visio for the web
Details: Expand your color palette in Visio for the web with Recent Colors and More Colors. Use the new Recent Colors section in Visio for the web to quickly access recently used colors in your diagram or experience a full color palette with the new More Colors section.

Description: Outlook for Windows:  Option to start meetings late
Details: Similar the option to end meetings early, we are adding the option to have the meetings you create start 0-15 mins after the specified time. You will be able to set this up in Options/Calendar/Calendar options once it is released.

Description: Office app: New Ink Toolbox for iPhone and iPad
Details: New visual improvements to the ink experience in Word, Excel, and PowerPoint for Microsoft 365 on iOS.

Description: Outlook for Android:  SharePoint News and recorded Teams Meetings
Details: Your company Discover feed on the Search landing page will include SharePoint news and access to recently recorded Teams online meetings that are relevant to you.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Fluid components in Teams chat
Details: Fluid components in Teams chat allow end users to send a message with a table, action items or a list that can be co-authored and edited by everyone in line. The date for GCC will be published shortly.

Description: Outlook for Windows: New location for key Outlook modules and integration with other Microsoft 365 apps
Details: The main modules in Outlook such as email, calendar, tasks and people are moving to the left of the folder pane. We are also adding a way for users to quickly access To Do, OrgExplorer, Yammer Communities, and Bookings directly inside Outlook. You can customize by pinning preferred Outlook and Microsoft 365 apps. This change can be previewed with the return of the Coming Soon toggle.

Description: Microsoft Teams: New default settings when opening Office files
Details: Users can set a default of browser, desktop or Teams when opening Office files (Word, Excel, and Power Point) that are shared in Teams.  The desktop setting can be selected, if the user has Office version 16 or newer installed and activated.  Please see roadmap ID 92946 for an update on the government clouds.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Admins can use cloud shell from Teams admin center
Details: Admins can open Azure cloud shell from Teams admin center inline and run powershell scripts from browser.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Guest Access in GCC - High
Details: Teams now supports Guest Access between tenants inside the GCC-H Cloud.

Description: Excel: Power Query Data Types Tutorial
Details: Learn how to create data types using Power Query

Description: Yammer: Discover communities in Communities app for Microsoft Teams
Details: Browse, discover, and join communities around your Yammer network directly in the Yammer Communities app for Microsoft Teams on the web, desktop, or mobile.

Description: PowerPoint: PowerPoint modern comments for enterprise
Details: The new modern comments experience for PowerPoint is now available through your enterprise account. Modern comments greatly improves your comments experience with features such as resolving comments, anchoring comments to objects and text, improved @mentions, and more.
Tags - Release phase: General Availability, Preview, Targeted Release, Current Channel

Description: Outlook for iOS:  End user options to extend Delegate Permissions
Details: You can extend permissions to have your delegate manage email and calendar events on your behalf by granting permission to read, create, change or delete items in your folders.  Colleagues who have delegate permissions can add a Delegate Mailbox account to Outlook for iOS.
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: Word: Better collaboration with modern comments for Mac
Details: Share your comments with co-authors only once they're complete, enjoy improved @mention notifications, and be more productive with a consistent commenting experience between Word, Excel and PowerPoint.
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Germany, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: Word: Better collaboration with modern comments for Windows
Details: Share your comments with co-authors only once they're complete, enjoy improved @mention notifications, and be more productive with a consistent commenting experience between Word, Excel and PowerPoint.
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: Yammer and Microsoft Teams: Customize branding & link previews.
Details: Microsoft Teams admins can customize the branding for the Yammer Communities app for Microsoft Teams to suit their Yammer network with their preferred app logos, naming, accent color, and more. with this Communities app for Microsoft Teams, users see a rich Yammer preview in chats and channel conversations when the user pastes a URL of a conversation from a public Yammer community.

Description: Word: Dark Mode
Details: Dark Mode in Word will provide a modern look for documents while giving users the ability to reduce eye strain and accommodate light sensitivity from long hours at a computer screen.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Guest Access in DoD
Details: Teams now supports Guest Access between tenants inside the DoD Cloud.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Chat preview notification settings, Government Clouds
Details: Users can change settings and manage previews for their chat notification toasts.

Description: Microsoft Edge v.91: Now you can view Microsoft Defender Advanced Threat Protection (MDATP) threat signals from Application Guard (AppGuard) containers
Details: Application Guard is now integrated with Microsoft Defender Advanced Threat Protection (MDATP), which allows IT admins track threat activity detected by MDATP inside the container.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Approvals in Teams
Details: Get to results faster with Approvals in Microsoft Teams. Easily create, manage, share, and act on approvals directly from your hub for teamwork.
Tags - Platform: Android, Mac, iOS, Web, Desktop, Mobile

Description: Microsoft Teams: Lower all raised hands.
Details: Meeting organizers and presenters will see an option to lower all raised hands from the participant pane.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Present slides from PowerPoint app for Mac
Details: Present your slides directly from the PowerPoint app to a Teams meeting via PowerPoint Live in Teams.

Description: Microsoft 365 Admin center: Translator service for the Service Health Dashboard
Details: The new translator toggle in the service health dashboard page translates the content of Incidents and advisories to the language selected by user.
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: Microsoft Teams: Network planner tool updates
Details: Network planner tool will be updated to reflect the latest bandwidth requirements of Teams client. This will help IT administrators better estimate and plan their office bandwidth needs.

Description: Microsoft Teams: AI-based noise suppression for MAC users
Details: When your mic is turned on in a Teams meeting or call, background noise around you—shuffling papers, slamming doors, barking dogs, and so on—can distract others. Teams offers four levels of noise suppression (auto, low, high, and off) to help keep meeting participants focused.  This feature is now available for all MAC users except for those with new MACs that have the M1 ARM processor.
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: Yammer: Browse community files stored in SharePoint with SharePoint library structure and capabilities.
Details: Browsing files that have been uploaded to a Yammer community will now have access to the SharePoint files structure and capabilities.

Description: Yammer: Select attachment uploads from SharePoint file picker
Details: When selecting a post attachment, Yammer will now use the SharePoint Online file picker to select the file.

Description: Outlook for Android:  End user options for Delegate permissions
Details: You can extend permissions to have your delegate manage email and calendar events on your behalf by granting permission to read, create, change or delete items in your folders.  Colleagues who have delegate permissions can add a Delegate Mailbox account to Outlook for Android.
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: Outlook for Windows: Suggested attachments in Search
Details: By clicking in the Search box at the top of your screen, attachments from emails will be suggested as options before you enter a specific query.
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: Microsoft Teams: Custom Backgrounds on mobile devices
Details: Microsoft provided and user uploaded custom backgrounds are now available on iOS.

Description: Yammer: New Live Events Insights
Details: Improve your live events viewership. Monitor attendance, measure engagement, and recognize trends.

Description: Microsoft Information Protection: Automatic and recommended sensitivity labeling available in Office apps for DoD
Details: Automatic and recommended sensitivity labeling, based on content inspection, is natively built into Office apps within Outlook and Word/Excel/PowerPoint applications on Windows (in the Office 365 subscription version of the Office apps) and Office Online.

Description: Yammer: Improvements to hashtags and topics
Details: We are creating a sharper distinction between topics and hashtags in Yammer further differentiating these features so that topics power curation, management, and categorizing of knowledge, while hashtags will continue to be used to support campaigns and user expression.

Description: Forms: Shorten URL when sending Forms to collect responses
Details: In Microsoft Forms, you can now choose to use a shorter URL in some scenarios directly, enabling the responders easier to type and access the link for specific situations.

Description: SharePoint:  Site Collection Level permissions for Microsoft Graph
Details: Applications can now use the new "Sites.selected" permission to request access to SharePoint sites.  By default an application that requests “Sites.Selected” instead of a tenant wide permission may not access any SharePoint sites. The tenant administrator can grant or revoke an application’s access to individual sites through new endpoints in the Microsoft Graph API.

Description: Outlook for Windows:  Search answers for specific people, files, company bookmarks and events
Details: Search for a specific file, person, company topic or event and Outlook will provide an actionable answer across people, files, events and websites across your organization so you can quick get to the information you're looking for.

Description: Microsoft 365 admin center:  Groups - Group Driven Membership Management
Details: With this in-product feature support, end users and admins will be able to add a Security Group or an Microsoft 365 Group as a member of an Microsoft 365 Group. The release will be made in phases– one Office 365 app at a time will start supporting the nesting ability andeventually be expanded to all Office workloads.
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: Microsoft Teams: Adobe Sign Integration in Approvals for GCC-High and DoD
Details: There may be times when you need something approved and recorded with more formal attestation and adding signatures to the approval process is necessary. Simply choose Adobe Sign in the Approvals app and add the request details. Once submitted, signers are notified with an email and can easily review and sign. Approvals will keep track of the entire workflow right in context within Teams.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Live Transcript for Teams Meetings for DoD
Details: Teams Meetings now have a real-time transcript during their meetings as well as a post-meeting transcript. This will help users in real-time recall what has been spoken during the meeting as well as review the meeting after the fact.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Join a meeting by digital code
Details: User can join a meeting by entering a digital code.

Description: Visio: Enhanced organizational charts experience in Visio for the web [Visio Plan 1, Plan 2]
Details: Further customize your org charts in Visio for the web. Users with a Visio Plan 1 or Visio Plan 2 license will be able to quickly add new org chart shapes using Quick Shapes in the Shapes pane, then add additional fields, such as email, location, and more.
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: Microsoft Forms: Timed Quiz
Details: Configure the time allotted for your students to complete a quiz.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Multi-language meeting invite control
Details: IT administrators can apply a new policy to set multiple languages in Teams meeting invites.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Live reactions in Teams Meetings for DoD
Details: React during a meeting using emojis that will appear to all participants.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Data reports for polls after Teams meeting
Details: If user has used Forms poll in a Teams meeting, a summary report for all the polls used in this meeting will be generated and shared with meeting organizer and presenters.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Data reports after Teams meeting class
Details: If a teacher has used Forms polls in a Teams meeting class, a summary report for all the polls used in this meeting will be generated and shared with teacher.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Branded Lobby for desktop
Details: Admins will now be able to add a custom logo to the Teams experience, for display in the lobby and meeting pre-join experience. The logo will be displayed for meetings where the organizer has the Advanced Comms SKU.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Voice enabled channels in government clouds
Details: We added the ability to use a Teams channel with members as call agents for call queue call answering.  Now we are bringing this capability to government clouds.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Text prediction for Teams mobile
Details: Assistive AI predicts your answers and gives text suggestions, so you can finish phrases in one tap.
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: Microsoft Teams Rooms Managed Services: Location Based Roles Scope
Details: IT roles based on location scopes such as building, sites, regions, etc.

Description: Microsoft Teams Rooms Managed Services: Action Driven Incidents
Details: Action based organization of incidents to streamline IT workflow

Description: Microsoft Teams Rooms Managed Services: Room Expansion Planning
Details: Planning experience for new rooms based on organization standards

Description: Microsoft Teams: Video Streams Out via AJA or Blackmagic Design Hardware for GCC-High and DoD
Details: Isolated video streams can be sent out of Teams meetings via AJA and Blackmagic Design hardware devices.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Embedded CART captioning support for Teams meetings for GCC-High and DOD
Details: Teams meetings now support integration with real-time captioning providers and CART writers (Communication Access Real-Time Transcription) so that users who utilize CART captions can view the captions in the same window as their meeting.

Description: Excel: Queries Task Pane
Details: The Queries Task Pane will allow to view the queries and query groups in the workbook and related details.
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: Microsoft Teams: Roaming bandwidth control
Details: Roaming bandwidth control is a new capability that allows admins to set dynamic bandwidth policies which are based upon the geographic location of users’ Teams clients. This allows admins to set more limited bandwidth controls for when users travel to remote or bandwidth constrained locations, and then relax limitations when they travel to a location with higher bandwidth capacity.  Initially two settings from the Teams Meeting Policy will be included - AllowIPVideo, andMediaBitRateKb.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Co-organizer Meeting Role
Details: Organizers will now be able to share control by assigning the new "Co-organizer" role to people they invite. Co-organizers will have almost all of the capabilities of the organizer, including management of Meeting Options.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Direct guest join for Zoom and Webex meetings on video-enabled certified Teams Android devices
Details: Direct guest join (aka Third-party meeting join) is an ability to join meetings of other meeting providers from Microsoft Teams. Third-party meetings will appear on the Teams calendar and users will be able to join them the same way they join any other Teams meeting. This functionality will be limited to video-enabled certified Teams Android devices and will support only Zoom and Webex meetings.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Approvals Templates for GCC-High and DoD
Details: User can simply choose a template provided by their tenant admins or a Team Owner when creating a new approval request.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Co-organizer Meeting Role for GCC-High and DoD
Details: Organizers will now be able to share control by assigning the new "Co-organizer" role to people they invite. Co-organizers will have almost all of the capabilities of the organizer, including management of Meeting Options.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Support Application screen sharing for Teams for VDI for Citrix
Details: Citrix users on virtual desktop infrastructure (VDI) will be able to share application during Teams meeting once the feature is available. This will help user to share an application instead of sharing a complete desktop screen.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Dynamic Emergency Calling for Work from Home for Teams VDI on Azure Virtual Desktop and Windows 365
Details: This feature enables users on Azure Virtual Desktop and Windows 365 on virtual desktop infrastructure (VDI) to make an emergency call while working from home. It will allow users to validate (and if necessary, edit) the address that will be communicated to emergency responders.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Press to unmute for GCC-High and DoD
Details: Introducing the capability to allow meeting participants to temporarily unmute by pressing Ctrl + Space (Windows) and Option + Space (macOS) to speak.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Walkie Talkie on Teams phones
Details: Like traditional walkie talkies, the Walkie Talkie app on your Teams phones provides an instant push-to-talk (PTT) communication for your team. It allows you to press and hold a button to speak to your team, and release the button to listen. Users can connect with their team using the Teams channels.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Changes to Microsoft Teams apps' native permissions in the browser
Details: In order to better secure Microsoft Teams third-party applications that request native device permissions - such as camera, microphone or location access - we will be requiring users to manually opt-in for these permissions per app in the Microsoft Teams web browser experience. We are already doing this on the Teams desktop and mobile clients.
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: Microsoft Teams: Search in Teams Admin Center (Preview)
Details: Admins can search for users, teams, pages and settings using a common search box in Teams admin center.

Description: Forms: Split sending and sharing entry point
Details: To remove the confusion between collecting response from others and collaborating with others, we decouple entry point of sending and sharing into separate paths. In future iterations, more sending options and effective channels will be added to keep improving the detailed sending experiences.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Support open-text question poll for Teams meeting
Details: For Microsoft Forms poll in Teams meeting, there is a new question type - open text.  You can use this question type to collect attendees' open-ended information before/during/after the meeting.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Tags are available in DOD
Details: Tags are available in DoD. Tags in Teams let users quickly reach a group of people without having to @mention or type out everyone.

Description: Microsoft Forms: Forms Mobile parity with Forms desktop for Creation & Analysis
Details: Form designers who create forms and analyze results from Mobile will now have access to the full Form's product functionality including all question types, settings, quiz, and collaboration. This will be available to new forms and Existing forms in the browser and a few weeks later in the Office Mobile app.
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: Visio: New stencil for shapes in your document in Visio for the web [Visio Plan 2]
Details: The new Shapes in the Document stencil automatically saves the shapes you've added to your diagram, so you can quickly access them and use them again without having to search through multiple stencils. This feature will be available for users with a Visio Plan 2 license.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Music Mode for Teams
Details: In music mode, we support up to 32 kHz sampling rate mono audio at 128 kbps, and optimize our internal audio processing settings for reproducing music with high fidelity. Teams will automatically adjust the audio bitrate based on the available bandwidth, going down to 48 kbps while still delivering good music quality. We also provide users the option to turn off components such as echo cancellation, noise suppression, and gain control if needed. To benefit from this improved fidelity, professional microphones and headphones or high quality external loudspeakers are ideal (no Bluetooth headsets). Built-in microphones and speakers on laptops such as the Surface Book will also deliver good experience.

Description: Microsoft Teams: RTMP Streaming Support
Details: Enables support for your users to stream their Teams meetings to large audiences through Real Time Messaging Protocol (RTMP), including endpoints outside your organization.
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: Microsoft Teams: Parent connection in Teams for Education
Details: With Parent connection in Teams for Education, educators can easily connect and engage with the parents and guardians of their class using Teams chat. All parent and guardian data is provisioned using School Data Sync, saving educators and IT staff valuable time.

Description: Visio: Organizational charts in Visio for the web [Visio Plan 1, Plan 2]
Details: Visualize your team structure, hierarchy levels, and reporting relationships with new org chart shapes in Visio. Users with a Visio Plan 1 or Visio Plan 2 license will be able to create org charts directly in Visio or from data in Excel using the Data Visualizer add-in.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Walkie Talkie on iOS
Details: Walkie Talkie, a push-to-talk experience that enables clear and secure voice communication over the cloud, enables teams to communicate instantly and always stay on the same page. This native built-in app in Teams turns employee or company-owned iOS smartphones and tablets into a walkie-talkie, reducing the number of devices employees must carry and lowering costs for IT.

Description: Microsoft Edge v.92: Automatic HTTPS
Details: Starting with Microsoft Edge version 92, users will have the option to upgrade navigations from HTTP to HTTPS on domains likely to support this more secure protocol. This support can also be configured to attempt delivery over HTTPS for all domains. More secure connections help protect customers from man-in-the-middle attacks

Description: Microsoft Edge v.92: Protocol launch support for PWA
Details: Developers can create a more engaging native-like experience if we allow Progressive Web Apps (PWA) to be registered as handlers for URL protocols.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Dynamic Emergency Calling for Work From Home
Details: This feature enables users to validate (and if necessary, edit) the address that will be communicated to emergency responders in the event that an emergency call is placed by an individual working from home. DoD will be added back to the roadmap in the future.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Press to unmute
Details: Introducing the capability to allow meeting participants to temporarily unmute by press Ctrl +Space (Windows) and Option + Space (macOS) to speak.

Description: Microsoft Teams: 1:1 VOIP and PSTN Call Recording and Transcription In Call App V2
Details: 1:1 VOIP and PSTN Call Recording and Transcription will now show in the Calls App, in the “call details” panel.  This feature permits users to view call recordings and transcriptions for both PSTN and VoIP calls.  Users have the option to delete call recordings, removing them from the call history in “call details” panel. If there are multiple recordings of a call, each call recording will appear in a list in call history, in the “call details” panel.
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: Yammer: Updated community discovery experience in the new Yammer
Details: Re-invigorated experience to browse, discover, and join communities around your Yammer network.

Description: Outlook: Compose Your Messages with Microsoft Editor
Details: This feature brings the goodness of Microsoft Editor to Outlook mobile. We'll offer users spelling, grammar and refinement suggestions as they type. Users can disable this in Settings.
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: Microsoft Teams and Forms: Word Cloud for Polls in Teams
Details: When users have collected responses for an open text poll in a Teams meeting, word cloud data insight will be available to help them get a quick view on the top text phrases people answered.

Description: Word: Dictation in Word for the Web now available for GCC and GCC-High Tenants
Details: Dictation is now available for those in government GCC and GCC-High Tenants.

Description: Excel, Word and PowerPoint: Contact cards accessible from Office Web when collaborating in real-time.
Details: When working with others in an Office file at the same time you can now access people's contact card directly from within the Office Web Application. This is helpful if you want to email or chat with them or learn about their organization.
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: Microsoft Edge v.92: Navigate PDF documents using page thumbnails
Details: You will now be able to navigate through your PDF document using thumbnails representing the pages. These thumbnails will appear in the pane on the left side of the PDF reader.

Description: Microsoft Edge v. 94: Microsoft Edge moving to a 4-week cadence for updates in Beta and Stable channels
Details: Beginning with Microsoft Edge version 94, we will adopt a new, 4-week release cycle for major versions.

Description: Microsoft Edge v.94: New Extended stable option being offered.
Details: Beginning with Microsoft Edge version 94, we are offering a new Extended Stable option to our managed Enterprise customers. The Extended Stable option will stay on even numbered revisions and update every 8 weeks. There will be a biweekly security update.

Description: Microsoft Forms: Improved Forms mobile experience for Form Creation or Analysis
Details: Form designers who create forms and analyze results from Mobile will now have a much more mobile friendly experience that is optimized for their device, making Forms even easier to use.  This will be available to New forms and Existing forms in the browser and a few weeks later in the Office Mobile app.

Description: Microsoft Teams Rooms Managed Services: Room Occupancy Reports
Details: Room occupancy reports that are helpful for resources for back to work in time of COVID

Description: Microsoft Teams Rooms Managed Services: Value Reports
Details: Report on actions and value delivered by services, time saved for the customer

Description: Microsoft Teams Rooms Managed Services: Device Portfolio --  Surface Hub
Details: Support Surface Hub devices for monitoring, incident management,  app management (Connect, Whiteboard), inventory management

Description: Microsoft Teams Rooms Managed Services: Device Portfolio --  Teams Rooms (Android)
Details: Support for Android MTR (robust monitoring and incident management)

Description: Microsoft Teams Rooms Managed Services: Asset Management Workflow
Details: Support for import and export of inventory, bulk administration of inventory

Description: Excel: Support for Large Files from SharePoint in Excel for the web
Details: You can now open and edit files up to 100 MB from SharePoint in Excel for the web.
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Teams Connect support for third-party and custom tab app configuration
Details: With Microsoft Teams Connect we are making it easier to collaborate with anyone outside your organization. Developers will be able to configure their third-party or custom tab apps in context of shared channels through the Teams SDK.

Description: Universal Print: Universal Print Service General Availability for V1.0
Details: Universal Print is generally available in March 2021. This promotes the existing (Microsoft Graph) beta API surface to v1.0. ISV and IHV partners can build more confidently on a Universal Print API surface that fully supported, stable, and immutable.  Print management, printer share management, print job management, 3rd party integration, reporting and service configuration.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Approvals eSignature DocuSign integration
Details: To complement our existing Adobe Sign integration, users will now be able to choose DocuSign as their e-Sign provider when creating an eSignature request within Approvals. Admins will have the ability to turn off this connector within the Teams Admin Center.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Suggested Replies in chats
Details: Suggested replies presents users with up to three recommended responses to choose from in the context of a chat. This functionality will be enabled by default for teachers and faculty, and completely disabled for all students.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Chat supervisors can delete messages
Details: This feature, designed with our Teams for Education users in mind, allows chat supervisors to delete inappropriate, off-topic, or other messages in a Teams chat.
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: SharePoint: Editing Modern Pages in Teams Experience
Details: Edit Modern SharePoint Pages that are pinned to Teams channels & conversations.
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: Microsoft Teams: Direct app purchases and invoice billing support in Teams Admin Center
Details: Admins can complete orders for paid app licenses directly within Teams Admin Center. In addition, invoice billing is a new supported payment method.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Enable Teams users to purchase Teams apps through the Teams store
Details: Microsoft Teams users have now the ability to purchase third-party Teams app subscriptions from the Teams store.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Prompt to set Meeting Options for Large Teams Meetings in Outlook for Windows in GCC
Details: Teams users in Outlook for Windows will be prompted to set meeting options when organizing Teams meetings for 40 or more participants or 10 or more distribution lists.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Share to Teams from Outlook
Details: Share to Teams from Outlook allows you to send a copy of email messages or conversations, including attachments, into Teams chats and channels. Find the Share to Teams option in the Outlook ribbon or the action menu for an email. Share to Teams supports Outlook on the web, Outlook for Windows, and the new Outlook for Mac Preview.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Breakout Room Presenter support
Details: Extend the management of Breakout Rooms to specific presenters.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Breakout Room pre-meeting room creation and participant assignment
Details: Introducing capability for organizer to perform breakout room configuration and participant assignment before the meeting starts.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Live Transcript in unscheduled Teams meetings
Details: Now unscheduled/ad hoc Teams Meetings are supported by Live Transcript.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Live Transcript in Channels Teams Meetings
Details: Channel meetings in Teams are now supported by Live Transcript.

Description: Whiteboard: Inking improvements
Details: New improvements and capabilities have been added to the inking experience win Whiteboard for the web. Users can now: Change pen colors, change pen thickness, use highlighter, intelligently convert their ink shapes, use keyboard shortcuts to switch between tools.

Description: Microsoft Edge v.94: New policy to stop implicit sign in
Details: This new policy allows system administrators to disable implicit sign-in on Microsoft Edge browsers, starting with version 94.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Restart Live Event
Details: Previously when a producer or presenter ran a live event, they were not able to restart it even if you accidently ended it or if the event ran into an error. With this new feature, you will be able to restart your live event after you have ended it or if you have encountered a problem during it.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Music on Hold for Consult/Transfer
Details: Music on Hold for Consult/Transfer scenarios ensures that users placed on hold will hear music while consultation and transfer occurs, ensuring that the caller knows that the call is still active.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Missed Activity Email in DOD
Details: Missed activity email enables the user to stay on top of their Microsoft Teams notifications. A missed activity email is generated in case a user is away from Microsoft teams and has not reviewed their notifications. A user can choose to receive Missed activity emails by going to settings - notifications - choosing the frequency.

Description: Microsoft Teams: New default for Teams notification style
Details: Teams notification style will be defaulted to native notifications for new users. Currently the default style is Teams purple, with this change to native notifications the user will benefit from support for assist mode, action center, accessibility and more.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Left navigation updates in Teams Admin Center
Details: To make it easier to find Team's features and navigate your Teams organization, we reorganized the left navigation based on user studies and customer feedback.
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: Microsoft Teams: Teams Network planner for government clouds
Details: Network Planner can help you determine and organize network requirements for connecting Microsoft Teams users across your organization. When you provide your network details and Teams usage, the Network Planner calculates your network requirements for deploying Teams and cloud voice across your organization's physical locations.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Day view in calendar on iOS and Android.
Details: View      all meetings and events for the day to easily see when you’re available or      busy.
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: Establish official communities in Yammer
Details: Designate your most important communities as "Official" to show that they are company-endorsed within the network. (CEO Connections, Contoso News, IT Help, HR Support, LatinX Community).

Description: Microsoft Teams: Power Automate templates to be added to teams templates
Details: Team templates enable end users to create the right team with predefined channels and preinstalled apps. Select Microsoft provided team templates will include a new Power Automate tab. In the tab, you can find a variety of Power Automate flow templates that support the template type.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Reply to a specific message
