Details: When chatting in Teams, you will be able to reply a specific message. The original message will be quoted in the reply text box, helping everyone in the chat to more easily understand the message’s context. Quoted replies will be available in 1:1, Group and Meeting chats.

Description: Microsoft Teams: New assignment experience in modal window for Breakout Rooms
Details: Enhanced UX for participant assignment. This includes new capabilities such as sorting participants and rooms and performing multiple selections and assignments to rooms.

Description: Microsoft Teams Rooms Managed Services: Dynamic Signal Tickets
Details: Incident detection based on a dynamic portfolio of signals and intelligence

Description: Microsoft Teams Rooms Managed Services: Managed Firmware Updates(Additional OEMs)
Details: Support Firmware Updates to cover additional OEMs and device types

Description: Outlook for Windows: Suggested files
Details: This item is being removed from the roadmap as it is included in 68198.  By clicking in the Search box at the top of your screen, recent and relevant files will be suggested as optional results before you enter a specific query.
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: Microsoft Teams: Dual-tone multi-frequency support for VDI (Citrix only)
Details: Dual-tone       multi-frequency (DTMF)       for Teams on Citrix dial an outside number via dialer. Call is connected       but DTMF is not sent. For example, if user is trying to use Teams to join       a Teams meeting by dialing the PSTN number, the conference ID cannot be       entered.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Teams meetings LTI application for educational learning management systems (LMS)
Details: Microsoft Teams meetings LTI app helps educators and students easily incorporate Teams meetings into their Learning Management System course. Users can view past & upcoming meetings, schedule individual or recurring meetings, and join the Teams meetings related to the course all from within their LMS.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Reporter and Side-by-Side Presenter Mode in desktop or window sharing
Details: Two new presenter modes are now coming available. Reporter places content as a visual aid above your shoulder like a news story. Side-by-side displays your video feed next to your content. You can now select a mode that fits your needs and promotes a more engaging presentation and consumption experience.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Speaker Attribution in Live Transcript in Teams Meetings in GCC Clouds
Details: Teams Meetings in GCC clouds will now have live transcript utterances attributed to the speaker of the utterance.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Lower all raised hands for GCC-High and DoD
Details: Meeting organizers and presenters will see an option to lower all raised hands from the participant pane.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Live transcript in Teams meetings in additional spoken languages
Details: Meetings held in one of the supported languages now are supported by Live Transcript. We have expanded from just English (US) to include English (Canada), English (India), English (united Kingdom), English (Australia), English (New Zealand), German (Germany), Portuguese (Brazil), Dutch (Netherlands), Dutch (Belgium), French (France), Spanish (Spain), Japanese (Japan), French (Canada), Chinese (Cantonese, Traditional), Chinese (Mandarin, Simplified), Hindi (India), Italian (Italy), Korean (Korea), Spanish (Mexico), Swedish (Sweden), Polish (Poland), Arabic (United Arab Emirates), Arabic (Saudi Arabia), Danish (Denmark), Finnish (Finland), Norwegian (Norway), Russia (Russia).

Description: Microsoft Teams: Present from PowerPoint to Teams with Microsoft 365 Apps for Business license
Details: The capability of presenting your slides directly from the PowerPoint desktop apps to a meeting via PowerPoint Live in Teams is now extended to the Microsoft 365 Apps for Business license.
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: Microsoft Teams: Disable/Enable all Attendees' Video for GCC-High
Details: Ability in GCC-High to disable and enable video for all attendees before or during a Microsoft Teams meeting.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Disable/Enable a Single Attendee's Video for GCC High
Details: Ability to disable and enable a single attendee's video in a Microsoft Teams meeting.

Description: Microsoft Edge v.92: Payment instruments are now synced across devices
Details: Beginning with Microsoft Edge v. 92, you have the option to synchronize your payment information across your signed in devices.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Customize your organization's apps store in Teams for government clouds
Details: Now you can customize your organization's apps store in Teams with your company branding by adding your logo, custom backgrounds, and custom text colors to make it more inviting to end users.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Together  Mode Extensibility
Details: Build your own scenes that elevate your meeting experience. We believe that by making Together Mode extensible, creators can create immersive scenes and users can go beyond simple video conferencing. Started building your scenes by going to the Developer Portal for Microsoft Teams.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Teams Device Management in GCC-High
Details: Our customers who have tenants in the GCCH environment can also manage their Teams devices from the Teams Admin Centre. Admins can now control the entire lifecycle of their Teams devices which include an increasing variety of supported device types - IP Phones, Collaboration bars, Teams displays, Teams Meeting Room devices.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Immersive reader support for Mobile
Details: Immersive Reader, which uses proven customization techniques to support reading across ages and abilities, is coming to Teams iOS and Android apps. You can now hear posts and chat messages read aloud using Immersive Reader on the Teams mobile apps. This functionality was previously available only on the web and desktop apps.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Live Events in GCC-High, and DoD
Details: Soon, you will be able to use Live Events in GCCH and DoD for your needs.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Speed Dial for mobile
Details: Speed dial is coming to mobile devices. This feature makes your most used calling contacts easy to access with one tap dialing.
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: Microsoft Teams: Support Human Interface Devices for Windows Virtual Desktop (WVD)
Details: This feature will support use of Human Interface Devices (HID) for Teams on Windows Virtual Desktop (WVD)/Virtual Desktop Infrastructure(VDI).

Description: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Teams classes LTI application for educational learning managements systems (LMS)
Details: Microsoft Teams classes LTI app helps educators and students easily navigate between their Learning Management Systems and Teams. Users can access their class teams associated with their course directly from within their LMS. The LTI app will be available to Canvas users in July 2021 and will be available to Blackboard Learn users in August 2021.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Inline Message Translation in channels for Android
Details: Inline message translation in Channels lets users translate Channel posts and replies into their preferred language. To translate a message, press-and-hold the channel post or reply and then select “Translate”. The post/reply will be translated to your UI language by default. If you want to change the translation language, go to Settings General  Translation.

Description: Microsoft Teams: EDU tailored deployment plan in Teams Advisor
Details: EDU IT Administrators can use a tailored plan to deploy Teams to their organization

Description: Forms: New Forms Start Page in GCC, GCC-High and DoD
Details: This update replaces the existing Forms Portal page with a new Forms Start page on Office.com (Office.com - Forms). Users who access forms via Office.com will get this experience first, then users accessing forms via the Forms website will get the experience soon after.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Prevent Public Switched Telephone Network (PSTN) attendees from unmuting in meetings
Details: Presenters and Organizers can now prevent (Public Switched Telephone Network) PSTN participants from unmuting. This change also allows PSTN participants to request to speak by raising their hand in a meeting via dial-pad command (press *5).
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: Microsoft Teams: Translate slideshow content
Details: Translate the slide show content privately in a Teams meeting with PowerPoint Live

Description: Microsoft Teams: Lock a meeting from additional joins
Details: In the Teams meetings desktop app experience, organizers can choose to lock their meetings to prevent subsequent join attempts. Anyone attempting to join a lock meeting from any device will be informed that the meeting is locked.

Description: Microsoft Forms: Auditing events in Gov environments
Details: This update will enable Auditing for Forms events in Government environments.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Manage tags in Teams programmatically - Microsoft Teams Tags APIs are now in public preview
Details: This set of APIs can be used to programmatically assign users tags in a team, making tag creation and maintenance faster and easier. Tags in Teams let users quickly reach a group of people without having to @mention or type out everyone individually. Users can use tags to start a chat or by @mentioning a tag in a channel post. For more information on tag in teams, see Using tags in Teams. Using these new APIs, developers can now: create tags in a team and assign users,  get a list of tags in a team, update tags or delete tags.

Description: Microsoft Forms: File upload question is available in GCC, GCC-High, and DoD
Details: Form designers are able to add file upload questions in Microsoft Forms to collect respondents’ uploaded file in GCC, GCC-High, or DoD environment.

Description: Microsoft Teams Rooms Managed Services: Room Threat Protection (with MDE)
Details: Advanced Threat Protection of MTR devices with Microsoft Defender for Endpoints

Description: Microsoft Teams Rooms Managed Services: Vulnerability Detection
Details: Detection of vulnerabilities in MTR devices with Microsoft Defender for Endpoints

Description: Microsoft Teams Rooms Managed Services: Security Updates Management
Details: Managed deployment of security updates based on monitoring

Description: Microsoft Teams Rooms Managed Services: Custom Administrative Roles
Details: Custom roles to support different types of IT organizations and staffing

Description: Microsoft Teams Rooms Managed Services: Managed Firmware Updates (Crestron Devices)
Details: Managed firmware updates for Crestron devices

Description: Microsoft Teams Rooms Managed Services: Global Incident Detection (Outages)
Details: Detection of widespread outages affecting multiple rooms

Description: Microsoft Teams Rooms Managed Services: Managed Operating System Updates
Details: Support managed updates of the Operating System for Windows based MTR devices

Description: Microsoft Teams: Large gallery layout update on Teams mobile
Details: To provide a better experience for our Large Gallery for meetings on Teams mobile, we are introducing a mobile-optimized layout that let you swipe through all the participants in a meeting.
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: Microsoft Compliance center and Microsoft Teams: Compliance capabilities for card content generated through apps in Teams messages
Details: We are extending Microsoft 365 compliance capabilities to content generated through Teams apps.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Large Gallery for VDI
Details: Large Gallery feature will enable a Teams meeting participant to see an expanded view of the meetings gallery with 7x7 = 49 simultaneous user video streams in a Teams meeting.

Description: Outlook: Pin emails on Android and iOS
Details: Do you pin emails in Outlook on the Web? We've got your back. You can now find your pinned emails using the filter button at the top of the message list. You can pin new emails by setting up a Pin swipe action in settings, or by tapping the ... in the top right corner of the reading pane.
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Germany, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: Microsoft Teams: Teams Meetings Auto Recording
Details: This feature allows users to auto record meetings by choosing auto record option in meetings options.
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: Microsoft Teams: Security, compliance, and data protection capabilities for apps
Details: For Microsoft 365 Certified Teams apps, admins can view security, compliance, and data protection capabilities in a new tab on the app's detail page in the Teams Admin Center. This transparency gives Microsoft customers trust in the applications that run their organizations and ISVs an opportunity to showcase their hard work in becoming M365 Certified.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Teams Webinars integrate with Dynamics 365 Marketing to enable lead nurturing
Details: With this feature, webinar organizers can drive post event engagement with registrants by leveraging Dynamics 365 Marketing. The attendee engagement data syncs with Dynamics 365 Marketing org and enabled automated user journeys. This is only available for users who also have Dynamics 365 Marketing SKU.

Description: Outlook: [iOS] Send Button move in full compose
Details: We are positioning the "send" button in a more convenient place when using your thumbs to type. This will match the experience in quick reply, and we hope will also be easier to reach for users.
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: Microsoft Teams: Sharing device audio on iOS and Android
Details: Include device audio when sharing on iPhones/iPads and Android devices.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Assign the Presenter Role in Meetings for GCC - High
Details: Organizers can now assign one or more Presenters in their meetings with the "Who can present?" meeting option.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Availability of Praise for GCC
Details: GCC support for Praise.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Tasks and Task publishing for GCC
Details: GCC support for Tasks and Task Publishing.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Admins can install Apps in Meetings
Details: We will enable IT admins to select Teams apps that can be installed in meetings for their organization.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Related Content for Teams Meetings for mobile
Details: Related Content makes meetings more effective by providing customers with important information from their mailboxes, OneDrive for Business and SharePoint sites. This helps them prepare before their meetings by offering them content they haven’t had a chance to read or may want to revisit. Users can find this content on the Meeting Details page.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Approvals Templates
Details: User can simply choose a template provided by their tenant admins or a Team Owner when creating a new approval request.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Offline access for files
Details: Users can now access previously opened files even when there is no internet connectivity.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Out of Office for GCC-High and DoD
Details: Set up a message to let others know you're not working or on vacation so you're not available to reply when they send a chat message. Your out of office status will also sync with Automatic Replies that are found in your Outlook calendar.

Description: OneDrive: Android - Outline for PDF viewing
Details: Users of OneDrive for Android will be able to view an outline or table of content that they can use to navigate to.
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Germany, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: Outlook for Android:  Use your voice to initiate a phone or Teams call
Details: Start using your voice in Outlook to connect and call a specific person via their phone or Teams.

Description: Outlook for iOS: Use your voice to initiate a phone or Teams call
Details: Start using your voice in Outlook to connect and call a specific person via their phone or Teams.

Description: Microsoft Edge v.91: Support for Speech Recognition APIs
Details: Beginning with Microsoft Edge version 91, API support for speech recognition commands on Google.com and similar sites will be added.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Focus or minimize shared content in a Teams meeting for Mobile
Details: Teams mobile users now have more flexibility in how to view a meeting when content is shared, we added the ability to let phone/tablet users to minimize shared content to see people instead, or focus on content by hiding other's videos.
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: Microsoft Teams: Together Mode for VDI
Details: Together mode uses of AI segmentation technology in meetings to digitally place participants in a shared background, making it feel like you’re sitting in the same room with everyone else.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Apps in Meeting Chats with External Users
Details: We will now support apps added by native users (hosts) in meeting chats with external users (users from other domains).

Description: Excel: Search values within Data Validation dropdown list
Details: When using a Data Validation dropdown list, now you can start typing the value you're looking for, and Excel will search & suggest to auto complete it for you.
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: Microsoft Edge v.91: View Microsoft Information Protected (MIP) files across tenants
Details: Starting in Microsoft Edge v. 91, PDF files protected in other organizations, or tenants of the organization can now be viewed seamlessly within the browser.

Description: Office 365: Dictation improvements in Outlook for Mac including voice commands
Details: Dictation has new UI and settings to control a profanity filter and automatic punctuation. Voice commands make editing and formatting your dictated text easier than ever.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Teams webinar capabilities general availability
Details: Schedule and deliver 1,000 person webinars with the same Teams app you use for meetings! Webinar capabilities support registration page creation, email confirmation for registrants, host management for attendee video and audio, attendee reporting, plus interactive features like polls, chat and reactions.

Description: Microsoft 365 admin center: Improvements to Service Health Dashboard and Incident Communications
Details: Microsoft is updating the Service Health dashboard to make it quicker and easier to find out about active issues of the services. Incidents and advisories will be now be displayed directly on the landing page of the Service Health dashboard. For high impacting incidents we will continue to provide the regular updates but now in addition to those Microsoft will also provide smaller and more frequent updates intermixed with the regular updates labeled as quick updates in the details panel.
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: Word for Windows: Text Predictions
Details: Text Predictions in Word for Windows helps users write more efficiently by predicting text quickly, timely and accurately.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Speaker Attribution for Live Captions for GCC
Details: Teams Meetings in GCC clouds will now have live captions utterances attributed to the speaker of the utterance.

Description: Outlook for iOS:  Watch email complication with unread email badge count
Details: Your email complication for Outlook will include an unread email badge count on your Apple Watch with watchOS 7
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: Outlook for Android:  Use your voice to compose an email
Details: Use your voice to start to compose a message to a specific person.

Description: Outlook for iOS:  Use your voice to create a new calendar event
Details: Use your voice to create a new calendar event.

Description: SharePoint: Admin center - Migration Manager: Dropbox migrations for Government Clouds
Details: With our recent Mover acquisition, we are excited to expand our capabilities to allow moving content from Dropbox into Microsoft 365. When you’re ready to move your content, click on the Migrate tab in the SharePoint admin center to start scan discovery, assessment, and migrate. You'll get detailed reports and the rest in a seamless transition of files and folders to Microsoft 365 (OneDrive, SharePoint, and/or Teams).

Description: Microsoft Teams: Cortana now available for EDU customers
Details: Cortana voice assistance in the Teams mobile app is now available for EDU customers in en-US to help you streamline communication, collaboration, and class-related tasks in school using spoken natural language. With Cortana voice assistance, you can call someone or perform class-related tasks, you can message someone or send message to your class. Also, you can find and share files, and search or navigate within the Teams mobile app.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Virtual Breakout Rooms for DoD
Details: Meeting hosts can create breakout rooms to be used by meeting participants for smaller group discussion. They can assign participants to a room and call them back to the larger group when the breakout is complete.

Description: Office 365: Admins can choose to allow users to self-select their Office Update channel.
Details: This feature will allow an admin to enable the user to self-select the Office channel within the Office client, resulting in an immediate change on the user’s device. Starting with the February 2021 update to the Office ADMX templates there is a new policy called 'Show the option for the Office Update Channel experience'. It can be found in the 'Computer Configuration/Administrative Templates/Microsoft Office 2016 (Machine)/Miscellaneous' and 'User Configuration/Administrative Templates/Microsoft Office 2016/Miscellaneous' nodes.

Description: Outlook for iOS: Conversational AI with Cortana
Details: Ask Cortana to provide assistant to schedule meetings, compose short email messages, and find files, emails, and people that are relevant to you, all using your voice and natural language.

Description: Microsoft Teams: AI based poll question suggestion for Teams meeting
Details: When user wants to create poll for their Teams meeting, Forms intelligence service will suggest some polls based on their meeting purpose.

Description: Microsoft Teams: AI based historical poll suggestion for Teams meeting
Details: When user wants to create poll for their Teams meeting, Forms intelligence service will suggest this user's historical polls based on their meeting purpose.

Description: Outlook and Word: Dictation in Desktop and Mac now available for GCC and GCC-High Tenants
Details: Dictation is now available in Outlook and Word for both Desktop and Mac in GCC and GCC-High Tenants.

Description: Word: Dictation in Word for iOS and Word for Android now available for GCC and GCC-High Tenants
Details: Dictation is now available in Word for Android and Word for iOS in GCC and GCC-High Tenants.

Description: Outlook for iOS: Expandable new message and event buttons
Details: The button for new event and message buttons on your Calendar and Inbox hat will expand to provide quick actions that are available in Outlook. By long pressing these new buttons, you’ll have easy access to commonly needed email and calendaring capabilities.

Description: Microsoft Edge v. 90: Identify network traffic originating from App Guard containers at the proxy level
Details: Beginning with Microsoft Edge v. 90, there is a built in support to tag network traffic originating from App Guard containers allowing enterprises to identify them and apply specific policies.

Description: Microsoft Edge v. 90: Support added to optionally allow Favorites to sync from the Application Guard container to the host
Details: Starting in Microsoft Edge v. 90, customers can now optionally configure Microsoft Edge App Guard to synchronize their Favorites from the container to the host, keeping a unified list of favorites across host and container.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Forms Polls in Teams Meetings Improvements
Details: A set of top asks will be addressed with this general release. Polls in Teams Meetings now support guests and an optimized mobile experience.

Description: Microsoft Teams: AI based option suggestion for Teams meeting polls
Details: When user is creating poll for their Teams meeting, Forms intelligence service will suggest some options for their question when applies.

Description: Windows Virtual Desktop: choose the UK geography to store the Windows Virtual Desktop service metadata
Details: Windows Virtual Desktop allows customers to choose the region best suited to them for virtual machine deployment. They can now also choose to store service metadata in the geography best suited to their needs.

Description: Windows Virtual Desktop: choose the Australia geography to store the Windows Virtual Desktop service metadata
Details: Windows Virtual Desktop allows customers to choose the region best suited to them for virtual machine deployment. They can now also choose to store service metadata in the geography best suited to their needs.

Description: Windows Virtual Desktop: choose the Canada geography to store the Windows Virtual Desktop service metadata
Details: Windows Virtual Desktop allows customers to choose the region best suited to them for virtual machine deployment. They can now also choose to store service metadata in the geography best suited to their needs.

Description: SharePoint: Simplified MUI editing for multilingual communication sites
Details: This new feature allows the same user, with the right permissions, to update site navigation, site title, site description and site footer in all the languages enabled in your communication site.
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Germany, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: Outlook for iOS:  Use your voice to compose an email
Details: Use your voice to start to compose a message to a specific person.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Org wide backgrounds (Preview)
Details: Organization-wide backgrounds will now be available in preview. This feature will require an Advanced Communications license when it becomes generally available.

Description: Windows Virtual Desktop: choose the Japan geography to store the Windows Virtual Desktop service metadata
Details: Windows Virtual Desktop allows customers to choose the region best suited to them for virtual machine deployment. They can now also choose to store service metadata in the geography best suited to their needs.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Tags are available in GCC High
Details: Tags are available in GCC High. Tags in Teams let users quickly reach a group of people without having to @mention or type out everyone.

Description: Microsoft Information Protection: Data loss prevention for Microsoft Teams for DoD
Details: Data loss prevention (DLP) capabilities in Microsoft 365 government clouds will be extended to include Microsoft Teams chat and channel messages, including private channel messages. If your organization has DLP, you can now define policies that prevent people from sharing sensitive information in a Microsoft Teams channel or chat session.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Improved Experience in the Meeting Participant Roster
Details: We are now changing how the participant list is displayed in a Teams meeting for the Lobby, In meeting, Presenters, and Attendees participant sections. A maximum of 20 participants for each of the sections will be displayed in the initial view, with an option to drill in and view more participants within that section. For the lobby, you can review the full list before you admit all into the meeting. The roster will display details of most active participants in the meeting arranged in alphabetical order. There are no changes to the participants action menu.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Users can now search in meeting participants from the roster
Details: From the search box in the roster, users can now search in meeting participants. They can continue to search for participants outside the meeting and request them to join the meeting.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Spotlighting multiple Users at the same time in a meeting
Details: Organizers and presenters can now spotlight up to 7 participants simultaneously during meetings.

Description: Microsoft Forms: Correct Answer choice feature added to Microsoft Forms Poll in Teams Meetings
Details: This feature introduces the concept of a Correct Answer choice to Polls within Teams meetings. Correct answer choices can be selected on multiple choice questions only. Correct answer can be a single option, or multiple if "multiple answers" is enabled. Correct answer choice will be shown after voting in the Results card. This feature exists for: Teams Meeting polls (that pop up as a window on the screen) and Polls used within Teams Chat both inside and outside of meetings. It also will be displayed if you open these polls on your Forms site (read only mode).

Description: Microsoft Teams: Present from PowerPoint to Teams for Windows
Details: Present your slides directly from PowerPoint for Windows into a Teams meeting via PowerPoint Live in Teams.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Present from PowerPoint to Teams for Web
Details: Present your slides directly from PowerPoint for the web to a Teams meeting via PowerPoint Live in Teams.
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: Forms: Poll in teams meeting support 1k meeting/webinar
Details: For the large meeting, Forms poll will support the overall user experience and to help presenter could improve the meeting engagement.

Description: Microsoft Teams: New Teams Live Events eCDN - Ramp
Details: We will be enabling a new eCDN provider, Ramp, for live events. You will be able to use this new eCDN for your live events needs.

Description: Yammer: General Availability of AzureAD-B2B guests in Yammer communities
Details: AzureAD-B2B guest support in Yammer communities will be generally available. Invite guests to your Yammer community and facilitate rich conversations between members and guests of a Yammer community.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Supervised chat
Details: Use Teams administrative policy to ensure students are supervised by an educator during private 1:1 or group chats. With Supervised Chat, students will not be allowed to engage in chats without a supervising educator present.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Expanded Emoji Picker
Details: The expanded emoji update offers people more fun and expressiveness in Teams. It also introduces a wider range of diversity and representation. The emoji set has expanded from 85 to over 800 emojis, with a category selector, skin tone selector and short code picker.
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: Microsoft Teams: Adobe Sign Integration in Approvals App
Details: There may be times when you need something approved and recorded with more formal attestation, and adding signatures to the approval process is necessary. We’re working closely with key partners to allow you to create an electronic signature approval using Adobe Sign, DocuSign, and other 3rd party providers natively within the Approval app. Simply choose your electronic signature provider and add the details. Once submitted, signers are notified with an email and can easily review and sign. Approvals will keep track of the entire workflow right in context within Teams.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Breakout Room Timer, Room Retention, and Participant Reassignment
Details: Organizers can now set a timer for Breakout rooms from the Breakout Room settings. After timer has expired, rooms will automatically close and participants will come back to the main meeting. Room assignment retention provides the ability to persist room configuration and assignment over multiple sessions.  With participant reassignment capability, organizer will now be able to move joined participants across rooms and main meeting also when rooms are opened.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Public Preview: Teams follow Office preview
Details: Public Preview has provided IT admins with the ability to allow their users to receive preview features before they are released to the public. Coming up in June 2021, not only can users be opted-in to use Teams Public Preview, but IT admins can even configure Teams users preview state to follow Office preview state. All of this functionality will be accessible from the Teams Admin Center.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Separate Window Teams Live Events Producer Experience
Details: With this new feature, you are now able to produce your Teams Live Events as a Producer in a separate window, allowing you to effectively manage your event.

Description: Microsoft Forms: Word Cloud data insights for open text question
Details: We are introducing new data insight type--Word Cloud--to the open text question in Forms. When users have collected responses for an open text question, word cloud data insight will be available to help them get a quick view on the top text phrases people answered.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Career Coach - Microsoft Teams for Education app powered by LinkedIn
Details: Career Coach is a Microsoft Teams for Education app powered by LinkedIn that provides personalized guidance for higher education students to navigate their career journey. Career Coach offers higher education institutions a unified career solution for students to discover their career path, grow real-world skills, and build their network all in one place.
Tags - Platform: Android, Education, iOS, Web, Desktop, Mobile

Description: OneDrive: iOS - Outline for PDF viewing
Details: Users of OneDrive for iOS will be able to view an outline or table of content that they can use to navigate to.
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Germany, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: OneDrive: iOS - Jump to Page for PDF viewing
Details: Users of OneDrive for iOS will be able to move through PDF by typing the page number in Jump to Page.
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Germany, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: OneDrive: Android - Jump to Page for PDF viewing
Details: Users of OneDrive for Android will be able to move through PDF by typing the page number in Jump to Page.
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Germany, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: Outlook for iOS:  Play My Emails car mode
Details: Automatically detect when your phone is connected to your car audio system and starts Play My Emails when you use your steering wheel controls.

Description: Outlook for Windows: Suggested calendar events
Details: By clicking in the Search box at the top of your screen, events from your Outlook Calendar will be suggested as optional results before you enter a specific query.
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: Microsoft Teams: Improvements for managing attendee audio permissions in Teams Meetings
Details: Meeting presenters and organizers can manage attendee audio permissions with greater flexibility. Attendees no longer must request to speak for the organizer or presenters to allow them to unmute, and presenters and organizers can prevent individual attendees from unmuting instead of all attendees at once.
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: Exchange: Exchange Admin center
Details: The new Exchange Admin Center is a modern and a performant portal. The EAC will be available to all the customers from April, 2021. This new portal has all the functions that were available in Classic EAC portal and a lot of other value additions like T2T Migration, Automated G-Suite Migration etc. A personalized dashboard with reports and insights is also available that makes the user more productive.

Description: OneDrive: Exclude specific files from sync on macOS
Details: Admins can exclude newly added files from syncing to the cloud by file name or extension on macOS.
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Germany, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: Microsoft Teams: New manage tag experience and other enhancements
Details: Tags in Teams let users quickly reach a group of people without having to @mention or type out everyone. Tags now can be managed as a Tab and you can receive notification for tag membership changes or search for tags in Teams. Tags will also now have a description field so that you can add more details to a tag.

Description: Access: ODBC Interface Support (without ACE Redistributable Engine)
Details: If you have O365, or click-to-run versions of Access 2016/2019 Consumer installed, you will no longer need to install the ACE Redistributable to use the ACE ODBC provider.

Description: Access: DAO Interface Support (without ACE Redistributable Engine)
Details: If you have O365, or click-to-run versions of Access 2016/2019 Consumer installed, you will no longer need to install the ACE Redistributable to use the ACE DAO provider.

Description: Yammer: Change default community post to Question
Details: Community admins will be able to change the default post type for their community to be a Question.

Description: Microsoft Teams: New channel files tab for GCC, GCC-High and DoD
Details: We are rolling out the new channel files tab experience to the government clouds (GCC, GCC-High, and DoD). This upgrade brings in more than 10 new features, including different SharePoint view, ability to view metadata, sync, row/column formatting etc.

Description: Outlook on the Web:  redesigned inbox "Storage" view in Settings
Details: We are redesigning the inbox storage view in Settings, so you can easily see which files and folder are consuming your inbox storage space and manage it.
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Germany, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Advanced eDiscovery – Historical versions
Details: Now eDiscovery admins can designate specific SharePoint Online or OneDrive for Business sites to enable for historical versions functionality. This capability will enable organizations to quickly search across not only the current version of documents, but all the versions of the document.

Description: Microsoft Teams Rooms Managed Services: Partner Delegated Access, Multi--tenant Support
Details: Invitation system to allow partner access and provide partners with multi-tenant view in their portal

Description: Microsoft Search: Attachment search
Details: Include classic attachments from Outlook in search

Description: Microsoft 365 admin center: Reports in the Admin Center - Project Usage Report
Details: A new report will be made available to help customers understand how Microsoft Project is used within their organization.

Description: Microsoft Search: Custom result types in Microsoft Search
Details: New support for custom result types allows you to create result types with modern display templates with adaptive cards for SharePoint content (PDF, sites, pages and lists) for SharePoint home and sites, Office.com and Bing.com.

Description: Azure Active Directory:  Azure B2B integration with OneDrive and SharePoint
Details: The Azure B2B Integration with OneDrive and SharePoint is now generally available. This integration is currently disabled by default but can be enabled using the SharePoint Online Management Shell.  Additional changes are coming to improve the experience.

Description: OneDrive: Sync admin reports - macOS support
Details: New dashboard to check sync app versions, sync status, top sync errors on individual macOS devices and monitor deployment progress of Known Folder Move.

Description: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Detonation Details for GCC and DoD environments
Details: Detonation details will be exposed within the email entity page for malicious URLs and files which got detonated. These detonation details will contain detonation chain, summary, indicators of compromise, screenshots, and behavior details. Customers can now go through the detonation details and expand their scope of investigation.

Description: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Email entity page for GCC and DoD environments
Details: The email entity page will contain information in parity with existing email details flyout in protection.offfice.com from Threat Explorer, along with new information regarding authentication and detections, a revamped email preview capability for cloud mailbox emails, and detonation details for related files or URLs. These updates eliminate the need to traverse multiple experiences to view email details.  The Email entity page brings a new look to your email investigations, designed to provide a 360-degree view of an email.

Description: SharePoint: Display images from Microsoft Lists in Power Apps
Details: Power Apps image controls will now display images that are stored in Microsoft Lists Image columns. They can be displayed in four sizes: small, medium, large, or full.
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Germany, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: OneDrive and SharePoint for Business: Library Dropdown
Details: We're adding a dropdown that allows you to easily switch between multiple document libraries associated with a Team or Site.
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: Microsoft Search: Azure Cognitive Search results in Microsoft Search
Details: Azure Cognitive Search federation with Microsoft Search provides a cohesive search experience with Azure Cognitive Search to intelligently help business search user find, learn, operate, and navigate information enriched and indexed with Azure Cognitive Search.

Description: Microsoft Lists: Export Microsoft Lists to Excel
Details: Export Microsoft Lists to Excel, to work with the data in a spreadsheet. You'll now have the option to open the list as an Excel Workbook or CSV file - giving you the ability to analyze your data in Excel no matter your OS platform - Windows or macOS.
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Germany, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Advanced Audit - Search term events in Exchange Online and SharePoint Online for DoD
Details: Addition of Advanced Audit events that provide information on when and what a user searched for in Exchange Online and SharePoint Online.

Description: Microsoft Information Protection: Microsoft 365 Endpoint data loss prevention (DLP) for GCC
Details: Currently available in public preview, Endpoint DLP extends the activity monitoring and protection capabilities of DLP to sensitive items that are on Windows 10 devices. Once devices are onboarded into device management, the information about what users are doing with sensitive items is made visible in activity explorer and you can enforce protective actions on those items via DLP policies.

Description: Microsoft Information Protection: Microsoft 365 Endpoint data loss prevention (DLP) for GCC-H and DoD
Details: Currently available in public preview, Endpoint DLP extends the activity monitoring and protection capabilities of DLP to sensitive items that are on Windows 10 devices. Once devices are onboarded into device management, the information about what users are doing with sensitive items is made visible in activity explorer and you can enforce protective actions on those items via DLP policies.

Description: Microsoft Information Protection: Exact Data Match to support Customer Managed Key
Details: Customers will be able to encrypt Exact Data Match (EDM) data using their own Customer Managed Key (CMK), further enhancing EDM data security. EDM content that is encrypted using the CMK includes the data file schemas, rule packages, and the salts, which are used in hashing the sensitive data being protected.
Tags - Product: Microsoft Information Protection, Microsoft Compliance center

Description: Microsoft Search: Query variable support on Keyword Query Language (KQL)
Details: Profile attributes can be used as Query variables on Keyword Query Language (KQL). This will be resolved for both SharePoint and Graph connector verticals.

Description: Microsoft 365 admin center: Allow Non-Admin User to Install Language Access Packs
Details: This new group policy, AllowNonAdminUserInstallLAPs, setting controls whether users can install language accessory packs for Office even if they don’t have local administrator permissions on their devices. By default, Office users must have local administrator permissions on their devices to install language accessory packs.  This policy will be applicable to the following products: Outlook, Word, Excel, PowerPoint and OneNote.
Tags - Product: Outlook, Excel, OneNote, PowerPoint, Word, Microsoft 365 Admin Center

Description: Outlook: Meetings online by default
Details: Whether you’re working from home or meeting with people in other locations, all your meetings will automatically be online so everyone can attend. This setting can be disabled by users from Outlook, or by admins from PowerShell. In its initial release, only Teams and Skype will be supported, and 3rd party online meeting add-ins will not be included.
Tags - Release phase: General Availability, Current Channel, Current Channel (Preview)
Tags - Platform: Android, Mac, iOS, Web, Desktop, Mobile
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Germany, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: Microsoft 365 admin center: Reports in the Admin Center – user information pseudonymized by default
Details: User level information contained in Microsoft 365 reports in the Admin center will be pseudonymized by default. Global administrators can revert this change for their tenant, which will be an audited event. When user identification is enabled, administrative roles and the report reader role will be able to see identifiable user level information. Global reader and Usage Summary Reports Reader roles will not have access to identifiable user information, regardless of the setting chosen.
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: SharePoint Syntex: Automatically set sensitivity labels in document understanding models.
Details: You can now tag documents automatically with MIP sensitivity labels in document understanding models.
Tags - Release phase: General Availability, Targeted Release, Targeted Release (Entire Organization), Targeted Release (Select People)

Description: SharePoint Syntex: Use regular expressions to match patterns for extracting metadata in document understanding models.
Details: You can now use regular expressions (RegEx) in explanations, allowing model trainers to provide more complex metadata extractor and recognition patterns. This addition includes a set of regex explanation templates that can be used or edited like the other templates.
Tags - Release phase: General Availability, Targeted Release, Targeted Release (Entire Organization), Targeted Release (Select People)

Description: SharePoint: Page details updates
Details: This update to the page details panel will allow page authors to delete a page and change the page's URL.
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Germany, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: Bookings: Toggle available for preview experience
Details: Bookings will preview its new experience and making it accessible with a toggle for customers to enable "the new Bookings". Customers who enable the preview experience will have the option to toggle back and forth whenever they need to.

Description: Microsoft Project: Book resources to manage resource availability
Details: Avoid over-scheduling resources by using bookings to ensure a resource’s time is effectively allocated within their availability.

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: New DLP alert management dashboard for gov clouds
Details: A new data loss prevention (DLP) alert management experience within the Microsoft 365 compliance center will enable admins to review, investigate, and manage DLP policy match events, related content, and associated metadata, as well as edit alert configuration options as a part of the DLP policy authoring experience. The dashboard shows alerts for DLP policies that are enforced on these workloads: Exchange, SharePoint, OneDrive, Teams, and Devices.

Description: Microsoft Search: Search box changes for guest users in OneDrive, SharePoint, and Lists.
Details: The search box for guest users will move to the top of the screen across OneDrive, SharePoint, and Lists apps, similar to how it appears for regular users.
Tags - Release phase: General Availability, Targeted Release (Entire Organization), Targeted Release (Select People)

Description: SharePoint: Email notification settings
Details: With this feature, users can unsubscribe or re-subscribe to their favorite SharePoint email notifications. Their preference will be respected for these email notifications.
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Germany, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: Outlook: Intelligent Translation
Details: Translation is coming to Outlook Desktop for GCC and GCC-H customers.

Description: SharePoint: Updates for Microsoft Teams connected team sites
Details: Every Microsoft Teams      team is connected to a SharePoint team site. If you create a private      channel, it gets a unique team site. You will see specific updates,      including updates to site features, site permissions alignment, site      classifications and sensitivity labels, and improvements to the user      interface.
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Germany, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: Exchange: Scheduler for Microsoft 365
Details: Scheduler is a service that enables a digital assistant to schedule your meetings through email.
Tags - Platform: Android, Mac, iOS, Web, Desktop, Mobile

Description: Outlook: Floor Plans for workspace booking in mobile devices
Details: Add floor plans to your reserved workspaces so users can easily see where a workspace is located. To add floor plans, in the Microsoft 365 admin center, go to Answers, and then select Floor plans.

Description: Outlook: Dictate emails on iPhone and iPad
Details: Use speech-to-text to dictate email messages, available starting in EN-US.

Description: Microsoft Teams and PowerPoint: Annotation support in PowerPoint Live in Teams and Slideshow
Details: We are introducing virtual laser pointer and ink annotations so presenters can engage more with their audience by drawing attention or clarifying certain sections of the PowerPoint deck. Just as you would use a physical laser point in a room, PowerPoint Live allows you to effectively point at different places in the presentation so the audience can easily follow along what’s on the slide.

Description: Outlook: Update on how feedback is submitted
Details: We are updating how and where feedback is submitted inside Outlook. Feedback can still be submitted from inside Outlook, but you will notice changes in the submission process.

Description: Microsoft Information Protection: Exact Data Match to support Auto-labeling
Details: Organizations will be able to configure new or existing Auto-labeling policies using Exact Data Match (EDM) Sensitive Information Types (SITs), enabling more fine-grained control over which sensitive content gets labeled.

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Communication Compliance Sensitive information types per location report
Details: Review and export the sensitive information types detected in all your Microsoft 365 and non-Microsoft communication channels currently scoped into your Communication Compliance policies.

Description: Microsoft Viva: Topic management dashboard
Details: You can track the stats over time for topics through the lifecycle of suggested, confirmed, published, and removed with the new visual topic management dashboard.
Tags - Release phase: General Availability, Targeted Release, Targeted Release (Entire Organization), Targeted Release (Select People)

Description: Office app: Improvements to help configure Automatic Deployment Rules for Microsoft 365 Apps updates published to the Microsoft Update Catalog
Details: With this change, IT admins that use Automatic Deployment Rules in Configuration Manager to deploy updates for Microsoft 365 Apps, including 2019 and 2021 volume license products, will be able to use the Title property within the search criteria of the ADR definition to easily find the desired update and not have to continually update the search criteria with each update release.
Tags - Release phase: Current Channel, Current Channel (Preview), Semi-Annual Enterprise Channel (Preview), Semi-Annual Enterprise Channel

Description: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Expanded limits for protected users within anti-phishing policies.
Details: We're expanding the limits for protected users in the anti-phishing policy to allow 350 users. This means you will be able to specify more users to be protected. This protection will continue to prevent the specified internal or external email addresses from being impersonated as message senders.

Description: Microsoft Forms: Shorten URL in response link
Details: Enable Forms Short URL in Gov and DoD environment.

Description: SharePoint: Integration of Power Automate and Power Apps for DoD tenants
Details: Power Automate and Power Apps will be available for SharePoint DoD customers. Users can automate common tasks, customize forms, create apps from lists, and use the Power Apps web part.

Description: Microsoft Information Protection: Exact Data Match to support Customer Managed Key
Details: Customers will be able to encrypt Exact Data Match (EDM) data using their own Customer Managed Key (CMK), further enhancing EDM data security. EDM content that is encrypted using the CMK includes the data file schemas, rule packages, and the salts, which are used in hashing the sensitive data being protected.
Tags - Product: Microsoft Information Protection, Microsoft Compliance center

Description: Microsoft 365 Admin Center: Microsoft Browser Usage Action Flow
Details: The Microsoft browser usage report shows which browsers people use to access Microsoft 365. New functionality is being added to enable global administrators to create messages to notify their users who are still using Microsoft 365 services on Internet Explorer, which will be unsupported from August 17, 2021. This targeted message is designed to help users learn more about Microsoft Edge and the provided link contain information on easy steps to follow to switch browsers. This is available for US tenants only.

Description: Outlook: New languages for suggested replies in web and mobile
Details: We are adding support for suggested replies in Czech, Swedish, and Chinese (traditional) in Outlook on the web and mobile.

Description: OneDrive and SharePoint for Business: Immersive Reader support in OneDrive and SharePoint
Details: Users can now open Word files directly into Immersive Reader from inside OneDrive and SharePoint.

Description: SharePoint and OneDrive for Business: Share dialog : adding Link settings to the quick permissions
Details: We are making link settings more discoverable by adding it to the quick permissions inside the OneDrive Share Dialog.
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Retention for Teams
Details: Admins will be able to apply retention and deletion policies to Teams chats and conversations.

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Ability to delete a record label
Details: With the update, you will be able to delete unused record labels within the Microsoft 365 Records Management solution.

Description: SharePoint: Microsoft Lists – Updated sharing experience
Details: Create unique sharing links for lists based on who and how you wish to share them, while adhering to any sharing settings per established IT and governance planning and policies.
Tags - Cloud instance: DoD, GCC, Germany, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant), GCC High

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Communication Compliance discrimination classifier
Details: The Discrimination classifier aims to detect and triage explicit discriminatory language.

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Communication Compliance cross tenant classifier feedback
Details: Cross tenant feedback enables customers to provide feedback on messages that were misclassified (such as false positives) by a Communication Compliance policy leveraging any of the classifiers.

Description: Yammer and SharePoint for Business: Yammer Conversations Web Part V3
Details: We are introducing 3 new configurations to the Yammer Conversations SharePoint Web Part: new horizontal layout, new filter option to show only Questions or All Conversations, and a new configuration option to show or hide the Yammer publisher.

Description: Yammer, Microsoft Teams and Microsoft Stream: Yammer Encoded Events powered by Microsoft Teams
Details: Today in Yammer the video stream and production in a Live Event is powered by Stream. With this feature, all Live Events (production and the video stream itself, within Yammer) will be powered by Microsoft Teams.
Tags - Platform: Android, Mac, iOS, Web, Desktop, Mobile

Description: Microsoft Viva: Select sensitivity label to exclude sites from topic discovery
Details: Use Microsoft Information Protection (MIP) sensitivity labels to control which sites should not be included in topic discovery.

Description: Microsoft Compliance center: Additional third-party data connectors (Veritas)
Details: Use data connectors to import and archive third-party data from social media platforms, instant messaging platforms, document collaboration platforms and more, to mailboxes in your Microsoft 365 organization where you can then apply various Microsoft 365 compliance solutions to the imported data. This helps you ensure that your organization's non-Microsoft data is in compliance with the regulations and standards that affect your organization. There are more additional connectors to come from Veritas (formerly Globanet). Now available in public preview.

Description: Microsoft Planner: Recurring tasks
Details: Configure your tasks to occur on a regular cadence in Planner.

Description: Microsoft Compliance center: Information governance - Retention policies for Yammer
Details: This update enables organizations to apply retention policies on Yammer messages.

Description: OneDrive: Sync client support for Apple Silicon
Details: We will be updating OneDrive for Mac to be a universal app that will run natively on Macs with M1.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Viva: Exclude content from topic discovery based off applied sensitivity labels
Details: Use Microsoft Information Protection (MIP) sensitivity labels to control which files should not be included in topic discovery.

Description: Microsoft Viva: Use Syntex taxonomy to generate topics
Details: Select terms from the taxonomy service to initiate creation of Viva topics, using the term definitions and tagged files.

Description: OneDrive: Files On-Demand refresh for macOS
Details: We’ve revamped the OneDrive sync experience in macOS based on Apple’s new File Provider platform to improve the Finder experience for OneDrive. We are updating the Files On-Demand experience to a more native look and feel, for the latest version of macOS. This item is currently available in Preview.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: SharePoint: Migration Manager content discovery
Details: Before you move any file or folder from on-premises into Microsoft 365, you need to discover content and plan for the migration. The Migration Manager, from within the SharePoint admin center, will provide content discovery so admins can best understand what content they have, decide what to migrate and what to remediate.

Description: Microsoft 365 admin center: Priority Accounts Exchange Online Monitoring
Details: Exchange Online Monitoring in Microsoft 365 admin center’s Service Health Dashboard is updated with Priority Account Monitoring in addition to organization level monitoring.

Description: SharePoint: Admin center - Migration Manager: Egnyte migrations
Details: With our recent Mover acquisition, we are excited to expand our capabilities to allow moving content from Egnyte into Microsoft 365. When you’re ready to move your content, click on the Migrate tab in the SharePoint admin center to start scan discovery, assessment, and migrate. You'll get detailed reports and the rest in a seamless transition of files and folders to Microsoft 365 (OneDrive, SharePoint, and/or Teams).

Description: Microsoft Cloud App Security: Cloud Access Security Broker for GCC
Details: The Microsoft Cloud App Security (MCAS) offering for GCC is built on the Microsoft Azure Government Cloud and is designed to inter-operate with the Microsoft 365 GCC environment. Microsoft Cloud App Security is a Cloud Access Security Broker (CASB) that secures SaaS and multi-cloud solutions. It provides rich visibility, control over data travel, and sophisticated analytics to identify and combat cyberthreats across all your cloud services.

Description: Microsoft Viva: Updates to multi-geo support
Details: We can process content that is in all regions and query from all regions. We support region moves. We keep the data in the corresponding regions according to data sovereignty.

Description: Microsoft Viva: Integrate Microsoft Search bookmarks with topic cards and pages
Details: Many organizations have already used bookmarks in search results to direct users to authoritative content for query results.  With this new feature, you'll be able to integrate the search bookmarks into topic cards and pages - allowing users to continue to find those sources augmented with the topical content on the page or card.

Description: Outlook and Exchange: Project Moca moving to Outlook board
Details: With the recent launch of Outlook calendar board, we are moving all spaces created in Project Moca to the new calendar board. With this move, all Project Moca data will be moved into the board view in Outlook on the web.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Apps in Assignments
Details: Educators and students rely on a variety of tools to support learning. With this new feature, educators can include links to content from other learning and resource tools directly into a Teams assignment.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Whiteboard integration with Assignments
Details: Digital whiteboards give educators and students a canvas to spark creativity and collaboration. Now, educators can include a Whiteboard as reference material or the content type of a Teams assignment.

Description: Microsoft Stream: Variable playback speed (0.5-2x) for Microsoft Teams meeting recordings
Details: For Teams meeting recordings saved to OneDrive & SharePoint you'll now be able to change the playback speed (0.5x - 2x) while watching the video.
Tags - Product: SharePoint, Microsoft Teams, Microsoft Stream, OneDrive

Description: OneDrive for Business: Progressive Web App (PWA)
Details: You can now install the web version of OneDrive for Business as a Progressive Web App (PWA) in Microsoft Edge, Google Chrome, Firefox, or other browser that supports Progressive Web Apps. After you install the web version of OneDrive for Business as a Progressive Web App, you can launch it from your desktop, and it will work the same way as it does in your web browser.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Germany, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Viva: Accelerated publishing for topic curation
Details: Edits on topics or new, manually added topics will appear in Manage Topics view and for end users to discover within minutes.

Description: Microsoft Viva: Control visibility of suggested topics
Details: This update will empower knowledge managers to enable or prevent general visibility of AI-suggested topics.

Description: Whiteboard: Web Templates
Details: Participants in Teams and on Whiteboard for the Web can add a variety of built-in templates for meetings, workshops, decision making, planning, design thinking and more.

Description: Whiteboard: User Experience
Details: Participants in Teams and on Whiteboard for the web will see a new, refreshed user experience.

Description: Microsoft Stream: Updated Web player for video & audio files in SharePoint, Teams, Yammer, and OneDrive
Details: The web player for audio and video files that are stored in OneDrive and SharePoint (including when those files are embedded in Teams, Yammer, and SharePoint), is updated with a new user look and feel, and adheres to greater levels of accessibility for keyboard navigation and screen readers.

Description: Microsoft Lists: Support for Progressive Web App (PWA)
Details: You can now install the web version of Microsoft Lists as a Progressive Web App (PWA) in Microsoft Edge, Google Chrome, Firefox or other browser that supports Progressive Web Apps. After you install the web version of Microsoft Lists as a Progressive Web App, it will work similarly to any stand-alone desktop application.
Tags - Release phase: General Availability, Targeted Release, Targeted Release (Entire Organization)
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Germany, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Viva: Refinements to related sites displayed on topic pages
Details: Differentiate between sites that have been pinned by a person, and those that have been suggested for the Topic.

Description: Outlook: Play My Emails available in more countries
Details: Play My Emails in Outlook for iOS and Android can be used by any English speaker worldwide.

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: New Permissions management page
Details: We’re adding a new Permissions page within the Microsoft 365 compliance center. Admins will be able to use this new page to view and assign user roles and create and modify custom role groups - activities currently managed within the legacy Office 365 Security & Compliance Center.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Group Assignments
Details: With the new group assignment feature you can organize your students into groups so they can work together to create, collaborate and submit the same work - like a Whiteboard file or Word document. Each student in the group gets the credit and recognition for having turned in their work.

Description: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Admin review and feedback
Details: Responding to reports about phishing or junk emails from end users can be very time consuming. With the new admin review feature, your security team will be able to quickly review reported messages and choose appropriate responses, automatically sending predefined but customizable emails to your end users. Coupled with automated investigation & response (AIR), you’ll be able to free up time for more critical work.

Description: Outlook and Exchange: Microsoft Outlook browser extension for Edge
Details: The Microsoft Outlook browser extension brings you the power of mail, calendar, contacts, and tasks using an icon in Microsoft Edge. Quickly access your Outlook work account or your Outlook.com or Hotmail account without switching to another tab or app. The extension will be available in the Chrome Store soon as well.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Germany, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Search: Find a meeting recording based on what was said
Details: For a Teams meeting that was recorded to OneDrive & SharePoint and was also transcribed live during the meeting you can now search in Microsoft Search to find the meeting recording file based on the transcript.
Tags - Product: SharePoint, Microsoft Teams, Microsoft Stream, OneDrive, Microsoft Search

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Communication Compliance now support 7 languages for the Threat, Targeted Harassment and Profanities classifiers
Details: Communication Compliance can now detect threat, targeted harassment, and profanities in the following languages: English, French, Spanish, German, Portuguese, Italian, Japanese, and Chinese.

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Data loss prevention (DLP) data surfaced in Activity Explorer
Details: DLP-related data sets which currently flow into Microsoft 365 Audit logs will now also surface within Activity Explorer under an activity called ‘DLP rule matched’.

Description: Microsoft Viva and Outlook: Briefing email support for Italian and Portuguese
Details: This personalized, actionable briefing email from Microsoft Viva, automatically delivered to your Outlook inbox to help you start the day on track and stay on top of tasks, will support Italian, and Portuguese.
Tags - Platform: Android, Mac, iOS, Web, Desktop, Mobile

Description: PowerApps and Power Automate: Power Platform admin center cross-tenant analytics
Details: Admins can view out-of-box reports covering app usage, maker activity, and inventory of canvas and model driven apps at tenant and environment level.

Description: PowerApps: Power Platform performance and diagnostics monitoring with Azure Application Insights
Details: Enables organizations using model-driven apps and Microsoft Data verse to monitor, diagnose, and troubleshoot errors and performance issues for Unified Interface form-loads, plug-ins, and platform API calls based off Data verse telemetry made available in customer's own instance of Azure Application Insights.

Description: PowerApps and Power Automate: Power Platform admin center Data Export to Azure Data Lake Services
Details: Enables organizations to build custom inventory reports and analytical views by enabling export of usage and inventory data for canvas and model-driven apps into customers’ own instance of Azure Data Lake.

Description: Microsoft Project: Rollups and Dropdowns in Custom Fields
Details: Rollup your numerical custom field values in your summary tasks & add custom fields with dropdown options in Project for the web.

Description: SharePoint: New experience to add an app
Details: You can extend the working experience with out-of-the-box SharePoint Framework web parts and extensions in SharePoint Online as normally but using a brand-new modernized store.

Description: Microsoft Search: Sync your non-Azure Active Directory users and groups to support search permissions
Details: Microsoft Graph connectors for Microsoft Search now supports syncing of non-Azure Active Directory users/groups from your external data source with your Azure Active Directory users/groups so that your end users can see search results permissioned to them.
Tags - Product: Microsoft 365 Admin Center, Office 365, Microsoft Search

Description: Microsoft Stream: Block downloads for channel meeting recordings saved to SharePoint
Details: There is a new admin setting for channel meeting recordings saved to SharePoint that determines if the recordings are saved to the channel in the "Recordings" folder (as they are today) or to a "Recordings\View only" folder. The new option for the "View only" folder will restrict the editing and download of the channel meeting recordings by team & channel members. Only team & channel owners will have full control over the files with this new option.

Description: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Investigation updates for improved email threats and actions
Details: We have new updates and improvements to the Automated Investigation and Response (AIR) playbooks to better capture the state of the emails and entities that are being investigated. This results in more accurate threat data and actions - which are better for security operations workflows.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Germany, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Teams: Distribute Assignments to more students: from 200 to 300
Details: With this update educators will be able to distribute assignments to up to 300 students.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Live Transcription with speaker attribution (for additional SKUs)
Details: Live transcripts provide another way to follow along with what has been said and who said it. After a meeting, the transcript file is automatically saved in the chat tab for that meeting. We are now expanding this feature to Office 365 E1, Office 365 A1, Office 365/Microsoft 365 A3, Office 365/Microsoft 365 A5, Microsoft 365 F1, Office 365/Microsoft 365 F3, Microsoft 365 Business Basic SKUs.

Description: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: First contact safety tip
Details: First contact safety tips notify recipients the first time they get a message from a sender or if they don't often get messages from the sender. This capability adds an extra layer of security protection against potential impersonation attacks. Previously the first contact safety tip was available via PowerShell cmdlet, and with this release will now be available for configuration in the anti-phishing policy.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Germany, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: SharePoint: admin center - Migration Manager: Google migrations
Details: With our recent Mover acquisition, we are excited to expand our capabilities to allow moving content from Google into Microsoft 365. When you’re ready to move your content, click on the Migrate tab in the SharePoint admin center to start scan discovery, assessment, and migrate. You'll get detailed reports and the rest in a seamless transition of files and folders to Microsoft 365 (OneDrive, SharePoint, and/or Teams).

Description: SharePoint: ddmin center - Migration Manager: Dropbox migrations
Details: With our recent Mover acquisition, we are excited to expand our capabilities to allow moving content from Dropbox into Microsoft 365. When you’re ready to move your content, click on the Migrate tab in the SharePoint admin center to start scan discovery, assessment, and migrate. You'll get detailed reports and the rest in a seamless transition of files and folders to Microsoft 365 (OneDrive, SharePoint, and/or Teams). This will be a Public Preview.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Lens integration with Assignments
Details: With the Lens integration into Assignments, students will be able to directly include images of their physical work as part of submitting their assignment. In addition, students will be able to crop and rotate their work to help with educator readability.

Description: Microsoft Cloud App Security: App governance add-on to Microsoft Cloud App Security
Details: App governance add-on feature to Microsoft Cloud App Security is a security and policy management capability that customers can use to monitor and govern app behaviors and quickly identify, alert, and protect from risky behaviors with data, users, and apps. App governance is designed for OAuth-enabled apps that access Microsoft 365 data via Microsoft Graph API.
Tags - Product: Microsoft Cloud App Security, Microsoft Compliance center

Description: OneDrive: Known Folder Move for macOS
Details: You’ll be able to roll out Known Folder Move (KFM) for your macOS users and redirect their Desktop,       Documents and Pictures folders to OneDrive.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Information Protection: Granular conditional access policies via “Sensitivity Labels” for SharePoint Online sites
Details: Admins will have the ability to use Azure AD conditional access policies to trigger multi-factor authentication (MFA), device and location policies on a specific SharePoint site collection based by simply attaching CA policies to a label.

Description: Microsoft Compliance center: Information Governance: Optimized behavior of deleted files with multiple versions in SharePoint
Details: SharePoint Online items with multiple versions and a retention label now move to the Preservation Hold Library as a single file containing all versions when deleted.

Description: SharePoint: Migrate SharePoint 2010 and 2013 workflows to Power Automate
Details: Provide Microsoft 365 customers with a tool to migrate SharePoint-based workflows to Power Automate. You will be able to migrate SharePoint 2010 (out-of-the-box) workflows and SharePoint 2013 (SharePoint Designer) workflows to Power Automate flows. Initially this will be implemented via PowerShell, and in future it will be more integrated into the SharePoint Migration Tool (SPMT).
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Information Protection: Named entities sensitive information types (SITs) and policy authoring templates
Details: Named entities are sensitive information types (SITs) that can’t easily be identified by a regular expression or a function; these include person names, physical addresses, and medical terms & conditions. This update adds 52 new SITs representing named entities and 10 enhanced policy templates that can be used in solutions such as Data Loss Prevention (DLP) and auto-labeling, and cover important regulations, such as US Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act (HIPAA) and European Union (EU) General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

Description: Microsoft Defender for Identity: Native "response" actions
Details: From this release SecOps will have the ability to directly lock the Active Directory account, or to prompt for the password to be reset, meaning more direct action can be taken when a user is compromised. Up until now, when a user is confirmed as compromised in Microsoft Defender for Identity, it's the Azure Active Directory account that is effected via a conditional access rule.

Description: Microsoft 365 Compliance center: Data purge capabilities for Microsoft Teams content
Details: Extend data purge functionality to Microsoft Teams content to facilitate purge of sensitive or misplaced data.

Description: Whiteboard: Whiteboard on Windows revamped
Details: Microsoft Whiteboard provides a freeform intelligent canvas where teams can ideate, create, and collaborate visually via the cloud. The new Whiteboard app for Windows addresses key customer asks around offering a uniform & seamless experience with Whiteboard on other clients & platforms. It also provides highly requested features such as the ability to add shapes & adopts a user-centric approach by focusing on marquee features such as ability to insert templates, images, sticky notes, text boxes & stickers thus, keeping the interface lean & the user experience simple yet effective.

Description: Microsoft Project: Guest users in Project for the web
Details: Item is being removed as a duplicate of 91686. Add guest users & assign tasks to them. Guest users can view projects shared with them.
