Description: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Email summary panel
Details: We’re making it easier for security teams to see the full picture of emails. We launched a single, integrated view with the email entity page, and now we’re making it easier to see this information in multiple experiences. This feature release targets more consistency, and easier navigation, saving time and effort for the customers.

Description: SharePoint: Applied filters in Microsoft Lists
Details: As you apply and adjust filters to narrow or expand what appears in the current view, you'll now see which filters have been applied and you can remove them without going back into the column filter pane - you will now do this at the top-left portion of the list.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Germany, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: SharePoint: Drag and drop row reorder in Microsoft Lists
Details: You will now be able to reorder rows in Microsoft Lists. Just click the row you want to move, and then drag it to where you'd like it to appear in your list grid view.

Description: Outlook: Play Conversation with Cortana in Outlook for iOS
Details: Play My Emails in Outlook for iOS now supports playing single conversations. Simply scroll through your inbox, open a message, and select Play Conversation from the More (...) menu at the top of your screen. Cortana will read the conversation and then give you options to reply, archive, and delete.

Description: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Quarantine integration for user and admin submissions
Details: With this change we’re giving admins the ability to allow senders for a specified period of time, right from the quarantine workflow. When releasing emails to end users, admins can now opt to remember this decision by creating an entry in the tenant allow/block list that corresponds to the indicator of compromise aligned with the message in question. Admins can now choose to allow or prevent users from submitting messages to Microsoft for analysis.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Enhancements to quarantine message preview
Details: We’re changing the way users preview quarantined messages to provide additional security against embedded threats.  With this change some components in quarantined messages will be distorted and not displayed by default. To see the full contents of the message, users can choose to reveal the full message.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Viva: User opt-in as suggested experts
Details: To meet some customer governance and privacy standards, we now allow users to control being displayed as potentially associated with the topic. For these circumstances, you’ll be able to empower users to opt-in to be added to topic pages and cards.

Description: Microsoft Information Protection: Co-authoring on encrypted documents
Details: Multiple authors can edit labeled and protected documents in Word, Excel, and PowerPoint simultaneously, frictionlessly, and with auto-save, as if they were regular documents.

Description: Microsoft 365 admin center: Graph connectors intelligent discovery experiences
Details: The content recommendation experience in Office.com (Recommended, Recent, and Shared) are now surfacing content from select Graph connectors. These connectors include the Microsoft-built File share connector and connectors from a few other software vendors.

Description: Microsoft Compliance center: Information Governance: Retention label deletion behavior change in SharePoint
Details: Improved consistency of user experience between OneDrive and SharePoint, allowing users to “delete” files labeled with a retention label configured to “retain items for a specific period” as this operation is no longer blocked with an error message. When deleted, these files will still be preserved for compliance purposes by moving a copy of them to the “Preservation Hold Library” of the site where they can be accessed by eDiscovery and other compliance solutions.

Description: Outlook: Support for Online Archive in the New Outlook for Mac
Details: If an Online Archive is enabled, administrators and users can set up their mailbox to automatically move old messages to the Online Archive using Archive Policies.
Tags - Release phase: General Availability, Current Channel, Current Channel (Preview)

Description: SharePoint: New SharePoint site Usage reports for Government clouds
Details: We are making additional SharePoint Site Usage reports available in Government clouds. The reports include "time spent report", "popular platforms", "news page analytics" and "ability to download site usage data to excel".

Description: Microsoft Project: Add Checklist to tasks
Details: Add checklist items to your tasks & mark them complete as you finish your work.

Description: SharePoint: Document Library 'View in File Explorer' support in Microsoft Edge
Details: With this change, you can enable the View in File Explorer capability on SharePoint Online. For this experience to be visible and work for your users, you will need to enable a Microsoft Edge policy "Configure the View in File Explorer feature for SharePoint pages in Microsoft Edge" and update your SharePoint Online tenant configuration.

Description: SharePoint: Microsoft List creation from Office.com
Details: Now you will be able to create a Microsoft Lists list directly from Office.com. Click the 'Create new' 'plus sign' button and select "List." You'll see the same create list experience as you see from the Lists home page, in SharePoint and when using the Lists app in Teams.

Description: Microsoft Information Protection: Exact Data Match to support Auto-labeling (client-side)
Details: Organizations will be able to configure new or existing client-side Auto-labeling policies using Exact Data Match (EDM) Sensitive Information Types (SITs), enabling more fine-grained control over which sensitive content gets labeled.

Description: Microsoft Search: Back to school with Microsoft Search in Bing
Details: New back to school features in Microsoft Search in Bing for EDU add capabilities to help students and educators discover classes, assignments, and more. Powered by Microsoft Search and integrated with Microsoft Teams, Microsoft Search in Bing EDU features are designed to help students and educators make the most of their time.

Description: Whiteboard: Whiteboard on iOS revamped
Details: Microsoft Whiteboard provides a freeform intelligent canvas where teams can ideate, create, and collaborate visually via the cloud. The new Whiteboard app for iOS addresses key customer asks around improved app performance. It also provides highly requested features such as the ability to add shapes & inking with palm rejection & Apple scribble functionality on iPads. The New iOS App adopts a user-centric approach by focusing on marquee features such as ability to insert templates, images, sticky notes, text boxes & stickers thus, keeping the interface lean & the user experience simple yet effective.

Description: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Redirecting users to Microsoft 365 Defender
Details: We will begin automatically redirecting users accessing the security-related capabilities in the Office 365 Security and Compliance center (protection.office.com), to Microsoft 365 Defender (https://security.microsoft.com). These include capabilities in the Threat Management section and the Threat Management dashboard and reports. Items in the Office 365 Security and Compliance Center that are not related to security are not redirected to Microsoft 365 Defender. Customers are able to turn off automatic redirection.
Tags - Product: Security and Compliance center, Microsoft Defender for Office 365

Description: Microsoft Project: Critical Path
Details: Highlight the tasks that affect your project's finish date on the Timeline view in Project for the web.

Description: Microsoft Information Protection: Automatic labeling using trainable classifiers in Office apps for Windows and Web
Details: Within Microsoft Information Protection, you can create sensitivity labels and corresponding automatic or recommended labeling policies in Office apps for Windows and Office Online apps using the following built-in classifiers: Resume, Source code, Threat, Harassment, Profanity.

Description: SharePoint: Updates to options for disabling subsite creation
Details: This new update will improve the options for subsite creation settings in the SharePoint admin center.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Germany, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Stream: Viewing the transcript for a Microsoft Teams meeting recording
Details: For Teams meeting recordings saved to OneDrive & SharePoint that were recorded with Teams Live Transcript, you'll now be able to view the transcript from that meeting directly in the transcript pane next to the video player.

Description: SharePoint Syntex: Collect related layouts in a single form processing model
Details: We’re updating our experience to support collections (a named group of documents sharing a similar layout – a new feature in preview allowing one to compose several models into a single one) and extractable table item data.

Description: SharePoint Syntex: Tenant-wide model publishing and discovery
Details: We’re now enabling models to be published more broadly – to a site or whole tenant. This makes them available for viewing and selection directly from the document library. You’ll also be able to evaluate several models against your content to aid in selecting the most appropriate one.

Description: SharePoint Syntex: Content Center site template for non-licensed users
Details: The Content Center is a new site template that provides the creation and management interface for SharePoint Syntex document understanding models. To increase awareness of these product capabilities and the time to train and evaluate a model’s effectiveness with your own content, we’re enabling this site template to all licensed SharePoint tenants.   Users without a Syntex license will be able to build and test models in the Content Center but will not be able to publish models for live usage.

Description: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: DomainKeys Identified Mail (DKIM) support for Advanced Delivery
Details: We're adding support for DomainKeys Identified Mail (DKIM) domains to our advanced delivery feature, enabling administrators to use DKIM domains in addition to sending domains to configure their third-party phishing simulations.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: SharePoint: Ability to remove the title region gradient
Details: We are adding a new toggle for the title region that allows page authors to remove or add a gradient to the title region.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Germany, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Compliance center: Information governance - Retention policies for Microsoft Teams for private channels
Details: This update enables organizations to apply an organization-wide retention policy on Teams private channel messages.
Tags - Product: Microsoft Information Protection, Microsoft Compliance center
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Information Protection: Co-authoring on MIP encrypted documents
Details: Multiple authors can edit labeled and protected documents in Word, Excel, and PowerPoint simultaneously, frictionless, and with auto-save, as if they were regular documents.

Description: Microsoft Compliance center: Core eDiscovery and Advanced eDiscovery - Legal hold for Teams private channel
Details: Legal Hold for Teams will now support Private Channel Messages.

Description: Microsoft Compliance center: Additional third-party data connectors (17a-4 LLC and CellTrust)
Details: Use data connectors to import and archive third-party data from social media platforms, instant messaging platforms, document collaboration platforms and more, to mailboxes in your Microsoft 365 organization where you can then apply various Microsoft 365 compliance solutions to the imported data. This helps you ensure that your organization's non-Microsoft data is in compliance with the regulations and standards that affect your organization. This release includes data connectors from 17a-4 LLC and CellTrust.

Description: Microsoft Information Protection: Enhanced simulations and location support for auto-labeling in SharePoint Online and OneDrive for Business
Details: Auto-labeling in SharePoint Online and OneDrive for Business has been updated with improved performance and ability to configure more locations. The configuration limit of 10 locations in a policy has been removed. Any new simulation will run more efficiently, with results greatly sped up from days to hours.

Description: Bookings: Microsoft Bookings for Frontline Workers
Details: Microsoft Bookings will be available for frontline workers with F1 and F3 licenses.

Description: Microsoft Information Protection: Exact Data Match to support Auto-labeling (client-side)
Details: Organizations will be able to configure new or existing client-side Auto-labeling policies using Exact Data Match (EDM) Sensitive Information Types (SITs), enabling more fine-grained control over which sensitive content gets labeled.

Description: Microsoft Search: Single word acronyms in Microsoft Search in Bing
Details: Microsoft Search in Bing Web and Work vertical will be able to look for the meanings of acronyms just by typing the acronym without any patterns like 'what is', 'meaning of', 'define' etc.

Description: SharePoint: Tenant setting to disable the creation of new SharePoint 2013 workflows
Details: SharePoint tenant admins and global admins may disable the creation of new SharePoint 2013 workflows in their tenant by using a new parameter in the Set-SPOTenant PowerShell command.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Germany, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Outlook: Suggested Reply Language Support Added
Details: Outlook on the web and Outlook for iOS and Android are extending support for suggested replies. New languages include Korean, Russian, Hungarian, Arabic, Hebrew.

Description: Forms: Correct Answer choice in Teams Meeting Forms Polls for GCC
Details: This new feature introduces Correct Answer choices to Polls within Teams meetings and will roll out across Microsoft Teams Desktop, Mobile and Web. The new update will make poll creation, as frictionless as possible and gives presenters control of their meeting experience.

Description: OneDrive: Universal Print integration with OneDrive web for work or school
Details: This feature allows users to print directly to their organization's printers from OneDrive web for work or school.

Description: Microsoft Defender for Identity: New guide to configure security for internal organization identities and devices
Details: Microsoft Defender for Identity provides a central location where admins can identify, detect, and investigate on-premises identity-based threats. In this step-by-step guide you'll verify that you’ve satisfied all environment prerequisites, create a Defender for Identity instance, connect to Active Directory, and install your sensor. When you’re done, your users' identities will be monitored, and immediate action can be taken against any malicious activity that attempts to compromise your organization’s on-premises identities.
Tags - Product: Windows, Azure Active Directory, Microsoft Defender for Identity

Description: Microsoft Compliance center: Communication Compliance policy cloning and consumption visibility
Details: New policy cloning feature helps you easily create similar policies for different audiences but with the same conditions for instance. The new policy consumption visibility will help you manage policies within your tenant.

Description: Microsoft Compliance center: Communication Compliance analyze linked content from OneDrive and SharePoint online (modern attachments)
Details: Communication compliance policies that detect violations in Microsoft Teams will now analyze the content of documents shared in chat for potential policy match. Currently available in public preview.

Description: Microsoft Information Protection: Power BI sensitivity label data in Activity Explorer (preview)
Details: Power BI will now send sensitivity label activity data to Activity Explorer for admins to search and review along with the rest of the Microsoft Information Protection (MIP), Azure Information Protection (AIP), and Data Loss Prevention (DLP) data sets from native Office apps and other cloud resources.
Tags - Product: Microsoft Information Protection, Microsoft Compliance center

Description: Microsoft Compliance center: Insider Risk Management supports native triggers for Azure Active Directory account deletion
Details: Automatically detect user account deletion in Azure Active Directory for your organization to start scoring for risk indicators in the Data theft by departing users policy template. Insider Risk Management in Microsoft 365 correlates various signals from the chip to the cloud to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, security and policy violations, and more. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to ensure user-level privacy.

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Insider risk management - Enhancements to Security Policy Violation template
Details: Leverage risky browsing activity on known hacking, malware, keylogger, and other risky websites to identify security policy violations by insiders. Insider Risk Management in Microsoft 365 correlates various signals from the chip to the cloud to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, security and policy violations, and more. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to ensure user-level privacy.

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Insider risk management - Enhancements to Sequence detector
Details: Sequence detector will include new Sequences that start with activity on the device, as well as additional obfuscation and exfiltration coverage. Insider Risk Management in Microsoft 365 correlates various signals from the chip to the cloud to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, security and policy violations, and more. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to ensure user-level privacy.

Description: Office 365: Copy Education Insights Premium
Details: The Software updates page gives admins and business decision makers a high-level overview of the software update status for Office devices in the organization. Future iterations of the page will include more products from the Microsoft 365 suite. The Data Lake utilized for Education Insights Premium, which stores external data from Student Information Systems (SIS), School Data Sync (SDS), and M365 Activity Data, can now be shared and copied to the customer's own Azure Data Lake. This allows a customer to leverage all the data meant for Insights Premium for their own data exploration, Artificial Intelligence (AI), and Machine Learning (ML) purposes.

Description: Yammer: New Administrator Role in Azure Active Directory (AAD)
Details: A new role is being added to Azure Active Directory titled, "Yammer Administrator". Users who are assigned the Yammer Administrator role will be allowed to manage all aspects of the Yammer service.

Description: Power BI: Emissions Impact Dashboard for Microsoft 365
Details: The Emissions Impact Dashboard for Microsoft 365 is a Power BI template app that allows Microsoft 365 admins to view the greenhouse gas emissions associated with their organization's usage of Microsoft 365 applications. The dashboard is available in preview and includes emissions associated with Exchange Online, SharePoint Online, OneDrive for Business, and Microsoft Teams.

Description: Microsoft 365 Admin Center: Teams app usage report
Details: We are introducing a new Teams app usage report to help you track app usage metrics over time.

Description: Microsoft Project: Charts view
Details: Visually assess the progress of your work through chart view.

Description: OneDrive: Quick Access – pin and reorder shared libraries
Details: Improved ways to manage the list of places you've recently accessed or opened a file from. You can pin these places so you can easily and predictably get back to what you’ve been working on.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Intune: Enroll iOS devices into Azure AD Shared device mode
Details: Shared device mode for iOS is an Azure Active Directory (AAD) capability supported by apps that allows you to initiate a global app sign in/ sign-out by any supported applications.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Search: History suggestions on Microsoft Search in Bing
Details: Enterprise users will now get their historical searches as suggestions in the autosuggest pane on Bing and Microsoft Search in Bing.

Description: SharePoint: Security- Granular conditional access policies
Details: Continuing our investment in sensitivity labels by adding more policy controls, like my favorite one – granular Conditional Access. For example, the Top-Secret label, can now have a conditional access policy that requires multi-factor authentication when accessing a site.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: SharePoint: Security- Data access governance
Details: Expanding our insights story to help you easily see what matters most in your organization. With our new Data Access Governance insights, you can monitor sharing activity to detect oversharing. You can review and monitor sites based on the type of sharing. You can quickly see essential information about the sites like sensitivity, level of access from unmanaged devices or if the site can be shared externally.
Tags - Release phase: General Availability, Preview, Targeted Release (Entire Organization)
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: OneDrive: Sync client support for ARM on Windows
Details: The OneDrive sync client will run natively on ARM on Windows.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Germany, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Insider Risk Management analytics for Government clouds
Details: The Microsoft 365 Insider Risk Management solution will provide aggregated and anonymized analytics to help identify potential insider risk activity within the organization. This is currently available in public preview.

Description: OneDrive: Organize -add to OneDrive shortcuts
Details: Now you can organize your 'Add to OneDrive' folder shortcuts the way you want by moving them into any private folder you create in your OneDrive.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: SharePoint: New content scenarios for My Feed Web Part on SharePoint
Details: The New content types are added to My Feed Web Part on SharePoint. The new contents are Suggested Tasks, People Highlights, Meetings out of routine and files shared in groups.

Description: Microsoft Viva: Enabling Delay Delivery Plan in Outlook to Microsoft Viva Insights licensed users
Details: To empower people with personal insights and recommendations in the flow of work to build better work habits, we are enabling Delay Delivery plan in Outlook to Microsoft Viva Insights licensed users in addition to the users with MyAnalytics (Full) service plan and Microsoft 365 E5 licensed users. (E5 is not required for Viva Insights licensed users.) Microsoft Viva Insights will show you suggestions for scheduling email deliveries that align with the recipient’s working hours in their respective time zones. The delay helps minimize disruptions to recipients outside their working hours.

Description: Microsoft 365 admin center: Viva Insights usage report
Details: This usage report will help IT admins understand the number of daily enabled and active users for Viva Insights.

Description: Microsoft Lists: Packaging list templates with Power Platform and rules
Details: We’re pleased to announce new capabilities for custom list templates. As you design and define custom list templates, you can now program in Power Platform app experiences and Lists rules to be pre-created for use when a new list gets created. Note, you will continue to be able to manage which templates are available to which people, based on their job role - for both custom list templates and Microsoft-provided templates.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: SharePoint: Microsoft 365 connected templates
Details: We are combining the best of Microsoft Teams templates with SharePoint site templates - into the same flow of creation. When we create a new team using a default template - for example the "Manage a Project" template, the project management channels and apps, and the connected SharePoint template gets applied automatically. Critically, the pages, lists, and Power Platform integrations are pinned as tabs in Teams automatically, and best of all these pages and lists are fully editable right in Teams.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: SharePoint: Create from the SharePoint app bar
Details: Now you 'll be able to start creating sites, files, and lists as an action from within the SharePoint app bar. This means, no matter where you are in SharePoint you can jump right into the content creation process and stay in the flow of work.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Viva: Viva Topics - Updates to Topic Card
Details: Improvements to topic card to expand long descriptions, show job titles for people and interactions with Live Persona Card.

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Teams data in Content Explorer
Details: With the availability of Teams data in Content Explorer, customers will be able to display Sensitive information and Sensitivity labels detected on Teams data within the Content explorer.

Description: Yammer: Communities Expiry Autorenewal
Details: Yammer activity is now included in activity-based automatic renewal of Microsoft 365 Groups. When a user has viewed a post within a Yammer community, the community will automatically renew group expiration.

Description: Office app: Create Videos on Office mobile app
Details: With this latest update, you can create short video clips, edit, and share with the people in your network.

Description: Microsoft Lists: Improved lookup fields
Details: Create lookup fields in modern list UI - no settings page required! This means you can program a list item (column) to 'lookup' another set of data of pre-populated, managed choices.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Lists: Share and comment icons appear for Grid view in edit mode
Details: People will now see icons for sharing and commenting while hovering over an item in Grid edit mode, bringing to parity the same functionality when in Grid view.

Description: SharePoint: Improvements to the Text Web Part toolbar for SharePoint Pages and News
Details: Authors of SharePoint Pages and News will be able to access all simple text editing tools from the Text toolbar.
Tags - Release phase: Targeted Release (Entire Organization), Targeted Release (Select People)

Description: Microsoft Compliance center: Ability to export Insider Risk Management alerts
Details: Insider risk management alert information is exportable to security information and event management (SIEM) services via the Office 365 Management Activity API schema. Insider Risk Management in Microsoft 365 correlates various signals from the chip to the cloud to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, security and policy violations, and more. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to ensure user-level privacy.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Intune: Manage and protect devices running Android Open-Source Project (AOSP)
Details: Manage and protect devices that are running on Android Open-Source Project (AOSP) operating system. Configure single or multiuser devices with conditional access compliance.

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Insider risk management - Triage and investigation improvements
Details: Enhancements including historical insight for Exchange Online, ingest triggering events into Activity explorer. Insider Risk Management in Microsoft 365 correlates various signals from the chip to the cloud to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, security and policy violations, and more. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to ensure user-level privacy.

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Insider risk management - Policy customization enhancements
Details: Ability to fine-tune policies to trigger on precise exfiltration events. Insider Risk Management in Microsoft 365 correlates various signals from the chip to the cloud to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, security and policy violations, and more. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to ensure user-level privacy.

Description: Microsoft 365 admin center: Software updates information
Details: The Software updates page gives admins and business owners a high-level overview of the software update status for Office devices in the org.

Description: Office 365: View an infinite list of your content
Details: On Office.com, don't be limited by the number of files in your most recently used list. Use infinite scroll to see all the things on which you’ve been working - going infinitely back in time.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Office 365: Browse by people and meetings
Details: Office.com has new filters for meetings and people. The people view is great if you know who shared a file with you, but don’t recall the name of the file or where it was saved. And when you browse by meetings, you see a history of your meetings and all the related content.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Azure Active Directory: Continuous Access Evaluation (CAE)
Details: CAE (Continuous Access Evaluation) provides enhanced security and resilience by issuing long-lived tokens and being able to revoke user access in real-time when risk is introduced, such as when the user is terminated, or the user moves to an untrusted location.
Tags - Platform: Android, Mac, iOS, Web, Desktop, Mobile

Description: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Updates to the Mailflow Status Report
Details: We're introducing a new look for the mailflow status report, as we update existing reports to the latest and greatest. You can expect all of the same great information in an easier to use layout.

Description: SharePoint: Improvements to the authoring experience in SharePoint Pages
Details: We’re making changes to the editing experience for SharePoint pages. This change will make it easier for users to understand where they are in a page by adding labels to each content area. These changes also reduce clutter by consolidating web part editing actions into a single toolbar and placing authors into focus mode by default to remove visual distractions while editing.
Tags - Release phase: General Availability, Targeted Release (Entire Organization), Targeted Release (Select People)
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Updates to Threat Explorer and Real-time Detections
Details: We are working towards updating the user experience for Threat Explorer and Real-time detections. As part of this update, we will introduce enhancements like All Email view by Default for Explorer, toggling between chart or grid view, single click data export and more. There is no change in functionality when it comes to core experiences like filtering, export, and this is an update to the user experience.

Description: Microsoft 365 admin center: Send users Edge adoption emails
Details: We'll be adding a feature titled "Get fast, secure browsing with Microsoft Edge", on the Setup page in the Microsoft 365 admin center. This feature will let admins send a promotional email to encourage the adoption of Microsoft Edge. It will also provide the option to include instructions to turn on security and performance features in Microsoft Edge.

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Insider risk management - Integration with Microsoft Sentinel
Details: New integration with Microsoft Sentinel provides the flexibility to collect, detect, and investigate insider risk activities within Microsoft Sentinel. This native connector allows for seamless import of alerts, which provides analysts with a single pane of glass to review alerts for insider risk in a broader organizational context. Insider Risk Management in Microsoft 365 correlates various signals from the chip to the cloud to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, security and policy violations, and more. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to ensure user-level privacy.

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Insider risk management - Exfiltration signals from macOS
Details: Endpoint exfiltration signals for Office, PDF, and CSV files from macOS endpoints. Insider Risk Management in Microsoft 365 correlates various signals from the chip to the cloud to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, security and policy violations, and more. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to ensure user-level privacy. This is available as an opt-in preview.

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Insider risk management - Healthcare connector and policy template
Details: New healthcare policy template with built-in indicators that leverages data from Epic and other electronic medical records (EMR) solutions – using our Data Connectors - to help healthcare companies identify potential insider risks related to patient data misuse. Insider Risk Management in Microsoft 365 correlates various signals from the chip to the cloud to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, security and policy violations, and more. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to ensure user-level privacy.

Description: SharePoint: SharePoint pages and news authoring in Microsoft Teams
Details: Create SharePoint pages and news as tabs in Teams, without leaving the Teams app. This includes the ability to create a pages, to This includes the ability to create a page or news post.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Office 365: New create experience
Details: Office.com 'Create' is your place for beginning something new. You can start from a template or by the type of content. The new Create goes beyond common Office files; you can start a Form, a list, or post for Yammer. You can create files using templates, even company-branded templates.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: SharePoint: SharePoint admin center- Manage Teams and channel connected team sites
Details: With growing adoption of Teams and Channels we heard your feedback to simplify management of Teams and Channel connected sites. So now, when you go to a teams-connected site in SharePoint admin center, you see all corresponding channel sites and can ensure that right optional security policies are inherited from the parent site.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: SharePoint: SharePoint admin center- Tenant rename
Details: You'll be able to change the SharePoint domain name for your organization in Microsoft 365. For example, if the name of your organization changes from "Contoso" to "Fabrikam," you can change contoso.sharepoint.com to fabrikam.sharepoint.com.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: SharePoint: SharePoint admin center - updated homepage dashboard for sovereign clouds
Details: When you first land in the SharePoint admin center, we want it to be both familiar and useful at a glance. The idea is to provide a familiar experience, taking a similar design approach as the Microsoft admin center. You'll see more and more cards and graphs appear over time so you can see insights on files, usage security, recommendations, training and so on. Better see what's happening, and then take the appropriate action.

Description: Microsoft Viva: SharePoint Integration
Details: The Knowledge Admin provides a site URL for where the Learning Service can create an empty centralized location - Learning App Content Repository - in the form of a structured SharePoint List. This list can be used by the organization to house links to cross-company SharePoint folders containing learning content. Admins are responsible for collecting and curating a list of URLs for folders. These folders should only include content that can be made available in the Learning app.

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Built-in filters in Activity explorer
Details: We are releasing built-in filters for use within Activity explorer to allow easy access to the most used filters.

Description: OneDrive and Microsoft Stream: Sharing Links that block download for most video and audio files
Details: Users can choose to share most video and audio files with a sharing link that will prevent recipients from being able to download the file. Recipients can still view the file via the web player experiences.

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Insider risk management - Native triggers (New signals, indicator selection, customization, Activity explorer)
Details: You can choose to assign selected indicators as triggering events for a policy. This flexibility and customization help scope the policy to only the activities covered by the indicators. Also, you can customize thresholds for each triggering event. Insider Risk Management in Microsoft 365 correlates various signals from the chip to the cloud to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, security, and policy violations, and more. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to ensure user-level privacy.

Description: Microsoft 365 Admin Center: Teams app usage report for GCC High and DoD
Details: This feature is cancelled as a result of customer feedback. We are introducing a new Teams app usage report to help you track app usage metrics over time.

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Communication Compliance analyze linked content from OneDrive and SharePoint online (Government clouds)
Details: Communication Compliance policies that detect violations in Microsoft Teams will now analyze the content of documents shared in chat for potential policy match. Communication Compliance helps organizations detect explicit code of conduct and regulatory compliance violations, such as harassing or threatening language, sharing of adult content, and inappropriate sharing of sensitive information. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are explicitly opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to ensure user-level privacy.

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Communication Compliance integration with Power Automate
Details: Currently in public preview, Communication Compliance integration with Power Automate allows organizations to configure Power Automate flows to automate tasks for Communication Compliance cases and users. Communication Compliance helps organizations detect explicit code of conduct and regulatory compliance violations, such as harassing or threatening language, sharing of adult content, and inappropriate sharing of sensitive information. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are explicitly opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to ensure user-level privacy.

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Communication Compliance integration with Power Automate for GCC High and DoD
Details: Communication Compliance integration with Power Automate allows organizations to configure Power Automate flows to automate tasks for Communication Compliance cases and users. Communication Compliance helps organizations detect explicit code of conduct and regulatory compliance violations, such as harassing or threatening language, sharing of adult content, and inappropriate sharing of sensitive information. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are explicitly opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to ensure user-level privacy.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Teams devices dashboard for device analytics providing health and usage metrics
Details: Health and usage insights surfaced on a dashboard for Teams devices being managed through the Teams admin center including the ability to export and auto share the insights and set alerts on key metrics to be  notified when attention is required.

Description: OneDrive: Sharing experience  -  Manage Access settings
Details: We will be updating the "Manage Access" experience which will offer you additional controls for how recipients access files you’ve shared. "Shared with" list would be an entry point to Manage Access settings.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Germany, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Teams: Live Captions in all available languages on Teams Meetings on Web
Details: Live Captions in all available languages are now available for web users of Teams Meetings.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Paging on Video Gallery for Web
Details: When you are in gallery view, and there are more videos than what can be shown at once on the meeting stage (the maximum number can vary depending on your device configuration and internet bandwidth), navigation controls and will appear below the Video Gallery to see additional videos of the attendees. You can use these controls to view more video participants.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Teams: Teams device management in DoD
Details: Tenants in the DoD environment can also manage their Teams devices from the Teams admin center. Admins can now control the entire lifecycle of their Teams devices which include an increasing variety of supported device types - IP Phones, Collaboration bars, Teams displays, Teams Meeting Room devices.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Multi-Window support for Teams for VDI for Citrix
Details: Users on virtual desktop infrastructure (VDI)  will be able to view meetings and calls in separate windows from the main Microsoft Teams client. Additionally, meeting and call controls such as mute, video, chat, leave and others will now be located at the top of the meeting window so that they are always available and never block the underlying content.

Description: Microsoft 365 Admin Center: Teams device usage report and Graph API data source change for GCC High and DoD
Details: We are changing the data source of the Teams device usage report and Graph API to align with the Microsoft Teams Admin Center and including additional data validation to provide you with a better report experience.

Description: OneDrive: Sharing experience  - Share menu dropdown
Details: We’re updating the Share menu to provide easy access to additional sharing options like Email, Copy link, Teams chat as well as Manage access settings.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Germany, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft 365 Admin Center: Teams device usage report and Graph API data source change
Details: We are changing the data source of the Teams device usage report & Graph API to align with the Microsoft Teams Admin Center and including additional data validation to provide you with a better report experience.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Live Transcript in all available languages in Teams Meetings on Web
Details: Live Transcript is now available in all available languages for web users of Teams Meetings.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Share the system audio from meetings on web
Details: Users in a Teams meeting on web can now share audio while screen sharing.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Call control with bluetooth headsets and speakerphones
Details: Use device buttons to control call (answer, end, hold) from Bluetooth audio devices without needing a USB dongle when connected to a Windows PC running Teams desktop client. For many headsets and speakerphones, this will work without requiring any user action to enable other than pairing the headset or speakerphone with the PC. Watch our certification page for additional information coming soon about devices tested to meet all certification criteria with native Bluetooth connections (w/o a USB dongle).

Description: Microsoft Teams: User request flows for blocked apps
Details: Enable users to discover Teams apps in the store and request approval from administrators.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Teams: Integrated CART captioning in meetings on Web
Details: Users will now be able to view captions coming from a CART provider (real-time captioning) within the Microsoft Teams meeting on Chrome and Edge. Meeting organizers and participants will be able to ask their captioning providers to stream captions to Microsoft Teams.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Up to 25K members per team in DoD
Details: You can now add up to 25,000 members per team in DoD.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Chat Bubbles during Teams meetings for Microsoft Teams Rooms on Android
Details: Ability to view chats sent during a Teams meeting on the front of room display in a Teams Room, calling attention to the chat conversation happening alongside the meeting.

Description: Microsoft 365 Admin Center: Teams team usage report and Graph API
Details: We are introducing a new Teams team usage report and Graph API to help you track Teams team usage metrics over time.

Description: Microsoft 365 Admin Center: Teams user activity report and Graph API data source change
Details: We are changing the data source of the Teams user activity report and Graph API to align with the Microsoft Teams Admin Center and including additional data validation to provide you with a better report experience.

Description: Microsoft 365 Admin Center: Teams user activity per user graph API
Details: This feature is cancelled as a result of customer feedback. We are introducing a new Teams user activity per user Graph API to help you track Teams usage per user over time.

Description: Microsoft Stream: Generate captions and transcripts for a video uploaded to SharePoint and OneDrive
Details: Users with edit permissions to a video file uploaded to SharePoint and OneDrive can click a button in the player to generate closed captions and a transcript in English.

Description: Excel: Refresh Power Query data from the current workbook
Details: You can refresh Power Query queries that their data was imported from the current workbook.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Intune: Enhancements to AAD Shared Device Mode multi-user support on Android Enterprise dedicated devices
Details: Use apps on multi-user shared devices that don’t have native support for AAD Shared Device Mode. Uses Android OS capability to clear local storage of specified apps upon sign-out.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Teams: Auto-Expiration of Meeting Recordings stored on OneDrive and SharePoint
Details: Newly created Teams meeting recordings in OneDrive and SharePoint will be automatically deleted by the service based on a default Teams policy setting. Teams Admins will be able to modify the default meeting recording expiration time via a setting in the Teams Admin Portal or by modifying policy attributes using Powershell scripts. Newly created meeting recordings in OneDrive & SharePoint will be automatically deleted after this point unless the meeting owner extends the expiration.  Meeting owners will be notified about expired recordings and may extend the expiration date in OneDrive/SharePoint. Compliance policies will override the expiration setting.  This item was incorrectly marked rolling-out and is now corrected.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Germany, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Teams: RTMP-In for Teams Live Events
Details: Produce your Teams Live Events using an external encoder  and leverage RTMP-in to broadcast to your Teams Live Event Attendees.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Visio: Grids and Snap to Grids in Visio for the web
Details: Align your shapes visually using grids and choose to snap them to the grids.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Teams: Breakout Room pre-meeting room creation and participant assignment for GCC-High
Details: Introducing capability for organizer to perform breakout room configuration and participant assignment before the meeting starts.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Breakout Room pre-meeting room creation and participant assignment for DoD
Details: Introducing capability for organizer to perform breakout room configuration and participant assignment before the meeting starts.

Description: Microsoft To Do: iOS and Android apps available for GCC moderate users
Details: GCC customers will be able to sign into the Microsoft To Do iOS and Android apps using their GCC accounts.

Description: Microsoft Stream: Add or Edit captions and transcript for a video in SharePoint or OneDrive
Details: You can upload, download, and delete captions in the Web VTT file format for a video in SharePoint or OneDrive. This will enable you to edit transcript  files generated by Teams live transcript or Stream via downloading the file, editing in a text or VTT editor, and re-uploading it. The VTT file will be displayed as captions inside the video player and as a transcript in the transcript pane next to the video.
Tags - Release phase: General Availability, Targeted Release (Entire Organization), Targeted Release (Select People)

Description: Microsoft Forms: New Polling App "Polls" in Teams meeting and chat
Details: Based on learnings from early feedback, we have made the decision to make additional changes before we proceed with the rollout. We have updated the rollout timeline. Thank you for your patience. Polling is one of the key capabilities in Microsoft Teams. Microsoft Forms is focused on providing the best polling experience to our customers; therefore, Forms will release a more discoverable app named "Polls" in Teams. Adding polls to your Teams chats/meetings via this new “Polls” app will be the same experience as before (via the Forms app), but now it’s under a new app name and Teams-branded icon.

Description: Microsoft Information Protection: New conditions for auto-labeling in Exchange Online (Gov clouds)
Details: An auto-labeling policy can now apply a label to Exchange Online email based on sender, recipient, subject, or header matches without requiring a scan for sensitive content.

Description: Microsoft Information Protection: Enhanced simulations and location support for auto-labeling in SharePoint Online and OneDrive for Business (Government Clouds)
Details: Auto-labeling in SharePoint Online and OneDrive for Business has been updated with improved performance and ability to configure more locations. The configuration limit of 10 locations in a policy has been removed. Any new simulation will run more efficiently, with results greatly sped up from days to hours.

Description: Outlook: Time sensitive Emails in Play My Emails (PME)
Details: Play My Emails in Outlook mobile will now identify potential time sensitive and important emails to you and read them before the rest of your inbox.

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Outlook client support for records management
Details: When a message has a record label, Outlook will natively block corresponding edit and delete operations.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Visio: Commenting in your Visio for the web files to tag someone for feedback
Details: This capability makes it easier to collaborate on shared diagrams by giving you the ability to get someone’s attention directly within the comments pane. If you are @mentioned in a Visio file, you’ll receive an email notification and link, pointing you to the place in the diagram where your input is needed.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft 365 admin center: Service usage for Message Center Posts
Details: Message center posts will include monthly active users specific to the Microsoft 365 service change being communicated.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Sensitivity labels for Teams templates
Details: Sensitivity labels will be supported when creating teams with templates.

Description: Microsoft Graph: Resource-specific consent (RSC) permission for chat and meetings
Details: Using Resource-specific consent (RSC) you can give an app access to a single chat or meeting. Authorized users in chat and meeting can grant these permissions without admin consent.

Description: OneDrive and SharePoint: Improved Move or Copy user experience
Details: We're refreshing the Move/Copy user experience in OneDrive and SharePoint to make it easier for you to choose where to move or copy your files and folders.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Germany, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: OneDrive: Sharing experience  -  Copy link
Details: Instead of a Copy link button, you’ll see a footer where you can set permissions for the link and then copy it to share it with recipients
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Outlook: Rich AutoReply Toolbar for Android
Details: Users will now be able to format the text in their autoreplies. Options include bold/italics/underline, numbered/unnumbered lists, font style and links.

Description: Outlook: Rich Event Description ToolBar
Details: Users will now be able to format the text in their event descriptions. Options include bold/italics/underline, numbered/unnumbered lists, font style and links.

Description: Microsoft Edge v.95: Publish and update extensions to the Microsoft Edge Add-ons store using API's
Details: Once available, you can integrate these API's directly into your continuous integration, continuous delivery (CI/CD) pipeline, and publish extension package updates to the Microsoft Edge Add-on store without using the partner center.

Description: Microsoft Edge v.95: Control-flow Enforcement Technology (CET)
Details: Microsoft Edge will begin supporting an even safer browsing mode that uses hardware-dependent control flow for browser processes on supported hardware (Intel 11th Gen. or AMD Zen 3). You can disable CET by manipulating Image File Execution Options (IFEO) using group policy.

Description: Yammer: Community Header in Yammer Embed Feed
Details: Previously, embedded community feeds did not surface the community name, description, or ability to join. In an effort to give users more context and ability to engage deeper with the feeds, we are adding the community name, description, and ability to join/leave at the top of the community feeds by default. When clicked, the community name will take users to the community page in Yammer.

Description: Microsoft Edge v.95: Free form highlighting on PDFs
Details: Starting in Microsoft Edge version 95, the PDF viewing and markup experience will be improved with the addition of freeform highlighters. This will allow you to highlight sections on PDFs that you may not have access to comment on as well as scanned documents.

Description: Microsoft Edge v.94: Notification from web apps show as coming from the Progressive Web Apps (PWA)
Details: Beginning with Microsoft Edge version 94, notifications from progressive web applications PWAs will no longer show as coming from Microsoft Edge, but rather will display the name of the web app instead.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Breakout Room Presenter support for GCC-High
Details: Extend the management of Breakout Rooms to specific presenters.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Breakout Room Presenter support for DoD
Details: Extend the management of Breakout Rooms to specific presenters.

Description: Microsoft Edge v.97: Launch PWA instead of browser with URL links
Details: Starting in Microsoft Edge version 97, you can opt into launching the browser in a PWA rather than the full native browser.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Hot Desking on Teams Display
Details: Hot desking on Teams display allows employees to quickly locate and reserve temporary workspaces to touch down and make calls, set up ad-hoc meetings, or sign in to access their personalized Teams experience. Hot desking can be reserved in advance through Teams and Outlook, or right from the device if they’re already in the office.

Description: Outlook: Updates to support and feedback in-app
Details: New separate voice-driven experiences for submitting customer feedback and requesting customer support.

Description: Exchange and Office 365: Mailbox forwarding to start using Sender Rewriting Scheme (SRS)
Details: Messages forwarded using SMTP or mailbox forwarding are currently rewritten to come from the forwarding mailbox. This will be changed to the Sender Rewriting Scheme (SRS) method to consolidate the rewriting behavior for all forwarded or relayed messages in the Exchange Online. This may result in changes to behavior or disruptions to forwarding. The main change is that forwarded messages will no longer be rewritten went sent to customers' on-premises servers.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Updates to spam reporting
Details: We're working on creating consistent reporting experiences for customers, and as a result we're deprecating the standalone spam detections report. A new Spam detections report view will now be available in the Threat Protection Status report.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Localization of end user spam notifications
Details: We're making it easier to send end user spam notifications to users in multiple languages. Instead of Admins choosing the specific language for quarantine notifications, spam notifications will be sent by default in the language assigned to the user's mailbox.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Priority account filtering for quarantine
Details: We're including the priority account tag in the quarantine experience, allowing admins to prioritize their focus on the organization's most targeted and most visible users.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft 365 admin center: Organization scenarios for Exchange Online Monitoring
Details: Exchange Online Monitoring in Microsoft 365 admin center’s Service Health Dashboard is updated with two new scenarios for organization level monitoring: App connectivity, and Open Outlook on the web.

Description: SharePoint: SharePoint site template admin controls in PowerShell
Details: PowerShell cmdlets that allow Microsoft-provided SharePoint site templates to be displayed or hidden in the site template gallery in your tenant.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: SharePoint: Navigation Switcher
Details: With the new Nav Switcher feature, users can easily customize their team site by changing navigation's orientation and visibility to achieve different look and feel, layouts, and alignment styles.
Tags - Release phase: General Availability, Targeted Release (Entire Organization), Targeted Release (Select People)

Description: OneDrive: New information architecture on iOS
Details: To make it easier to discover options, OneDrive on iOS has a new information architecture (IA) using the bottom sheet to show all commanding options.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Germany, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Communication Compliance tagging improvements (Government clouds)
Details: We are making tagging improvements based on feedback to improve investigation and remediation actions in Communication Compliance. We are adding column that will display the current tag applied, and we’ll provide the ability to unresolve a message so it can be triaged again by an investigator.

Description: Microsoft Viva: Draft support in Topic Pages
Details: With this feature, topic editors and curators can save a page edit as a draft which is a feature parity to SharePoint page authoring.

Description: Word: Simple Markup view in Word for the web
Details: Simple Markup view keeps suggestions from others—both tracked changes and comments—on the periphery, allowing you to focus on the document itself while remaining aware that there are suggestions present.

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Communication Compliance Teams conversation context
Details: Provide the ability to retrieve additional conversation context for Microsoft Teams messages that has matched a Communication Compliance policy. This feature will help an investigator make a more informed decision of remediation actions to take next.

Description: Microsoft Teams: New assignment experience in modal window for Breakout Rooms for DoD
Details: Enhanced UX for participant assignment. This includes new capabilities such as sorting participants and rooms and performing multiple selections and assignments to rooms.

Description: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights homepage with personal insights
Details: A new Viva Insights homepage will be discoverable at insights.viva.office.com as well as via the Microsoft 365 app launcher on Office.com in place of MyAnalytics. This will surface key data-driven, privacy-protected insights to improve personal wellbeing and productivity.

Description: Microsoft Project: @mentions and Conversations in Project Teams app
Details: Initiate conversations on specific tasks and @mention colleagues during these conversations within the Project app in Microsoft Teams.

Description: Office 365: New security policies in Trusted Documents
Details: We are changing the behavior of Office applications to enforce policies that block Active Content (example - macros, ActiveX, DDE) on Trusted Documents. Previously, Active Content was allowed to run in Trusted Documents even when an IT administrator had set a policy to block it. As part of ongoing Office security hardening, the IT administrator’s choice to block Active Content will now always take precedence over end-user set trusted documents.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Teams: Guest access support on mobile for DOD
Details: Teams now supports Guest Access between tenants inside the DoD Cloud.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Guest access support on mobile for GCC-High
Details: Teams now supports Guest Access between tenants inside the GCC-H Cloud.

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Communication Compliance Sensitive information types per location report
Details: Review and export the sensitive information types detected in all your Microsoft 365 and non-Microsoft communication channels currently scoped into your Communication Compliance policies.

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Communication Compliance policy health check and ability to pause policy
Details: Provide guidance during Communication Compliance policy creation on the settings used and the potential volume of items that will be captured. Pausing a policy will enable an administrator to manually suspend evaluations of communications.

Description: OneDrive: Sharing experience  -  "Shared with" list
Details: At the bottom of the Share dialog, the "Shared with" list will give you an at-a glance view of everyone you’ve given access to the file
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Germany, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Teams: Pilot and deploy Teams for frontline with the FLW onboarding wizard
Details: The frontline worker (FLW) onboarding wizard empowers IT admins to pilot and deploy Teams for frontline workers in just a few steps. This wizard allows admins to streamline team creation, license assignment, and policy package assignment in a few simple steps.

Description: Microsoft 365 Compliance Center: Communication Compliance tagging improvements
Details: We are making tagging improvements based on feedback to improve investigation and remediation actions in Communication Compliance. We are adding column that will display the current tag applied, and we’ll provide the ability to unresolve a message so it can be triaged again by an investigator.

Description: Microsoft Information Protection: Data loss prevention (DLP) integration with Microsoft Cloud App Security (MCAS)
Details: Extend data loss prevention (DLP) policies to non-Microsoft cloud apps to monitor and detect when sensitive items are used and shared via non-Microsoft cloud apps.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Share Feedback in mobile app
Details: Share your feedback directly from the Help & Feedback option in Settings, without the need to send an email message. Admins will now be able to control elements such as sharing email addresses and logs from the mobile app.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Better Together feature for Calls on Teams phones and displays
Details: Better together allows Microsoft Teams devices to seamlessly integrate with your PC to bring a companion experience for cross-device interaction. With the new feature support, users can make and receive calls from either Teams device or PC client with a distributed calling experience across both devices.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Teams now available on CarPlay
Details: When Teams is connected to CarPlay, you can handsfree call or message one or a group of Teams contacts, as well as join your next meeting.

Description: Microsoft Intune and Microsoft Endpoint Manager: Setup guide to automate baselines policies and device configurations with Endpoint analytics
Details: This guide will enable Endpoint Manager administrators to create baseline policies and profiles that are unassigned and not directly applied to any Windows device user or device group.

Description: Microsoft Defender for Endpoint: Endpoint discovery for Microsoft Defender for Endpoint in GCC
Details: Endpoint for Microsoft Defender for Endpoint enables organizations to discover and secure unmanaged endpoints. Once discovered integrated workflows can be used to secure the devices using Defender for Endpoint’s threat and vulnerability management, threat detection and automated incident responses capabilities.

Description: Microsoft Viva: Send feedback to Microsoft
Details: With this feature, users can send feedback to Microsoft directly on the topic page, manage topics page and my topics page in Viva Topics.

Description: Microsoft Viva: Viva Connections Desktop for GCC
Details: With the new Viva Connection Desktop release for GCC, you can bring your intranet directly into Teams Desktop. The app’s icon and name match your company brand and enable employees to discover, navigate and consume your top sites in Teams. The app gives employees a window into the rest of the company intranet by using the same global navigation as the SharePoint app bar.

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Communication Compliance can now leverage optical character recognition to extract and evaluate messages
Details: Introducing the ability to extract printed or handwritten text from images using Azure's Computer Vision Optical Character Recognition (OCR). Text extracted will then be evaluated against Communication Compliance policies conditions.

Description: Microsoft Edge v.92: Users can easily get to Internet Explorer mode on Microsoft Edge
Details: Starting with Microsoft Edge version 92, users can reload a site in Internet Explorer mode on Microsoft Edge instead of relying on the standalone IE 11 application while waiting for a site to be configured in the Enterprise Mode Site List. Users will be prompted to add the site to their local site list such that navigating to the same page in Microsoft Edge will automatically render in IE mode for the next 30 days. You can use the InternetExplorerIntegrationReloadInIEModeAllowed policy to configure this experience and allow access to the IE mode entry points as well as the ability to add sites to the local site list. You can use the InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalSiteListExpirationDays policy to adjust the number of days to keep sites on the local site list.

Description: Microsoft Edge v.93: IE mode on Microsoft Edge will support "nomerge" behavior
Details: Starting in Edge 93, IE mode on Microsoft Edge will support nomerge. For an end-user, when a new browser window is launched from an IE mode application, it will be in a separate session, similar to the nomerge behavior in IE11. You will need to adjust your site list to configure sites that need to prevent session sharing as "nomerge". Behind the scenes, for each window of Microsoft Edge, the first time an IE mode tab is visited within that window, if it is one of the designated “nomerge” sites, that window is locked into a different “nomerge” IE session from all other Microsoft Edge windows at least until the last IE mode tab is closed in that window. This follows previous behavior where users could launch IE with nomerge and could also launch Microsoft Edge without nomerge via other mechanisms.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Simplified class team navigation for Teams for Education
Details: Access Assignments, Grades, Class Notebook and Insights more easily from your main class team navigation.

Description: Microsoft Information Protection: Auditing and Analytics in Office apps
Details: Office apps (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook) will now send user label activity data to the Audit Log and Activity Explorer for admins to search and review.

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Data loss prevention (DLP) solution overview page
Details: The DLP solution overview page will appear in the Microsoft 365 compliance center and house policy recommendation widgets and other actions and guidance related to your available DLP solutions.

Description: Word: Editor will be available in Word for Mac
Details: You can now review your writing and put your best step forward with Editor in Word for Mac.

Description: Microsoft Compliance center: Insider Risk Management data appears in Activity Explorer
Details: Activity explorer provides risk investigators and analysts with a comprehensive tool that surfaces detailed information about alerts to enhance the alert triage experience. Insider Risk Management in Microsoft 365 correlates various signals from the chip to the cloud to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, security and policy violations, and more. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to ensure user-level privacy.

Details: Teams Live Events held in GCC-H and DoD government clouds will have Live Captions available.

Description: Microsoft Compliance center: Increased set of first-party indicators for Insider Risk Management
Details: The Microsoft 365 Insider Risk Management solution will now recognize an increase set of first party indicators, including Endpoint (Windows 10), Microsoft Teams, Azure Active Directory, SharePoint Online, and Microsoft Cloud Access Security.
