Description: Microsoft Teams: Teams Q&A (Public review)
Details: Question & Answer (Q&A) application for Teams webinars & meetings. By adding this application to any Teams Webinars or Meetings, users will be able to create either moderated or unmoderated Q&A experience.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Increasing Chat Size from 300 to 1000 Participants for GCC-High and DoD
Details: Currently, 300 meeting participants can be part of the meeting chat; this feature update will allow 1000 participants to participate in the meeting chat.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Large meeting support for GCC-High and DoD
Details: Hold interactive meetings and webinars with more attendees—up to 1,000.

Description: Microsoft Edge v.92: MHTML files will default to opening in Internet Explorer mode
Details: Starting in Microsoft Edge version 92, MHTML file types will automatically open in Internet Explorer mode on Microsoft Edge instead of the Internet Explorer (IE11) application. This is most commonly observed while trying to view Outlook emails in a browser. This change will occur only if IE11 is the default handler for this file type.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Paging on Large Gallery
Details: When you choose Large Gallery and there are more than 49 videos, navigation controls  now appear below the Large Gallery. You can use these controls to view more video participants.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Teams: Teams device management for Surface Hubs
Details: Administrations will be able to setup, manage, and monitor their Surface Hubs through the Teams admin center.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Shared templates between Teams and SharePoint
Details: Team templates and SharePoint templates are now shared for specific use cases.

Description: Microsoft Edge v.95: Improved handoff between IE mode and the modern browser
Details: Starting with Microsoft Edge version 95, the transition between the modern browser experience and the IE mode experience will improve. Referrer headers, post data, forms data and request methods will now be forwarded properly across the two experiences.

Description: Microsoft Search: Stemming support for Microsoft Graph Connectors
Details: Stemming support will consider different variants of a Query term's word root for searches. This feature will extend support to Graph connectors content.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Up to 25K members per team in GCCH
Details: You can now add up to 25,000 members per team in GCCH.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Cortana now available for EDU customers in international markets
Details: Cortana voice assistance in the Teams mobile app and Microsoft Teams display is now available for EDU customers in international markets to help you streamline communication, collaboration, and class-related tasks in school using spoken natural language. With Cortana voice assistance, you can call someone or perform class-related tasks, you can message someone or send message to your class. Also, you can find and share files, and search or navigate within the Teams mobile app or on the Microsoft Teams display. The initial release will be to UK, India, Canada, and Australia. This is in addition to the prior release to EDU customers in the US.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Teams meetings roster update for Teams Rooms on Windows
Details: The updated meeting roster (viewable on the Teams Rooms console) more closely aligns with the experience available through the Teams desktop app, and includes capabilities like participant grouping, sort roster by raised hand, integrated user search. As well as with ability to ask others to join meeting from invited list or from chat.

Description: Microsoft Teams: New assignment experience in modal window for Breakout Rooms for GCC-High
Details: Enhanced UX for participant assignment. This includes new capabilities such as sorting participants and rooms and performing multiple selections and assignments to rooms.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Teams Rooms on Surface Hub
Details: This next generation of Teams on Surface Hub has been redesigned to bring your favorite features from the desktop and Microsoft Teams Rooms into the meeting space.

Description: SharePoint Syntex: Advanced metadata search
Details: Users licensed for Syntex will soon be able to select an icon in the search box that will unlock a metadata-based search experience in Syntex & SharePoint document libraries. In the first release, this search experience will have 5 fixed fields – keyword, people, name, type, and modified.

Description: Microsoft 365 Compliance center: Advanced Audit - Search term events in Exchange Online and SharePoint Online for GCC High
Details: Addition of Advanced Audit events that provide information on when and what a user searched for in Exchange Online and SharePoint Online.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Sharing device audio on iOS and Android for GCC High and DoD
Details: Include device audio when sharing on iPhones/iPads and Android devices.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Scale Teams Live Events to 100k attendees
Details: 100k Teams Live Events are now supported when you engage the Microsoft LEAP team for assistance producing & delivering your event.

Description: Microsoft Edge v.93: Initial Preferences in Microsoft Edge
Details: Deploying Microsoft Edge to your enterprise will become easier starting in version 93, with the addition of Initial Preferences.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Spam Call Notifications
Details: The spam call notification feature automatically evaluates incoming calls and identifies probable spam calls as “spam likely” in the call toast.  Users still have the option to answer or reject the call, and all “spam likely” calls (regardless of whether they were answered or rejected) will also be reflected in the call history list.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Breakout Room Timer, Room Retention, and Participant Reassignment for GCC-High
Details: Organizers can now set a timer for Breakout rooms from the Breakout Room settings. After timer has expired, rooms will automatically close and participants will come back to the main meeting. Room assignment retention provides the ability to persist room configuration and assignment over multiple sessions.  With participant reassignment capability, organizer will now be able to move joined participants across rooms and main meeting also when rooms are opened.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Chat preview notification settings
Details: Users can change settings and manage previews for their chat notification toasts.

Description: Microsoft Teams:  Mobile app protection policy
Details: Teams mobile app will start supporting conditional access grant, requiring app protection policy to help protect organizational data on all devices employees use. This change will ensure that only users with Intune app protection policy can access Microsoft 365 services from Teams.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Outlook: View and navigate the organization chart
Details: Org Explorer for Outlook helps you to visualize and explore your company’s internal structure, work teams, and individual roles.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Windows 10 native notifications
Details: Choose the style of your notifications: built-in Teams or Windows native notifications. The latter brings a suite of benefits, like respecting focus assist mode which enables you to avoid distracting notifications when you need to focus, and integrating with Windows 10 action center to helps you review your notifications in one place.

Description: Microsoft Edge v.92: Default for auto play will be set to Limited
Details: To help you maintain your focus online, we have changed the default for auto playing media to Limit from Allow, beginning with Microsoft Edge version 92.

Description: Microsoft 365 Compliance center: Insider risk management - Guided onboarding experience: recommended actions
Details: Recommended actions that an admin should take for a complete onboarding experience. Description: Microsoft 365 Compliance center: Insider risk management - Enhancements to Export Alerts
Details: For the Export alerts feature, we have increased the frequency in which alerts are sent to the Office 365 Management Activity API to every hour (previously every 12 hours) so you can have more updated alert information available. Description: Microsoft 365 Compliance center: Core and Advanced eDiscovery: Enhanced Keyword Query Language (KQL) editor experience
Details: The new Keyword Query Language (KQL) editor experiences improves the ability to quickly create an effective query with autofill of common properties and parameters, as well as highlights for potential and breaking errors with recommended mitigations. The KQL editor experience will be available across Core eDiscovery searches and Advanced eDiscovery collections experiences.

Description: Microsoft 365 Compliance center: Advanced eDiscovery: Jobs queue
Details: The Advanced eDiscovery jobs queue experience will help organizations with a high volume of eDiscovery activities manage and prioritize jobs within and across cases to improve efficiency of execution. The new jobs queue will include jobs such as advanced indexing, collections, analytics, and export to help improve workflows and enable prioritization and cancellation of pending jobs.

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Communication Compliance policy cloning and consumption visibility (Government clouds)
Details: New policy cloning feature helps you easily create similar policies for different audiences but with the same conditions for instance. The new policy consumption visibility will help you manage policies within your tenant.

Description: SharePoint: Improvements to the Text web part for SharePoint pages and news
Details: We’re adding the ability to paste inline images into the Text web part so that images can be closer to text and so that text can wrap around images. We’re also addressing feedback to reduce line spacing in text.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Physical badging Connector for Government clouds
Details: You can set up a connector in the Microsoft 365 compliance center to import physical badging data, such as employee’s raw physical access events or any physical access alarms generated by your organization's badging system. This information can be used by the Microsoft 365 insider risk management solution to generate risk indicators that can help you identify possible malicious activity or data theft inside your organization. Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Records management multi-stage disposition review
Details: This update allows organizations to use a multi-stage disposition process, including multiple stakeholders and reviews before deleting the content.

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Data loss prevention (DLP) for Microsoft Teams data surfaced in Activity Explorer
Details: DLP-related data sets which currently flow into Microsoft 365 Audit logs (i.e., Exchange Online, SharePoint Online, OneDrive, and Teams DLP) will now also surface within Activity Explorer and will now be available for Teams DLP under an activity called ‘DLP rule matched’.

Description: OneDrive: Sync admin reports - sorting and filtering
Details: Add support for sorting and filtering the list of devices in the Sync admin reports.

Description: OneDrive: Sync admin reports - aggregated errors view
Details: Adds ability to view an aggregated summary view of the top sync errors happening in the organization.

Description: Bookings: Bookings app in Teams for GCC
Details: Bookings app available in Teams.

Description: Bookings: SMS notifications for booking appointments
Details: In US and Canada, Microsoft Bookings supports sending SMS notifications for appointment confirmations, reminders, and cancellations for including Teams meeting link for virtual appointments.

Description: OneDrive: New Command Bar
Details: With this update you can easily identify the right file and access primary commands. The simplified view allows you to focus on the content and that is visually pleasing.
Tags - Release phase: General Availability, Targeted Release, Targeted Release (Entire Organization)
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Germany, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Communication Compliance integration with Power Automate for GCC
Details: Communication Compliance integration with Power Automate allows organizations to configure Power Automate flows to automate tasks for Communication Compliance cases and users. Please refer the roadmap 88847 for GA.

Description: Microsoft Stream: Generate captions for a video uploaded to SharePoint and OneDrive for DoD
Details: Users with edit permissions to a video file uploaded to SharePoint and OneDrive can click a button in the player to generate closed captions in English.

Description: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Updates to the common attachment filter in the anti-malware policy
Details: We are enhancing the common attachments filter (Anti-malware policy) to expand list of available file types and also manage custom file types in the portal.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Germany, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Information Protection: PDF files encrypted with sensitivity label can be searched and eDiscovered
Details: With this update, PDF files with sensitivity label (and encryption) can be reasoned over in SharePoint Online, searched, or eDiscovered. Additionally, labels can be applied to the existing PDF files hosted in SharePoint.
Tags - Product: Microsoft Information Protection, Microsoft Compliance center

Description: Microsoft Information Protection: Auto labeling (for files at rest in SharePoint Online) can now label PDF files
Details: This feature enables you to label PDF files at rest via the auto-labeling engine as you would Word, Excel, or PowerPoint files.
Tags - Product: Microsoft Information Protection, Microsoft Compliance center

Description: Microsoft Information Protection: API to set label on files in SharePoint online in bulk
Details: This is a “set-label” API that third parties and ISVs can use to labels many files across SharePoint via scripting or programmatic manner.
Tags - Product: Microsoft Information Protection, Microsoft Compliance center
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Advanced eDiscovery: Case limit enhancements (Government clouds)
Details: Advanced eDiscovery is expanding the limits for collection size, review set volume, and export. The limits expansion increases the collection size from 300GB currently to 1TB and expands the review set capacity as well to accommodate large case volumes. Export limits will be increased to 5M documents or 500GB, whichever is smaller. This update will help ensure organizations are able to manage their eDiscovery process across very large data sets effectively with Advanced eDiscovery.

Description: Microsoft Stream: Generate captions for a video uploaded to SharePoint and OneDrive for GCC and GCC High
Details: Users with edit permissions to a video file uploaded to SharePoint and OneDrive can click a button in the player to generate closed captions in English.

Description: Microsoft Viva: Effective meetings in Viva Insights
Details: A new “Effective meetings” experience is being introduced in the Microsoft Viva Insights app in Microsoft Teams. Meeting organizers will be able to view personalized insights and suggestions to help improve their meeting habits. Users will also be able to create and share meeting plans to set team meeting norms such as shorter meetings by default and always including Teams links.
Tags - Platform: Android, Mac, iOS, Web, Desktop, Mobile

Description: Microsoft Information Protection: Extend sensitivity labels to assets in Azure with Microsoft Azure Purview
Details: With Azure Purview, you can now extend the reach of your Microsoft Information Protection (MIP) sensitivity labels and the value from built-in sensitive information types to a much broader set of data locations and data types. Use existing sensitivity labels or create new sensitivity labels via the Microsoft 365 compliance center to extend security and compliance intent to data assets in Azure.
Tags - Product: Microsoft Information Protection, Microsoft Compliance center
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: SharePoint: Private drafts for SharePoint pages and news
Details: We’re adding the ability to create private drafts for pages and news posts. A private draft is visible only to the page author, the people the author chooses to share it with, and site admins. It's great for creating and editing content that’s not ready for others to see except the people you want to collaborate with.
Tags - Release phase: General Availability, Targeted Release (Entire Organization), Targeted Release (Select People)
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Viva: Quiet time settings in Teams and Outlook
Details: To help create better boundaries and protect your personal time, later this year Viva Insights will offer the ability to configure quiet time to silence mobile notifications from Outlook and Teams outside your working hours as well as provide personalized insights on how well you are disconnecting. You will also be able to set quiet time directly from Teams and Outlook mobile.

Description: Microsoft Stream: Viewing Teams meeting recording transcripts for GCC High and DoD
Details: You can see transcripts in transcript pane next to the video for Teams meeting recordings when Teams Live Transcript is also enabled. Video viewers can use the transcripts pane to find content most relevant to them and subsequently jump to any point in the video.

Description: Outlook: FindTime availability in GCC (Moderate)
Details: FindTime will become available for customers in GCC.

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Records Management – Disable unlocking of records
Details: Records Management admins can disable the ability for users to unlock a record tenant wide. Currently, items marked as a record in SharePoint can be unlocked for editing by end users. This is currently available in Preview.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Information Protection: Configure Teams DLP policies to automatically protect files shared in Teams messages
Details: New and existing Teams DLP policies can be configured to automatically protect files shared in Teams private chats and channel messages.
Tags - Product: Microsoft Information Protection, Microsoft Compliance center

Description: Whiteboard: Microsoft Whiteboard for GCC High
Details: Microsoft Whiteboard provides an infinite canvas where teams can ideate, create, and collaborate visually via the cloud. This update provides a seamless experience across Teams, web, and mobile devices.

Description: Outlook: Groups icon change in Outlook on the web
Details: Groups icon inside mail module will be made consistent with the Groups icon available in other Outlook applications. Groups icon inside Outlook web will be changed from current folder icon to Groups icon.

Description: Outlook: Support for "Send As" by default in Groups for Outlook on the web
Details: Now users having "Send As" permission in Groups will see the Group ID getting populated by default in their "From" address while composing or responding to conversations from the corresponding Groups section in mail module.

Description: Microsoft Lists: Board View
Details: View your list items in a board with swimlanes that represent their current progress.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: SharePoint and OneDrive: New capabilities in Microsoft 365 Information barriers for SharePoint, OneDrive, and M365 Groups
Details: Bringing in new capabilities in Microsoft 365 Information barriers which will further help administrators and end users to ensure they can collaborate and communicate within information barriers policies.
Tags - Release phase: General Availability, Targeted Release, Targeted Release (Entire Organization)

Description: Microsoft Viva: Praise History in Microsoft Viva Insights
Details: The Praise app in Microsoft Teams is designed to help recognize the effort that goes into the wide-ranging, collaborative work that Teams users do. Users can send Praise to their colleagues through the messaging extension pinned to the Teams messaging bar for most users or through the Microsoft Viva Insights app in Teams. With Praise history, users will be able to view their sent and received praise over the past six months.
Tags - Platform: Android, Mac, iOS, Linux, Web, Desktop, Mobile

Description: SharePoint: Microsoft 365 Lists entry point in the SharePoint app bar
Details: An entry point to Microsoft 365 Lists will appear in the SharePoint app bar after the files icon. Content in the Microsoft 365 lists panel is driven by Microsoft Graph and is personalized to user activity.
Tags - Release phase: General Availability, Targeted Release, Targeted Release (Select People)
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Communication Compliance discrimination classifier
Details: Currently available in public preview, the Discrimination classifier aims to detect and triage explicit discriminatory language.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Search: Add custom filters on custom verticals
Details: New support for custom filters on custom verticals in Microsoft Search allows you to add custom filters to custom verticals.

Description: Office app: Updates to Office.com and Office app for Windows
Details: We're rolling out updates to Office.com and the Office app for Windows to help make it easier to get to the content you care about, take action on documents, and find the apps and tools you need.

Description: Outlook for iOS: Play My Emails available in Brazilian Portuguese
Details: Play My Emails in Outlook for iOS now supports playing your emails in Brazilian Portuguese for users in Brazil. This is in addition to our support of English speaking users.

Description: SharePoint: Hub to hub site association
Details: We are adding the ability to associate a SharePoint hub site to another hub site to expand search results across multiple hubs in your organization. This enables users to discover relevant content when searching on any sites related to the associated hubs.

Description: Microsoft Search: Work Search Shortcut in Edge
Details: To help users stay focused and find work results faster when searching from the Microsoft Edge address bar, Microsoft Search is adding the capability to create customized address bar shortcuts for your organization. With this feature, Edge users can type a shortcut keyword in address bar, then press the Tab key followed by their work query, they will see internal work results on Microsoft Search.

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Information governance and records management: new retention engine for SharePoint Online (Government clouds)
Details: Introduction of our new retention engine for SharePoint Online (SPO) to Government clouds, which addresses the challenges with large tenants or tenants that must process large volumes of data. This will also enhance reliability and SLAs for retention.

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: OneDrive data in Content Explorer
Details: Display sensitive information, sensitivity labels, and retention labels detected on files and documents in OneDrive within the Content Explorer.

Description: SharePoint: Viewing reviews in the SharePoint Store
Details: Viewing reviews is supported in the SharePoint Store. The experience is modernized and aligned with AppSource now.

Description: SharePoint: Recommending apps from partners
Details: We recommend more apps from the same publisher when user is viewing the app details in the store. We will also recommend top-rated apps from partners when there is no searching results.

Description: Microsoft Information Protection: Sensitivity label with “User Defined Permissions” works in SharePoint Online
Details: With this feature, files labeled with "User defined permission" (aka Custom permission) labels can be reasoned over in SharePoint Online, as well as opened, edited, searched, or eDiscovered. Documents with user defined permission labels and hosted in SharePoint can be seamlessly coauthored in Office Online and Office client apps.
Tags - Product: Microsoft Information Protection, Microsoft Compliance center

Description: Microsoft Information Protection: Application of a “default label” to an unlabeled file uploaded to a SharePoint Online document library
Details: With this update, all newly uploaded documents to a document library can “inherit” the configured label for the document library (if not already labeled).
Tags - Product: Microsoft Information Protection, Microsoft Compliance center
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: OneDrive: Image Utility Edit Control (Crop, Adjustment, Filters)
Details: OneDrive image utility edit control provides basic photo edit and adjustment functionality. Also, with filters, users can give their photos a “look” without having knowledge of photo processing.
Tags - Release phase: Targeted Release, Targeted Release (Entire Organization), Targeted Release (Select People)

Description: Exchange: Scheduler now supports recurring meetings
Details: Ask your digital assistant to set up recurring meetings in natural language when using the Scheduler service.

Description: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: The Attack Simulation Training landing page is now customizable
Details: We’re pleased to announce the availability of a new landing page experience that allows customers to easily tailor the landing page to suit the requirements of their enterprise and include their own branding.
Tags - Platform: Android, Mac, Education, Developer, iOS, Linux, Web, Desktop, Engineering, Mobile

Description: Microsoft Stream: Video viewer retention analytics - See which parts of a video are watched
Details: Additional analytics for video files uploaded to SharePoint and OneDrive, allowing video owners to analyze the viewership retention of a video and determine which parts were watched the most or least.

Description: Microsoft Stream: Viewing Teams meeting recording transcripts for GCC
Details: You can see transcripts in transcript pane next to the video for Teams meeting recordings when Teams Live Transcript is also enabled. Video viewers can use the transcripts pane to find content most relevant to them and subsequently jump to any point in the video.

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Communication Compliance cross-tenant classifier feedback
Details: Currently available in public preview, cross-tenant feedback enables customers to provide feedback on messages that were misclassified (such as false positives) by a Communication Compliance policy leveraging any of the classifiers.

Description: Microsoft Defender for Identity: New Detection - BronzeBit
Details: An alert will be triggered when there is evidence of suspicious Kerberos delegation attempts using the BronzeBit method, where a user has attempted to use a ticket to delegate access to a particular resource.

Description: Microsoft Viva: Manager insights in Microsoft Viva Insights app, Outlook and Office.com
Details: To empower managers to foster productivity and wellbeing for teams - large or small - new insights and tools are being introduced in the "My team" tab of the Microsoft Viva Insights app in Teams, as well as in manager cards in the daily briefing and monthly digest emails from Microsoft Viva. These will help managers explore and improve their personal habits and team culture. Further, a new Viva Insights team home page will be discoverable at Office.com.  This item has been updated to exclude GCC.  Please refer to Roadmap Item 88843 for GCC.
Tags - Product: Outlook, Microsoft Teams, Office 365, Microsoft Viva
Tags - Platform: Android, Mac, iOS, Web, Desktop, Mobile

Description: MyAnalytics: Delay delivery inline suggestion feature available to New SKUs
Details: Delay delivery inline suggestion is available to people who are using MyAnalytics and are enrolled in a MyAnalytics (Full) service plan. This feature is currently being rolled out to people who have the Insights by MyAnalytics service plan.

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Advanced eDiscovery: Case limit enhancements
Details: Advanced eDiscovery is expanding the limits for collection size, review set volume, and export. The limits expansion increases the collection size from 300GB currently to 1TB and expands the review set capacity as well to accommodate large case volumes. Export limits will be increased to 5M documents or 500GB, whichever is smaller. This update will help ensure organizations are able to manage their eDiscovery process across very large data sets effectively with Advanced eDiscovery. This is currently available in public preview.

Description: SharePoint Syntex: Modern site-level term store
Details: A modern experience to create and manage site-level taxonomies for your sites.

Description: Microsoft Defender for Cloud Apps: App governance add-on feature for Microsoft 365 platform
Details: App governance add-on feature to Microsoft Defender for Cloud Apps (formerly Microsoft Cloud App Security) is a security and policy management capability that customers can use to monitor and govern app behaviors and quickly identify, alert, and protect from risky behaviors with data, users, and apps. App governance is designed for OAuth-enabled apps that access Microsoft 365 data via Microsoft Graph API.

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Communication Compliance – Day zero insights
Details: Communication Compliance Day Zero Insights helps organizations discover trends that they may not be aware of, like harassment, threats or sharing of sensitive information. Insights for sensitive information types are surfaced automatically through the existing Compliance center data classification service while insights for machine learning classifiers require an organization to have already configured a policy in Communication Compliance. Insights for both sensitive information types and machine learning classifiers are designed to help organizations holistically set up parameters for internal governance by identifying potential areas of risk and determining the type and scope of communication policies to be configured. Day Zero Insights displays the aggregate number of matches per classification type, with none of the insights containing any personally identifiable information.

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Communication Compliance – DLP policy recommendation
Details: We are surfacing Communication Compliance policy recommendations within the Data Loss Prevention (DLP) workflow, with the ability to apply DLP policy insights to your insider risk practice to better identify user behavior and intent. Customers will now be directed to configure a relevant policy in Communication Compliance at the end of the DLP policy configuration flow.

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Communication Compliance – Review activity summary
Details: This new Communication Compliance report provides a comprehensive summary of all activities and actions that have occurred against a policy, such as date sent, date flagged, reviewed by, message reconciliation, etc. By providing visibility into policy review activity, organizations will be able to easily fulfill regulatory compliance obligations and can better track the status and progress for unresolved policy violations. Communication Compliance helps organizations detect explicit code of conduct and regulatory compliance violations, such as harassing or threatening language, sharing of adult content, and inappropriate sharing of sensitive information. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are explicitly opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to ensure user-level privacy.

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Communication Compliance – Additional classifier language support
Details: To expand the ability to detect policy violations in communications beyond English, French, Spanish, German, Portuguese, Italian, Japanese, and Chinese, Communication Compliance built-in classifiers (threat, harassment, and profanity) now support these additional four languages: Arabic, Dutch, Korean, and Chinese Traditional.

Description: Microsoft Information Protection: Granular conditional access policies via “Sensitivity Labels” for SharePoint Online sites for GCC -High and DoD
Details: Admins will have the ability to use Azure AD conditional access policies to trigger multi-factor authentication (MFA), device and location policies on a specific SharePoint site collection based by simply attaching CA policies to a label.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Paging on Video Gallery
Details: When you are in Gallery view and there are more than 9 videos, navigation controls  will appear below the Gallery. You can use these controls to view more video participants.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Teams: 2x2 video in Gallery view for web meetings in Safari for GCC High and DoD
Details: Gallery view now can show up to 4 participant videos during a meeting in Safari browser

Description: Microsoft Teams: Home page customization for Teams admin center
Details: IT admins can drag and drop widgets to customize their Home page in Teams admin center.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Give Take Control for Teams on VDI for VMware
Details: User on VMware will be able to give and take control during calls and meetings. Give control: If you want another meeting participant to change a file, help you present, or demonstrate something, you can give control to that person. You will both be in control of the sharing, and you can take back control anytime. Take control: To take control while another person is sharing, select Request control. The person sharing can then approve or deny your request. While you have control, you can make selections, edits, and other modifications to the shared screen. When you’re done, select Release control to stop sharing control.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Give Take Control for Teams for VDI on Azure Window Desktop and Windows 365
Details: User on Azure Window Desktop and Windows 365 on virtual desktop infrastructure (VDI) will be able to give and take control during calls and meetings. Give control: If you want another meeting participant to change a file, help you present, or demonstrate something, you can give control to that person. You will both be in control of the sharing, and you can take back control anytime. Take control: To take control while another person is sharing, select Request control. The person sharing can then approve or deny your request. While you have control, you can make selections, edits, and other modifications to the shared screen. When you’re done, select Release control to stop sharing control.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Give Take Control for Citrix on Virtual Desktop Infrastructure.
Details: User on Citrix will be able to give and take control during calls and meetings. Give control: If you want another meeting participant to change a file, help you present, or demonstrate something, you can give control to that person. You will both be in control of the sharing, and you can take back control anytime. Take control: To take control while another person is sharing, select Request control. The person sharing can then approve or deny your request. While you have control, you can make selections, edits, and other modifications to the shared screen. When you’re done, select Release control to stop sharing control.

Description: Microsoft Viva: Briefing email for Government Community Cloud
Details: The daily briefing email- a personalized, actionable briefing email from Microsoft Viva, automatically delivered to your Outlook inbox to help you start the day on track and stay on top of tasks, will be available for Government Community Cloud (GCC).
Tags - Platform: Android, Mac, iOS, Web, Desktop, Mobile

Description: Microsoft Teams: Multi-Window support for VDI for VMware
Details: Users on virtual desktop infrastructure (VDI)will be able to view meetings and calls in separate windows from the main Microsoft Teams client. Additionally, meeting and call controls such as mute, video, chat, leave and others will now be located at the top of the meeting window so that they are always available and never block the underlying content.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Support of Live Caption for Teams on VDI for Azure Virtual Desktop and Windows 365
Details: Teams users on Azure Virtual Desktop and Windows 365 on virtual desktop infrastructure (VDI) will be able to use live captions. Live captions display the text version of the audio during the call. Item has been delayed and is being rescheduled.

Description: Microsoft Teams: New Lobby Setting: Only Invited Users join directly for GCC
Details: A new lobby setting is coming to Teams Meeting Options. We are adding "People I Invite" as an option to the "Who can bypass lobby?" setting. Once enabled, only the participants invited by the organizer in meeting invite will be able to join the meeting directly. Everyone else will be sent to the lobby. Item has been delayed and is being rescheduled

Description: Microsoft Teams: Support of Live Caption for Teams on VDI for VMware
Details: Teams users on virtual desktop infrastructure (VDI) will be able to use live captions. Live captions display the text version of the audio during the call.

Description: Microsoft Teams: New default for Teams notification style for DoD
Details: Teams notification style will be defaulted to native notifications for new users. Currently the default style is Teams purple, with this change to native notifications the user will benefit from support for assist mode, action center, accessibility and more.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Multi-Window support for VDI on Azure Virtual Desktop and Windows 365
Details: Users on Azure Virtual Desktop and Windows 365 on virtual desktop infrastructure (VDI) will be able to view meetings and calls in separate windows from the main Microsoft Teams client. Additionally, meeting and call controls such as mute, video, chat, leave and others will now be located at the top of the meeting window so that they are always available and never block the underlying content.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Support of live captions for Teams for VDI for Citrix
Details: Teams users on virtual desktop infrastructure (VDI) will be able to use live captions. Live captions display the text version of the audio during the call.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Manage What Attendees See
Details: Attendees will only see shared content and presenters that you bring on screen.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Teams: Dynamic Emergency Calling for Work From Home for VDI - VMware
Details: This feature enables users on VMware on Virtual Desktop Infrastructure (VDI) to make an emergency call while working from home. It will allow users to validate (and if necessary, edit) the address that will be communicated to emergency responders. This feature has been delayed to incorporate initial feedback.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Attendance Dashboard in GCC
Details: Measure meeting and webinar registration and attendance data in the Attendance Dashboard.

Description: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Exchange Online Protection- Customizable Authenticated Received Chain (ARC) configuration
Details: Email senders use authentication mechanisms like SPF, DKIM, DMARC to authenticate emails, but some legitimate intermediate services may potentially make changes to the email, which might cause the email to fail authentication at subsequent hop. Authenticated Received Chain (ARC) is an authentication mechanism that helps preserve authentication results across intermediaries. With this change, admins will be able to add trusted intermediaries in the Microsoft 365 Defender portal to allow Microsoft to honor these ARC signatures, thereby allowing legitimate messages.

Description: Microsoft Planner: Rich text and images in Planner task notes
Details: The Planner task notes field will support rendering rich text formatting (bold, italics, underline, and more) and image previews. Users can insert rich text and images into task notes.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Teams: Export Teams list from Teams Admin Center
Details: Administrators can export Teams list as a csv file from Teams admin center
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Teams: Global sign in and sign out
Details: Teams iOS app will support Global sign-in and sign-out to simplify the experience for Frontline Workers. Employees can now use any device from the shared device pool to sign in with their credentials and sign out of it at the end of the shift. This will remove all their personal and company information from the device.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Automated webinar invite
Details: When webinars are setup and scheduled, the webinar invite is now automatically added to the attendee's calendar.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Customer Lockbox for Microsoft Teams
Details: Customer Lockbox ensures that Microsoft cannot access your content to perform a service operation without your explicit approval. Customer Lockbox brings you into the approval workflow for requests to access your content. Customer Lockbox is already available for Exchange Online, SharePoint Online and OneDrive for Business. This update brings the capability to Microsoft Teams as well.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Anonymous meeting join across clouds
Details: Join meetings in other clouds anonymously from your Teams desktop app (across clouds).  We will be enabling this in three phases. First, Commercial and GCC customers will be able to join meetings in GCC-High and DOD clouds. Next, we will enable GCC-High customers to join Commercial, GCC and DOD meetings. Then, we will enable DOD customers to join Commercial, GCC, and GCC-High meetings.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Teams panels Check in notifications to Microsoft Teams Rooms
Details: For Teams panels deployment with Microsoft Teams Rooms, when this feature is enabled, checking in on Teams panels will send a notification to the Teams Rooms front of room display to inform the people in the room that their meeting room reservation is over and others are waiting for the room outside. This release will support Teams Rooms on Android. Support on Teams Rooms on Windows will be available at a later time.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Meeting room capacity notifications for Microsoft Teams Rooms on Android
Details: Notification that appears on the front of room display alerting in-room meeting participants if the room is over-capacity based on the capacity defined in a room account. Only cameras that support people counting will support this feature. When a Teams panel is deployed outside a Teams Room that supports this feature, an alert will also be visible on the Teams panel, notifying people outside the room that it has reached capacity.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Domain Customization for Webinar Communications
Details: Showcase your organization's brand in webinar communications. When webinar emails are sent to attendees, both the sender name and email domain will now reflect the tenant name, making it easier for attendees to recognize.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Usability improvements to informational messages in meetings for iOS
Details: Notification drawer for in-meeting informational   messages, so users can preview, collapse and clear all notifications with one   tap.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Usability improvements to informational messages in meetings for Android
Details: Notification drawer for in-meeting informational   messages, so users can preview, collapse and clear all notifications with one   tap.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Admins can pin message extensions
Details: Admins can manage the pin order of messaging extensions in the compose experience.

Description: Microsoft Information Protection: Auto-labeling policies support overwriting manual label and encrypting mail received from any organization
Details: New and existing Exchange auto-labeling policies can be configured to apply encryption to email received from outside the organization. In addition, policies can be configured to enforce classification on any email by replacing existing manual labels that have the same or lower label priority.
Tags - Product: Microsoft Information Protection, Microsoft Compliance center

Description: Microsoft Graph: Confluence Cloud Graph Connector
Details: Confluence Cloud Graph Connector will index content like pages, blogs from Confluence Cloud site into Microsoft Search and allow users to query them from SharePoint, Microsoft Bing, Office .com, Microsoft Teams and Windows Search Box.

Description: Microsoft Graph: ServiceNow Catalog Graph Connector
Details: ServiceNow Catalog Graph Connector will index catalog items from ServiceNow into Microsoft Search and allow users to query them from SharePoint, Microsoft Bing, Office .com, Microsoft Teams and Windows Search Box.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Dynamic Emergency Calling for Work From Home for VDI - Citrix
Details: This feature enables users on Virtual Machine to validate the address that will be communicated to emergency responders in the event that an emergency call is placed by an individual working from home.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Enable third-party Teams app developers to test the in-product purchase experience within the Teams client
Details: Third-party Teams app developers can now test the purchase experience of their Teams app directly from within the Teams client before making either app or offer available to the public.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Mute Notifications During Meetings
Details: Users will be able to mute notifications during meetings thereby helping focus during meetings. A user can choose to mute notifications for all meetings or per meeting basis.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Teams: Introducing background effects on web
Details: When you use Teams on the web, you can either blur your background or replace it entirely with the images provided in your video meeting or call. Note: Blurring or replacing your background might not prevent sensitive information from being visible to other people in the call or meeting.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Switch between multiple video cameras in Microsoft Teams Rooms on Windows
Details: Ability for participants in a Microsoft Teams Room to switch between multiple video cameras during a Teams meeting.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Pin your own video in Teams meetings
Details: Currently, users can pin video feeds to increase the size of the desired video on their own screen. Now, we have expanded the ability for users to pin their own video on the stage as well. This way, users can also see their own video in the increased size on their screen.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Teams: Hide your own video in Teams meeting
Details: Currently, the user's video is displayed at the bottom right corner of the meeting screen. This feature allows users to hide their own video during a meeting. This will help reduce distractions during the call while still having your video available for other participants.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Teams: Queue view for virtual visits scheduled in the Microsoft Bookings app
Details: Real time updates to meeting state in a queue view for virtual visits scheduled in the Microsoft Bookings app.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Isolated audio feed capabilities
Details: When using NDI or hardware-out in Microsoft Teams, users will be able to get the isolated audio feed along with the isolated video feed from any Teams meeting.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Stream: Empty tenant recycle bin as Stream admin
Details: The feature allows Stream (Classic) admins to permanently delete videos in bulk from the tenant recycle bin.

Description: SharePoint: Updated site creation experience
Details: We’ve updated the site creation experience to make it easier for site creators to select the right type of SharePoint site, understand roles, and site permissions. Updates to this experience include refreshed graphics, expanded site descriptions, and more context for different permission levels in the Site permissions panel.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Stream: Toggle video or audio features on and off for all viewers
Details: Users with edit permissions to a video or audio file uploaded to SharePoint and OneDrive will be able to toggle features on and off for all viewers of the video.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Teams: Split video layout across multiple screens for Teams Rooms on Windows
Details: Ability to split the video gallery across all available displays in a Teams Room, when content isn’t being shared, maximizing screen space and bringing greater attention to the people joining remotely.

Description: Outlook: Expanded Global Access List (GAL) people suggestions for mail and calendar compose
Details: Outlook will now return results from the complete GAL (Global Access List) when suggesting people for email and calendar compose (Ex: Adding someone to the To line of a new email).

Description: Microsoft Teams: Redesigned Teams Store
Details: With the redesigned Teams Store, you’ll find a landing page optimized for ease of discoverability with rotating banners at the top that spotlight interesting apps and scenarios. You’ll also get intelligent recommendations – like featured apps and those popular amongst your colleagues. And editorial articles that surface collections of apps that address common scenarios from apps to get you started in Teams to those best for educators.  Updated app categories to make it easier to find the apps you’re searching for – from those built by your org and colleagues to those built for certain functions and industries.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Outlook: Tone detector in Microsoft Editor for Outlook on the web
Details: Microsoft Editor in Outlook on the web will now offer writing refinements and suggest conversation tone.

Description: Microsoft Viva: Viva Connections
Details: Microsoft Viva Connections is your gateway to a modern engagement experience designed to keep everyone engaged and informed. This release will include features such as the dashboard authoring capability, setting a home site via the SharePoint admin center, dashboard and feed web parts for your home site and the Viva Connections app in Teams.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Universal Actions and Refresh Support for User Sent Cards
Details: Adaptive Cards v2 (ACv2) now known as Universal Actions for Adaptive Cards brings the bot as the common backend for handling actions and introduces a new action type, Action.Execute, which works across apps, such as Teams and Outlook. This lights up the following new capabilities on Teams:Universal ActionsUser Specific ViewsSequential Workflow supportUp to date views

Description: Microsoft Edge v.94: New accessibility settings page
Details: Starting with Microsoft Edge version 94, we have brought accessibility-related settings together on a single page. You can find the new edge://settings/accessibility page under the main settings list. Here you can find settings to make the web page bigger, show a high visibility outline around the area of focus and other settings that can help improve your web browsing experience. We’ll continue to add new settings here in future versions of Microsoft Edge.

Description: Microsoft Edge v.95: View in File Explorer support for SharePoint Online libraries in Microsoft Edge
Details: Starting in Microsoft Edge version 95, you can enable the View in File Explorer capability on SharePoint Online. For this experience to be visible and work for your users, you will need to enable the Microsoft Edge policy "Configure the View in File Explorer feature for SharePoint pages in Microsoft Edge" and update your SharePoint Online tenant configuration.

Description: Microsoft Stream: Updated Web player for video & audio files in SharePoint, Teams, Yammer, and OneDrive for Government Clouds
Details: The web player for audio and video files that are stored in OneDrive and SharePoint (including when those files are embedded in Teams, Yammer, and SharePoint), is updated with a new user look and feel, and adheres to greater levels of accessibility for keyboard navigation and screen readers.

Description: Microsoft Viva: Sync learning management systems with Learning
Details: Configure learning management systems (Saba, SuccessFactors, Cornerstone On demand) as a learning content source to make your organization's own content available in Viva Learning. The content is available for search and discovery and can be browsed by the employees who use Viva Learning.

Description: Microsoft Viva: Connect third party learning providers to Learning
Details: Configure various learning sources in Viva Learning app to make the global or tenant specific content from those learning sources available within your Viva Learning app. The content is available for search and discovery and can be browsed by the employees who use Viva Learning. Global sources available by GA include EdX, Coursera, Pluralsight, LinkedIn, JBA, Infosec; Tenant specific sources include Skillsoft, Udemy, and Go1.

Description: Microsoft Viva: Add Viva Learning app to Microsoft Teams
Details: Viva Learning will be shipped as a pre-installed app in Microsoft Teams. Users will be able to add the Viva Learning app to Microsoft Teams to discover, share, track, and consume learning content.

Description: Microsoft Viva: Search for learning content in Learning app in Microsoft Teams
Details: Search for learning content from Microsoft and partner providers inside Viva Learning Teams app.

Description: Microsoft Viva: Social learning features
Details: Share learning courses from Teams chat using Learning App compose extension. Curate a list of courses for a Chat/Channel by creating a learning tab in a chat and pinning Learning Objects within it. Share a Learning object from Learning app to Teams via Share- Share to teams option. Share a Learning Object to any other surface by copying the link to the object via Share-Copy Link.

Description: Microsoft Viva: Recommend learning content and track completion progress
Details: Recommend a learning course to one or more individuals, with options to set a due date for completion and capture additional information via the 'notes'. For all recommendations, the recommender can view reported completion progress of each of the recommendees. Recomendees can view recommendations made to them along with information of who recommended, notes from the recommender and Due date. As content is consumed, recomendees can update status of the recommendation to in-progress or Completed. Users get notifications for new recommendations, notifications for recommendations approaching due date and notifications for overdue recommendations.

Description: Microsoft Viva: Feature learning content to organization
Details: Knowledge admins can highlight content within their organization to appear in banner carousel in the Viva Learning app.

Description: Microsoft Viva: Learning - My Learning view
Details: In the My Learning view, users will be able to view and track learning content assigned and recommended to them, bookmarked content, recently viewed courses, and completed courses on this page.

Description: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning for mobile
Details: Access Viva Learning on the go, anytime, anywhere on your Mobile device.

Description: Microsoft Viva: Learning content discovery based on user's interests
Details: Users will be able to discover engaging learning opportunities by picking and saving their interests. Once interests are saved, learning content based on those interests will show in the Home page in 'Based on your interest' section and in the 'Your interests' tab in the 'Browse courses' section as well. Users will also be able to use their interests to filter learning content in the search results page.

Description: Microsoft Viva: Content consumption in Viva Learning
Details: User can consume learning content from Microsoft Learn, and Microsoft 365 training within the Viva Learning app.

Description: Microsoft Information Protection: Power BI sensitivity label data in Activity Explorer
Details: Power BI will now send sensitivity label activity data to Activity Explorer for admins to search and review along with the rest of the Microsoft Information Protection (MIP), Azure Information Protection (AIP), and Data Loss Prevention (DLP) data sets from native Office apps and other cloud resources.

Description: Microsoft Information Protection: Data loss prevention (DLP) integration with Microsoft Defender for Cloud Apps
Details: Extend data loss prevention (DLP) policies to non-Microsoft cloud apps to monitor and detect when sensitive items are used and shared via non-Microsoft cloud apps.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Anonymous user join policy
Details: Teams meeting policy that controls allowing anonymous users on meeting organizer level.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Teams: Download Attendance report for GCC
Details: Download and review attendee reports following a meeting or webinar.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Chat bubbles during Teams Meeting for Teams Rooms on Windows
Details: Ability to view chats sent during a Teams meeting on the front of room display in a Teams Room, calling attention to the chat conversation happening alongside the meeting.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Dynamic view on single and dual displays for Teams Rooms on Windows
Details: Dynamic view automatically optimizes shared content and video participants in Teams meetings. New controls let you personalize the view to suit your preferences and needs, such as the ability to show shared content and specific participants side-by-side or to view content or people only.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Room video fits to frame for Teams Rooms on Windows
Details: Conference room video fits to frame by default and provide a full view of the room on Teams desktop app. Users can choose to fill frame for room video as needed.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Support for large meeting controls for Teams Rooms on Windows
Details: Ability for a Teams Room on Windows to join a large meeting as a presenter or attendee. Based on the role assumed by the Teams Room, appropriate meeting controls are made available to presenters for meeting moderation and for attendees.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Lock meeting support for Teams Rooms on Windows
Details: Ability to lock a meeting, preventing additional participants from joining. Users attempting to join a locked meeting will be informed that the meeting is locked.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Live reactions for Teams Rooms on Windows
Details: Ability to view live reactions sent by participants in a Teams meeting on the front of room display in a Teams Room. Room users can also send reaction from center of the room console.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Pin multiple video streams in Teams Rooms on Windows
Details: Ability to pin multiple video streams (up to 9 participants) simultaneously during a Teams meeting. User can select which participants to pin from the center of room console.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Presenter mode support in Teams Rooms on Windows
Details: Ability for presenter mode views to appear on the front of room display in a Teams Room. Presenter mode is a feature in PowerPoint Live that helps you customize how your video feed and content appear to the meeting audience.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Spotlight multiple video streams for Teams Rooms on Windows
Details: Ability to Spotlight multiple video streams (up to 7 participants) simultaneously during a Teams meeting. Users can select which participants to pin from the center of room console.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Career Coach - Improved accessibility and minor updates
Details: Career Coach will receive minor updates to copy and performance. The application will also adhere to greater levels of accessibility for keyboard navigation and screen readers.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Team Templates maintenance
Details: Enhancements to Team Templates content with additional apps and channels in the Microsoft-provided predefined team structure.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Content from camera
Details: "Content from camera” in Teams enables you to share content from physical artefacts such as whiteboards and documents in a high quality and legible way during meetings. All you need is a laptop or PC with an in-built camera or with an attached USB camera. Educators can also share content directly from a document camera.

Description: Microsoft Teams: MacOS native notifications in Teams for DoD
Details: Users can now choose to get Microsoft Teams notifications, either via Teams built-in notifications or via macOS native notifications. When choosing native notifications, Teams inherits the OS notifications settings and supports quiet hours, action centre triaging and do not disturb (DND).

Description: Microsoft Teams: New default for Teams notification style for GCC High
Details: Teams notification style will be defaulted to native notifications for new users. Currently the default style is Teams purple, with this change to native notifications the user will benefit from support for assist mode, action center, accessibility and more.

Description: Microsoft Yammer: Restrict Yammer community posting
Details: Gives network managers the ability to restrict who can start a thread in a community. Once this setting is enabled, only admins will have the ability to post in the community while members can only reply and react to conversations.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Operator Connect
Details: Operator Connect is a new way for customers to simply and quickly enable PSTN calling for Teams, using services from non-Microsoft telephony operators. Administrators can select their desired operator in the Teams Admin Center, and provision phone numbers to their users in just hours, with no required hardware.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Peer5 eCDN support for Teams Live Events
Details: Soon, you will be able to use Peer5 as an eCDN provider for your Teams Live Event network needs.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Large gallery view and Together Mode for GCC High
Details: Ability for Teams Rooms to support different video gallery layouts including in large gallery and Together mode, in GCC High clouds.

Description: Microsoft Teams: New default for Teams notification style for GCC
Details: Teams notification style will be defaulted to native notifications for new users. Currently the default style is Teams purple, with this change to native notifications the user will benefit from support for assist mode, action center, accessibility and more.

Description: Microsoft Teams: 2x2 video in Gallery view for web meetings in Safari
Details: Gallery view now can show up to 4 participant videos during a meeting in Safari browser

Description: Microsoft Teams: Starting recording will also start live transcription.
Details: If both recording and policy settings are enabled, turning on recording will also start live transcription.

Description: Microsoft Teams: MacOS native notifications in Teams for GCC
Details: Users can now choose to get Microsoft Teams notifications, either via Teams built-in notifications or via macOS native notifications. When choosing native notifications, Teams inherits the OS notifications settings and supports quiet hours, action centre triaging and do not disturb (DND).

Description: Microsoft Graph: ServiceNow Tickets Graph Connector
Details: ServiceNow Tickets Graph Connector will index incident tickets from ServiceNow into Microsoft Search and allow users to query them from SharePoint, Microsoft Bing, Office .com, Microsoft Teams and Windows Search Box.

Description: Microsoft Graph: Confluence On-premises Graph Connector
Details: Confluence On-premises Graph Connector will index content like pages, blogs from Confluence on-premises site into Microsoft Search and allow users to query them from SharePoint, Microsoft Bing, Office .com, Microsoft Teams and Windows Search Box.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Career Coach – Improved IT onboarding
Details: Teams Admin Center settings for Career Coach will be updated to improve the provisioning and configuration process, as well as add more descriptive field validation and error messaging. The settings update will also introduce controls for managing the release of Career Coach features to app users.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Check-in and room release for Teams panels
Details: Allow users to "check in" to a meeting room from a Teams panel. If no users check in to the room, the scheduled meeting is removed from the room's calendar. The room is then returned to the room inventory and available for other users to reserve and use.

Description: Microsoft Edge v.94: Update saved passwords with 1 click
Details: Beginning with Microsoft Edge version 94, you can easily update your saved passwords with a single click.

Description: Microsoft Edge v.93: Policies to bypass ClickOnce and DirectInvoke prompts
Details: Starting with Microsoft Edge version 93, we have updated our policies to enable bypassing ClickOnce and DirectInvoke confirmation before opening specified file types from specified domains. To bypass prompts, you will need to: Enable AutoOpenFileTypes policy and list the specific file types that ClickOnce and DirectInvoke should be disabled for and Enable the AutoOpenAllowedForURLs policy and set the list of specific domains that should bypass prompting.

Description: Microsoft Edge v.95: File:// type links will be opened from the browser
Details: Beginning with Microsoft Edge version 95, a new policy will be added that allows opening file:// links from the browser.

Description: Microsoft Graph: Identity - Paging for app role assignments
Details: Listing app role assignments granted to a user, to a group, or to a service principal will support paging. If the queried user, group, or service principal has been granted more app role assignments than fit into a single page of results, a next page link will be included following the normal paging behavior for Microsoft Graph.

Description: Microsoft Teams: 1:1 Calling in Safari Web Browser
Details: We are now bringing 1 to 1 calling from Teams to Safari. Users can now initiate a 1:1 call with another Teams user while using Teams on Safari. Users can initiate a 1:1 call from the Calls App or from the Call button in the header of a 1:1 chat.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Graph: Defender Incidents API for Graph
Details: Adds the Incident entity to the Graph.Available operations for now are:1) Get single Incident by Id.2) List all Incidents.api.md - Repos (visualstudio.com)M365Defender.csdl.xml - Repos (visualstudio.com)

Description: Microsoft Teams: Delay delivery of chat messages
Details: You can send out a chat message in a time that is convenient to you, and the message will arrive to its destination at the time you scheduled.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Teams: Check out for Microsoft Teams panels
Details: From a Microsoft Teams panel, users can “check out” of a room with the touch of a button, ending the room reservation and returning the room back to the room inventory.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Expanded Reactions
Details: Expanded reactions allows users to apply any emoji as a reaction to chat messages! Pick from 800 plus Teams emojis to react the way you want.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Teams: Workspace Management
Details: Workspace Management is a new feature within Teams Admin      Center that provides an integrated view of Teams devices and peripherals      based on their location, along with relevant insights. This capability provides      IT admins the ability to manage connected devices, and monitor workspace      health, utilization and conformance to standards at any location.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Teams: Chat with self
Details: Users can send themselves notes, messages, files and images/videos; helping them stay organized.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Teams: Forms Integration with Microsoft Bookings
Details: Associate Forms templates to Booking services to send forms for data intake from attendees prior to joining a Booking appointment.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Device Test for virtual visits
Details: Ability for users to test their device before a virtual visit.

Description: Microsoft Forms: Increasing the response quota for Forms
Details: The number of responses allowed per form or quiz is being increased to five million. The form owner will be able to export the results into a *.csv file for analysis.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Teams: New Tag Management Settings
Details: This feature will update default tag management settings in the Teams Admin Center to include ”Team owners and members" and not just "Team owners.” You can still update this to only "Team owners" at the tenant level and override the default.

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Insider risk management – User activity reports
Details: User activity reports allow you to examine activities for specific users for a defined time period without having to assign them temporarily or explicitly to an insider risk management policy. This is currently available in public preview. Insider Risk Management in Microsoft 365 correlates various signals from the chip to the cloud to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, security and policy violations, and more. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to ensure user-level privacy.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Teams: Share specific parts of the App to meeting stage
Details: We have introduced new API's within the Teams Client SDK that will provide developers the ability to share specific content within their app to the meeting stage from the app side panel experience.

Description: Microsoft Teams: List of the joined teams per user in Teams admin center
Details: Teams administrators can view the list of teams that a user has joined.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Teams: Chat density
Details: Customize the number of chat messages you see on the screen. Use the compact setting to fit 50 percent more messages on the screen. Comfortable setting keeps the chat display as it is in Teams today.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Teams: New Fluent Emoji style coming to Teams emojis and reactions
Details: Teams is joining M365 and Windows in updating all emojis and reactions to the new Microsoft Fluent emoji style, bringing users a more vibrant and expressive emoji experience.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Teams: Group assignment of app setup policies
Details: App setup policies allow apps to be pre-installed and pinned to the app bar by the admin. App setup policies can now be assigned to groups.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Word: Use the redesigned modern font picker in Office
Details: Picking your fonts just got much easier! Microsoft Office modern font picker is a completely reimagined experience for Office. Pin your favorite fonts so you can quickly access them on any device or platform. Easily view all the fonts used in a document, including notifications for missing and embedded fonts. Choose from all the available styles for a font family, whether simply bold or italic or more exotic variants, such as condensed semi bold italic. In the Office Fonts section, see which fonts are available on all platforms and don’t need to be embedded in a document. Microsoft Office modern font picker offers you the effortless typographical experience you've been waiting for.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Updated companion mode for iOS users
Details: For a better hybrid meeting experience, Teams users on their iPhone can use a single tap to join a meeting on both their device and Microsoft Teams Room. Audio on their device will be automatically turned off to ensure echo doesn't happen. Furthermore, the landing experience on the iPhone will be optimized for engagement activities to make it easier to raise hand or react, chat, see all participants, and more.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Teams admin center - Sensitivity label support in Government clouds
Details: Teams administrators can leverage existing sensitivity labels and assign them when creating new teams. Sensitivity labels assigned to teams help provide stricter security and compliance controls.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Teams for Education Career Coach - Admin feature enabling
Details: IT admin will have controls in Teams Admin Center for enabling new Career Coach features for their school.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Teams for Education Career Coach - Connection messages
Details: Students can now select a message to include with their LinkedIn connection invitation to school alumni.

Description: Microsoft Teams: App lists and banners in the app management page
Details: The Manage Apps page today allows admins to manage apps in the tenant. Lists of apps and editorial banners aid the admin to find relevant apps for the tenant.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Enriching the App detailed page with more descriptive App information In Teams admin center
Details: The app detail page will provide greater description for each app, including images and product videos.

Description: Microsoft Teams: New guest user usability improvements enabling pending invitation decline and show/hide guest tenant list from Teams app account setting
Details: A guest user can now leave an org from Teams app account settings. A guest user can also choose to hide/show guest tenants from the Teams account settings.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Outlook: Text Predictions on iOS
Details: Outlook can suggest words and phrases as you compose messages. When Outlook offers a suggestion, swipe to accept it.

Description: Microsoft Edge: Cloud Site List Management for IE mode
Details: Microsoft Edge with IE mode creates a seamless single browser experience for enterprise environments with a mix of legacy and modern applications. Cloud Site List Management enables you to manage your site lists for IE mode in the cloud without needing on-premises infrastructure to host your organization's site list. You can access this through the Microsoft Edge Site Lists experience in the M365 Admin Center. You can create, import, edit and export your site lists as well as publish site lists to the cloud. Multiple site lists can be published to the cloud and group policy can be used to assign different groups of devices to use different lists.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Chat with Teams personal account users
Details: Teams users will be able to chat with team members who are outside their work network and have a Teams personal account. This is expanding on external access capabilities, enabling Teams users to invite for a 1:1 or group chat any other federated Teams users using an email address or phone number and remain within the security and compliance policies of their organization.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Configure your activity feed notifications
Details: Users will be able to control the type of notifications that appear in their activity feed. Right click on the feed item, and you will be able to turn on or off all reactions or stop specific app notifications from surfacing in the activity feed.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Outlook: Text Predictions on Android
Details: Outlook can suggest words and phrases as you compose messages. When Outlook offers a suggestion, swipe to accept it.

Description: OneDrive and SharePoint: Markup Ink for Edit HVC (high-value controls)
Details: With markup(ink), users can draw and add notes on their photos to convey their messages and reveal the pattern and information perhaps unclear in an initial, surface look when self-teaching and even more important when sharing photos.
Tags - Release phase: Targeted Release, Targeted Release (Entire Organization), Targeted Release (Select People)

Description: Microsoft Teams: Sign out from Teams Admin Center on Teams displays
Details: Tenant admins can remotely provision, sign-in and sign-out of a Teams device that has previously not been provisioned from the Teams Admin Center.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Insider risk management – File exfiltration signals from Edge or Chrome browsers
Details: This allows your organization to detect and act on browser exfiltration signals for all non-executable files viewed in Microsoft Edge and Google Chrome browsers. This is currently available in public preview.
