Insider Risk Management in Microsoft 365 correlates various signals from the chip to the cloud to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, security and policy violations, and more. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to ensure user-level privacy.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Insider risk management – Policy health status
Details: The policy health status gives you insights into any potential issues with your insider risk management policies. Thisis currently available in public preview. Insider Risk Management in Microsoft 365 correlates various signals from the chip to the cloud to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, security and policy violations, and more. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to ensure user-level privacy.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Insider risk management – "Watch the watchers" audit trail
Details: The insider risk management audit log enables you to stay informed on the actions that were taken on insider risk management features. Thisis currently available in public preview. Insider Risk Management in Microsoft 365 correlates various signals from the chip to the cloud to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, security and policy violations, and more. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to ensure user-level privacy.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Insider risk management – Intelligent detections: Domain settings
Details: You can specify domains in global settings which helps you to increase or decrease the risk scoring for activity that takes place with these domains. Additionally, you can use wildcards to help match variations of root domains or subdomains. Thisis currently available in public preview. Insider Risk Management in Microsoft 365 correlates various signals from the chip to the cloud to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, security and policy violations, and more. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to ensure user-level privacy.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Insider risk management –  Policy customization
Details: You can now customize the thresholds for the policy indicators that influence an activity's risk score, which in turn determines whether an alert's severity is low, medium, or high. Thisis currently available in public preview. Insider Risk Management in Microsoft 365 correlates various signals from the chip to the cloud to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, security and policy violations, and more. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to ensure user-level privacy.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Insider risk management –  Enhancements to content explorer
Details: The Microsoft 365 Insider risk management solution will have an improved performance and experience within the content explorer, including transparency of document loads and completeness. Thisis currently available in public preview. Insider Risk Management in Microsoft 365 correlates various signals from the chip to the cloud to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, security and policy violations, and more. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to ensure user-level privacy.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Insider risk management –  Native triggers for Azure AD account deletion
Details: Automatically detect user account deletion in Azure Active Directory for your organization to start scoring for risk indicators in the Data theft by departing users policy template. Thisis currently available in public preview. Insider Risk Management in Microsoft 365 correlates various signals from the chip to the cloud to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, security and policy violations, and more. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to ensure user-level privacy.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Teams: Teams support of guest users with credentials managed by the host tenant
Details: Support internal guest users with credentials managed by the resource tenant (formerly known as State 3 and State 4 guests accounts).
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Graph: Microsoft 365 Compliance Records Management
Details: The first release of Microsoft 365 Records Management Graph APIs will enable organizations to create and manage retention labels and events, and event types for event-based retention.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Teams: Tab actions are moving
Details: Microsoft Teams tab actions are moving out of the tab header bar and into the tab dropdown to help declutter the user experience. This impacts all application tabs such as Assignments, Grades, Planner or the Website tab. These tab actions will be found by clicking on the tab name to show a dropdown menu and include: Reload tab, Go to website, Copy link to tab, Pop-out tab, and About this tab.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft 365 admin center: Viva Learning Usage Report
Details: This report will help IT admins can understand the activity of every user licensed to use Viva Learning, by looking at their interaction. It also helps IT admins understand the type of features being used within the Learning App.

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Insider risk management –  Device indicators
Details: These include policy indicators for activities such as sharing files over the network or with devices. Thisis currently available in public preview. Insider Risk Management in Microsoft 365 correlates various signals from the chip to the cloud to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, security and policy violations, and more. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to ensure user-level privacy.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Information Barriers - Segments and Policies landing pages
Details: The Information Barriers solution within the Microsoft 365 compliance center enables organizations to restrict communication and collaboration between two user groups to avoid a conflict of interest from occurring. This user experience (UX) update adds solution landing pages for management of segments and policies.

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Privacy management - Privacy API
Details: To meet customers where they are in their privacy journey, we have built programmatic access to APIs so that customers can use their homegrown app or an ISV app to automatically create and manage subject rights requests in the Privacy management solution within the Microsoft 365 compliance center.

Description: Microsoft Intune and Microsoft Endpoint Manager: Import group policies into Settings Catalog
Details: Add group policies (GPO) used to manage devices on premises to the Endpoint Manager settings catalog so they can be used by customers for cloud or co management.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Intune and Microsoft Endpoint Manager: Defender for MacOS policies in Settings Catalog
Details: Use the settings catalog to configure Microsoft Defender policies for MacOS.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Intune and Microsoft Endpoint Manager: Enroll personally owned devices in Intune based on Apple ID and Apple's account driven approach
Details: Use Apple account driven enrollment to onboard devices into Intune.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Intune and Microsoft Endpoint Manager: Add DMG type app management for MacOS
Details: Extend app deployment and management to include DMG type apps for MacOS.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Intune and Microsoft Endpoint Manager: Linux desktop compliance and reporting
Details: Register, manage and secure Linux Ubuntu desktops and use conditional access for compliance.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Intune and Microsoft Endpoint Manager: Support new security baseline for Office
Details: Customers can manage and deploy the Office security baseline using mobile device management (MDM) settings and the Intune experiences around upgrade, comparison, and reporting.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Intune: Security policies for unenrolled Microsoft Defender for Endpoint devices
Details: Manage the security policies on Windows and Windows server that are not enrolled in Intune or Configuration Manager but have Microsoft Defender for Endpoint.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Intune and Microsoft Endpoint Manager: Remote help for Windows
Details: Enable a secure helpdesk to user connection with permission based remote assistance.

Description: Microsoft Intune and Microsoft Endpoint Manager: Customized compliance settings for Windows
Details: Customize the settings in Endpoint Manager to determine app, Operating System, and Windows device compliance.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Intune and Microsoft Endpoint Manager: VPN Tunnel on enrolled devices
Details: Combined Defender for Endpoint app with Tunnel functionality for friction free anti-phishing and remote VPN.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Outlook: Support for Local Folders (On My Computer) in the New Outlook for Mac
Details: Local data is saved in "On My Computer" folder in the navigation pane. The items in these folders are saved only on your computer and are not synchronized with a mail server. In the new Outlook for Mac, we are working to migrate and support the local folders.
Tags - Release phase: General Availability, Current Channel, Current Channel (Preview)
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Germany, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Information Governance - Allow record label to start "unlocked" for manual records declaration
Details: Organizations sometimes need the ability to declare a file as a record after a period of collaboration. This update allows records managers to apply a record label to content but allow collaboration. Users can then toggle a switch when ready to lock the file and prevent edits.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Information Protection: Maintain label and protection when creating PDF files from Office apps
Details: Labels and protection applied on Office documents will be persisted to the output file when converting to PDF in Word, Excel, and PowerPoint on PC, Mac, Web.

Description: Microsoft Information Protection: Updated user experience for picking and seeing sensitivity labels in Office apps
Details: Word, Excel, and PowerPoint apps provide a highly visible sensitivity label and easy-to-use interface for choosing labels. Includes label color defined in compliance portal.

Description: Outlook: Support for AppleScript in the New Outlook for Mac
Details: AppleScript is a language used to automate the actions of the MacOS and many of its applications. We will add support for this feature in the new Outlook for Mac.
Tags - Release phase: General Availability, Current Channel, Current Channel (Preview)
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Germany, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Viva: Support bookmarks with topic answers in Microsoft Search
Details: You'll be able to see both bookmarks and topic answer cards in Microsoft Search if both exist and are relevant to your query.

Description: Microsoft Stream: Record a new video on the Stream Start page in Office for Government clouds
Details: Users can create a new video directly from the Stream Start page in Office web by recording their webcam and/or screen. The new video is uploaded to OneDrive and ready to share.

Description: Microsoft Stream: Preview of new video start page on Office for GCC-H and DOD
Details: The new video start page in Office web brings together all your videos uploaded to Microsoft Teams, SharePoint, OneDrive, Yammer, and across the suite and enables you to easily create new videos and get to videos shared with and recommended for you.
Tags - Product: SharePoint, Microsoft Stream, OneDrive, Office app

Description: Microsoft Teams: Extend Room reservations for Microsoft Teams panels
Details: From a Microsoft Teams panel, users can extend their existing meeting room reservation. The reservation can only be extended if the room is available during that time.

Description: Outlook: New options for RSVP responses
Details: New RSVP response options in Outlook lets people know if you will be attending a meeting online or in-person.

Description: Microsoft Viva: Simple topic segmentation
Details: Create segments of topics based on sites and information architecture.

Description: Microsoft Viva: Display connected topics on people profile cards
Details: Profile cards displayed through Outlook will display Topics associated to an individual.

Description: Microsoft Information Protection: Apply default label policies to existing documents being edited
Details: Users with default labeling policies will now support applying that default to any supported document they edit. Previously this only applied to new documents.  The preview is available in Current Channel-Preview.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Stream: Comment on a video or audio file in SharePoint and OneDrive
Details: This feature builds on top of the already existing comments found in OneDrive and SharePoint Online but presents these comments with a new Office look and feel within the player. This feature allows users with view permissions to leave a comment and users with edit permissions to @ mention, which are both default changes in behavior in terms of permissions for video and audio files.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Stream: Record a new video on the Stream Start page in Office
Details: Users can create a new video directly from the Stream Start page on Office.com by recording their webcam or screen. The new video is uploaded to OneDrive and ready to share.

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Information Governance - Configuration option to block the ability to edit metadata for records
Details: This update allows records management admins to prevent users from editing metadata on items designated as records on SharePoint and OneDrive. This is currently available in Preview.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Information Protection: Co-authoring on MIP-encrypted documents on Mobile
Details: Multiple authors can edit labeled and protected documents in Word, Excel, and PowerPoint simultaneously, frictionless, and with auto-save, as if they were regular documents.

Description: Microsoft Graph: SharePoint Content Type Graph APIs
Details: New Graph APIs that allow developers to work directly with Content Types and align with content type synchronization enhancements, by enabling them to fetch and sync published content types present in content type hub site to a target site.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Stream: Add chapters to help viewers find the right part of a video
Details: Users with edit access to a video uploaded to SharePoint, OneDrive, Teams, and Yammer can now add chapters to help viewers identify information in the video. For each chapter you can specify a point in time in the video and title of that chapter which will show up in the table of contents side pane for the video as well as on the video timeline.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Outlook: Third-party support for Meetings online by default
Details: Previously, Outlook released the option for meetings to be online by default. In that release, the feature was only available to users of Microsoft Teams and Skype for Business. This update will add support for users of third-party online meeting providers to make their meetings online by default, or to select their preferred online meeting provider if they use multiple providers.
Tags - Release phase: General Availability, Current Channel, Semi-Annual Enterprise Channel
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Germany, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: PowerPoint: Organization Fonts in PowerPoint for web
Details: This feature will allow organizations to add their custom fonts into PowerPoint.

Description: Microsoft Viva: Topic engagement analytics
Details: This update will introduce usage and engagement analytics on topics (views, edits, etc.) to the Microsoft Admin Center.

Description: Microsoft Viva: Topic Management - Metadata
Details: You'll be able to sort ad filter on additional usage data in the topic center, including metrics, usage, quality, and more.

Description: Microsoft Viva: Topic Management - Navigation
Details: We're integrating all stages of topic lifecycles into a unified list with filtering and sorting my lifecycle stage and other data.  Combined with search, this will help you find specific topics when the volume of topics in the system is large.

Description: Outlook: Viva topics in Outlook
Details: Viva topics can identify key words in email messages you receive from your business associates with internal topics and create a curated summary including a description, people associated with the topic, and related files. It also allows the sender of an email to manually tag words as topics to provide more richness in your communications.

Description: Microsoft 365 admin center: Ability to show multiple services being impacted by a single issue
Details: Today when there is a broadly impacting issue that affects multiple services across the M365 services, Microsoft will create a single incident usually under Microsoft 365 Suite. In the message details of this incident, we will call out specific services impacted with their overall current state.

Description: Microsoft Viva: Automatic topic relationships
Details: AI suggests relationships between topics, and the topic page and card reflects these connections in the knowledge graph (first degree).

Description: Microsoft Viva: Topic discovery analytics
Details: Transparency through analytics on topic discovery for organizations (Stage 1) to support ROI and understanding of progress of topic discovery.

Description: SharePoint Syntex: Responsible AI guardrails for Image Tags (editable column and feedback UX)
Details: “Tags” column changes from read only to a new editable “Image Tags” column so that customers can add and remove tags at their discretion.  It also incorporates a way for users to provide feedback on the quality of AI generated tags from within the details pane
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Germany, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Viva: Supporting four additional languages for Headspace in Viva Insights- French, German, Portuguese, and Spanish
Details: Guided meditations and mindfulness exercises from Headspace in the Viva Insights app in Microsoft Teams will be available in additional languages – French, German, Portuguese, and Spanish – to foster mindfulness and wellbeing throughout the workday.
Tags - Platform: Android, Mac, iOS, Web, Desktop, Mobile

Description: Microsoft Defender for Endpoint: Endpoint discovery for Microsoft Defender for Endpoint in GCC-H
Details: Endpoint Discovery and Network Device Assessment Jobs for Microsoft Defender for Endpoint enables organizations to discover and secure unmanaged endpoints. Once discovered integrated workflows can be used to secure the devices using Defender for Endpoint’s threat and vulnerability management, threat detection and automated incident responses capabilities.

Description: SharePoint Syntex: Prebuilt models for invoices and receipts
Details: Analyze and extract structured information from sales invoices or receipts using prebuilt models.

Description: SharePoint Syntex: Provide a document card view for applied Syntex document understanding models
Details: A new library view setting to display extracted model information in a tile view.

Description: SharePoint Syntex: Content center site design available in Look Book
Details: A Syntex content center site design will be available for provisioning from the SharePoint look book online.

Description: SharePoint: Automatically build visualization of library metadata with Power BI
Details: Enables customers to visualize the metadata in a document library in a Power BI report. They can also save that report so that future visitors to the document library can view it.

Description: SharePoint Syntex: Import sample contracts library
Details: This feature enables customers to import a sample contracts library with a document understanding model already applied.  They can use this library as is or explore and adapt it for their scenario.

Description: SharePoint Syntex: Flow template to send customized email after file classification
Details: Flow template to send customized email when file is classified by a Syntex model

Description: SharePoint: Rules engine for alerts
Details: We’re also adding a no-code rules engine to drive content alerts.  Based on the rules wizard in Microsoft Lists, alerts use a simple, no-code wizard to send updates when documents are added or deleted, or when someone edits metadata.

Description: OneDrive: Limit OneDrive access and sharing to specified users
Details: Ability to allow only specified users access to OneDrive in your tenant.

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Power BI sensitivity label data in Activity Explorer (DoD)
Details: Power BI will send sensitivity label activity data to Activity Explorer for admins to search and review along with the rest of the Microsoft Information Protection (MIP), Azure Information Protection (AIP), and Data Loss Prevention (DLP) data sets from native Office apps and other cloud resources.

Description: SharePoint: MSFT Editor Spellcheck and Grammar in SharePoint Pages
Details: We are adding the Microsoft Editor service to SharePoint Pages and News and enabling their spellcheck and grammar capabilities. This will allow proofreading to take place in SharePoint without relying on the Editor browser extension. This feature changes the suggestions colors to monochrome when they're shown on a themed background to increase visibility.
Tags - Release phase: General Availability, Targeted Release (Entire Organization), Targeted Release (Select People)

Description: Visio: Viewer enhancements in Microsoft Teams
Details: This capability enables both users with and without a Visio license to complete simple tasks on Visio files stored in Teams, like commenting, sharing, printing, downloading their Visio diagram as an image or PDF, and more from within Teams.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Presenter Mode in desktop or window sharing for GCC-High and DoD
Details: Standout, Reporter and Side-by-side Presenter modes are now available when sharing a window or your desktop. Standout overlays your video on top of the content for a more immersive presenting experience. Reporter places content as a visual aid above your shoulder like a news story. Side-by-side displays your video feed next to your content. Presenter mode for PowerPoint Live sharing is coming in the future.

Description: Microsoft Teams: MacOS native notifications in Teams for GCC High
Details: Users can now choose to get Microsoft Teams notifications, either via Teams built-in notifications or via macOS native notifications. When choosing native notifications, Teams inherits the OS notifications settings and supports quiet hours, action centre triaging and do not disturb (DND).

Description: SharePoint Syntex: local document understanding model creation
Details: Allows for the creation of local Syntex models in Team and Communication sites.
Tags - Release phase: General Availability, Preview, Targeted Release (Entire Organization)

Description: Yammer: Mobile App Minimum Support Changes
Details: For the Yammer app on iOS devices, iOS 14 or later will now be required for the Yammer mobile app. Phones running iOS 12 and 13 will still be able to use Yammer after the cutoff but won't receive any new app updates. For the Yammer app on Android, anyone using an app version older than 5.6.46.2126 (released May 6, 2020) will need to update to the latest version. The latest version requires devices running Android 6.0 or newer.

Description: Microsoft Viva: Admin controls for preview features
Details: This feature in the Admin Center delivers a control to let you select specific users to see preview features for customers enrolled in our Early Adopter Program.

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Insider Risk Management analytics
Details: The Microsoft 365 Insider Risk Management solution will now provide aggregated and anonymized analytics to help identify potential insider risk activity within the organization. This is currently available in public preview. Insider Risk Management in Microsoft 365 correlates various signals from the chip to the cloud to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, security and policy violations, and more. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to ensure user-level privacy.

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: AIP client and scanner data surfaced in Content explorer
Details: All files detected by the AIP_Onprem_scanner via the 'Discover' event will be showcased in the Content explorer under two new on-premises locations: File Share and SharePoint Server.

Description: Microsoft Information Protection: New roles and role groups for granular permissions management
Details: We’re releasing new roles and role groups to allow granular permissions to manage Information Protection and Data Loss Prevention (DLP) within the Microsoft 365 compliance center.
Tags - Product: Microsoft Information Protection, Microsoft Compliance center

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Advanced eDiscovery – Hold reports
Details: Out-of-the-box reports that contain information about all legal holds associated with eDiscovery cases in the Microsoft 365 compliance center. Sort and filter your view based on various criteria and download the aggregated information for further analysis.

Description: Microsoft Viva: Topics integration to Outlook Web (Preview)
Details: Display suggested and directly referenced topics from inbound emails in a pulldown pane and attach topics when composing messages using hashtag.

Description: Microsoft Viva: Manager insights in Microsoft Viva Insights app, Outlook and Office.com for GCC
Details: To empower managers to foster productivity and wellbeing for teams - large or small - new insights and tools are being introduced in the "My team" tab of the Microsoft Viva Insights app in Teams for GCC, as well as in manager cards in the daily briefing and monthly digest emails from Microsoft Viva. These will help managers explore and improve their personal habits and team culture. Further, a new Viva Insights team home page will be discoverable at Office.com.

Description: OneDrive: Sync admin reports - bulk data export
Details: Support for bulk export of device status, including username, sync app version, known folders, last sync date, and sync errors.

Description: Microsoft Stream: Add or Edit captions and transcript for a video in SharePoint or OneDrive in DoD
Details: You can upload, download, and delete captions in the Web VTT file format for a video in SharePoint or OneDrive. This will enable you to edit transcript files generated by Teams live transcript or Stream via downloading the file, editing in a text or VTT editor, and re-uploading it. The VTT file will be displayed as captions inside the video player and as a transcript in the transcript pane next to the video.

Description: Outlook: Add apps and use them inside Outlook
Details: Apps built for Teams can also run in Outlook now. Outlook users will be able to acquire and use these updated Teams apps (with personal tabs and/or search-based message extensions) without leaving Outlook.

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Information Governance - Power Automate integration
Details: Initiate a Power Automate workflow when the item reaches the end of its retention period. For example, execute a complex disposition approval process or move the file to an archive.

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Communication Compliance analyze linked content from OneDrive and SharePoint online (modern attachments)
Details: Communication Compliance policies that detect violations in Microsoft Teams will analyze the content of documents shared in chat for potential policy match. Communication Compliance helps organizations detect explicit code of conduct and regulatory compliance violations, such as harassing or threatening language, sharing of adult content, and inappropriate sharing of sensitive information. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are explicitly opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to ensure user-level privacy.

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Communication Compliance integration with Power Automate for GCC
Details: Communication Compliance integration with Power Automate allows organizations to configure Power Automate flows to automate tasks for Communication Compliance cases and users. Currently available in public preview. Communication Compliance helps organizations detect explicit code of conduct and regulatory compliance violations, such as harassing or threatening language, sharing of adult content, and inappropriate sharing of sensitive information. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are explicitly opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to ensure user-level privacy.

Description: Outlook: Automatic file name replacement and permission management when sharing a file as a link
Details: The new Outlook for Mac will automatically shorten links and assign the file name for OneDrive and SharePoint files using the document’s name as URL. With this update you can also see and manage the files' permissions. Note: Legacy Outlook for Mac won't receive this update.
Tags - Release phase: General Availability, Current Channel, Current Channel (Preview)
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft 365 Compliance Center: Communication Compliance detect customer complaints
Details: Detect customer complaints made on your organization's products or services with Communication Compliance's new machine learning classifier, customer complaints. This new feature can help organizations meet regulations that mandate detection and triage of complaints, such as the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau and the Food and Drug Administrator requirements. Communication Compliance helps organizations detect explicit code of conduct and regulatory compliance violations, such as harassing or threatening language, sharing of adult content, and inappropriate sharing of sensitive information. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are explicitly opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to ensure user-level privacy.

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Communication Compliance - Reduce detection to investigation time from 24 hours to 1 hour
Details: This feature will reduce the detection to investigation time to under an hour, allowing your organization to respond promptly to policy violations. The alert will be reviewed by a policy investigator, who is explicitly granted permission to review policy alerts by the Communication Compliance admin role. Communication Compliance helps organizations detect explicit code of conduct and regulatory compliance violations, such as harassing or threatening language, sharing of adult content, and inappropriate sharing of sensitive information. Details: Microsoft Teams users are empowered to report inappropriate or concerning messages within Teams chat and channels. These reported messages are then submitted to a Communication Compliance policy for investigators to review and take action if deemed necessary. Details: Make more informed remediation actions with machine learning (ML) model highlighting. This feature gives investigators greater context around which word or key phrase triggered an ML model policy match and caused a classifier to catch a message. Details: Leveraging Azure Cognitive Services sentiment analysis, messages will be flagged as positive, negative, or neutral sentiment, helping policy investigators prioritize riskier messages to address first. Communication Compliance helps organizations detect explicit code of conduct and regulatory compliance violations, such as harassing or threatening language, sharing of adult content, and inappropriate sharing of sensitive information. Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Communication Compliance - Accelerate onboarding with step-by-step guidance
Details: This feature will provide step-by-step guidance on how to properly configure, triage, and remediate policies, highlighting tasks that are heavily leveraged by a user's role group. Communication Compliance helps organizations detect explicit code of conduct and regulatory compliance violations, such as harassing or threatening language, sharing of adult content, and inappropriate sharing of sensitive information. Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Communication Compliance - Expanded Optical Character Recognition to support handwritten and printed text
Details: Expanding optical character recognition beyond text extracted from images or PDFs to include handwritten and printed text, which will then be evaluated against the customers policy conditions (such as keywords matches for threatening language), further reducing an organizations policy violation risk. Communication Compliance helps organizations detect explicit code of conduct and regulatory compliance violations, such as harassing or threatening language, sharing of adult content, and inappropriate sharing of sensitive information. Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Insider risk management - Noisy signal management - Site URL and keyword exclusions
Details: Define specific site URLs and keywords to manage user activity signals that may be considered noisy. Insider Risk Management in Microsoft 365 correlates various signals from the chip to the cloud to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, security and policy violations, and more. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to ensure user-level privacy.

Description: Azure Active Directory: Customize SSPR, footer hyperlinks and favicon in Company Branding
Details: Today, self-service password reset (SSPR) and footer hyperlinks direct end-users to Microsoft resources. Also, Microsoft logo is rendered in the browser tab. We're introducing the ability to customize them and remove all references to Microsoft.

Description: Exchange: Adding Outbound support for DNSSEC or DANE for SMTP to Exchange Online
Details: Microsoft is committed to providing world-class email security solutions and the support for the latest Internet standards to provide advanced email protection for our customers. With this change we are adding outbound Support for DNSSEC or DANE for SMTP to Exchange Online.

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Insider risk management - Enhancements to Recommended Actions
Details: Enhancements include ability to turn on email notification for key events as well as additional suggestions to maximize value. Insider Risk Management in Microsoft 365 correlates various signals from the chip to the cloud to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, security and policy violations, and more. Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Insider risk management - Enhancements to Analytics
Details: Enhancements to Analytics including ability to leverage Analytics to recommend thresholds for data leak and departing employee data theft policies and inclusions of Sequence detection within Analytics. Insider Risk Management in Microsoft 365 correlates various signals from the chip to the cloud to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, security and policy violations, and more. Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Insider risk management - Alert triage improvements
Details: Various experience improvements based on feedback to accelerate time-to-action including ability to further drill into Sequences within Activity Explorer, new filtering capability as well as enhanced User Activity Timeline view which includes a richer alert history. Insider Risk Management in Microsoft 365 correlates various signals from the chip to the cloud to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, security and policy violations, and more. Details: Leverage trainable classifiers from Microsoft Information Protection (MIP) to recognize various content types specific to your organization. Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Insider risk management - Enhancement to Insider risk audit logs
Details: Additional audit of events included in the Insider risk audit logs including activities within Content Explorer, Activity Explorer, and User Timeline. Insider Risk Management in Microsoft 365 correlates various signals from the chip to the cloud to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, security and policy violations, and more. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to ensure user-level privacy.

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Insider risk management - Anomaly-as-a-Policy-Trigger
Details: Customize a policy to trigger on an anomalous activity (e.g., anomalous quantity of sensitive document downloads). Insider Risk Management in Microsoft 365 correlates various signals from the chip to the cloud to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, security and policy violations, and more. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to ensure user-level privacy.
