Details: Define specific file paths to manage user activity signals that may be considered noisy. Insider Risk Management in Microsoft 365 correlates various signals from the chip to the cloud to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, security and policy violations, and more. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to ensure user-level privacy.

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Insider risk management - Enhancements to Cumulative exfiltration anomaly detector (CEAD)
Details: CEAD will include experience enhancements to make it easier to evaluate the risk as well as leverage priority content and document sensitivities to further prioritize alerts. Insider Risk Management in Microsoft 365 correlates various signals from the chip to the cloud to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, security and policy violations, and more. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to ensure user-level privacy.

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Advanced eDiscovery: Support Teams reactions (US Government clouds)
Details: Discover Teams reactions (heart, thumbs up, thumbs down, laugh, surprised, angry) in Advanced eDiscovery.

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Advanced eDiscovery - Collections and processing enhancement (US Government clouds)
Details: Enhancements to the Advanced eDiscovery Collections and Processing experience with three core updates, including updates to embedded items handling, a new collection setting to include partially indexed items, and additional document metadata for SharePoint content.

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Advanced eDiscovery – Identify Teams as data sources
Details: Simplified picking of relevant Teams and channels (standard, private, and shared) to intelligently identify associated custodian mailboxes, group mailboxes, OneDrive for Business accounts, and SharePoint sites that may contain Teams data that's relevant to your case.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Outlook: Working hours and location
Details: New working hours and location options in Outlook lets people set more flexible working hours each day and specify the location from where they plan to work.

Description: Microsoft 365 admin center: Reports in the Admin Center - Visio Usage Report
Details: A new report will be made available to help customers understand how Microsoft Visio is used within their organization.

Description: Outlook: New location for add-ins and integration with Teams search-based message extensions
Details: We are consolidating all the add-ins into a flyout menu in the ribbon and adding Teams search-based message extensions into this same flyout.

Description: Outlook: Support for Retention Policies
Details: Use retention policies in Outlook for Mac to apply a policy to your messages in your mailbox. Retention policies define how long your messages will be saved. This update will only work in the new Outlook for Mac.
Tags - Release phase: General Availability, Current Channel, Current Channel (Preview)
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Office app: Microsoft Office Default change – Blocking VBA macros in files from the internet
Details: To help improve security, we are changing the behavior of Office applications to block macros in files from the internet.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Stream: Add or Edit captions and transcript for a video in SharePoint or OneDrive for GCC and GCC-High
Details: You can upload, download, and delete captions in the Web VTT file format for a video in SharePoint or OneDrive. This will enable you to edit transcript files generated by Teams live transcript or Stream via downloading the file, editing in a text or VTT editor, and re-uploading it. The VTT file will be displayed as captions inside the video player and as a transcript in the transcript pane next to the video.

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Advanced eDiscovery - Collection of Teams conversation as transcript (US gov clouds)
Details: eDiscovery managers will soon have the flexibility to collect Teams messages as transcript items. Transcripts will aggregate and thread messages in the same Teams conversations into a single HTML file that is available for review and export. Customers will continue to have the ability to collect Teams messages as individual items as offered today.

Description: Microsoft Information Protection: Advanced Message Encryption - Office 365 Message Encryption portal access logs
Details: This feature will enable logging of external user activities accessing the Office 365 Message Encryption Portal to retrieve encrypted mail. The logs can be retrieved using the Audit Logs functionality in the Microsoft 365 compliance center.
Tags - Product: Microsoft Information Protection, Microsoft Compliance center

Description: Microsoft Project: Templates in Project for the web
Details: Get started quickly by using a pre-made template as a jumping off point for your work.

Description: Visio: Mind maps in Visio for the web
Details: Brainstorm and capture information in a structured format that makes it easy to understand and recall with new mind map shapes in Visio for the web.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Germany, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Outlook: Folders and Rules support for Microsoft 365 Groups in Outlook
Details: Users will be able to move, copy and create rules to organize messages across different folders in the Groups mailbox. Groups can have folder hierarchy in the Groups section of mail module.

Description: Yammer: Support for Microsoft Defender for Cloud Apps (formerly Microsoft Cloud App Security)
Details: Yammer supports Microsoft Defender for Cloud Apps (formerly Microsoft Cloud App Security). Users are properly routed to their intended target destination after authentication via Microsoft Defender for Cloud Apps.

Description: SharePoint Syntex: Image tagging
Details: Automatically recognize thousands of standard objects and automatically tag the file with recognized items.

Description: Outlook: Contact lists
Details: The new Outlook for Mac is adding support for Contact lists (aka Personal Distribution Lists).

Description: Excel: Run your Office scripts from a workbook button now on Windows
Details: Previously, Office scripts could be run via buttons by everyone with access to the workbook in Excel on the web. Now, you can run that same button on your windows client.

Description: Outlook for Windows: New location for key Outlook modules and integration with other Microsoft 365 apps – now default experience
Details: The main modules in Outlook such as email, calendar, tasks, and people are moving to the left of the folder pane. We are also adding a way for users to quickly access To Do, Org Explorer, Yammer Communities, and Bookings directly inside Outlook. You can customize by pinning preferred Outlook and Microsoft 365 apps.

Description: Visio: Enhanced UX interactivity and responsiveness in Visio for the web
Details: Improved user experience in Visio for the web with faster interaction speed during resizing shapes, moving shapes, and routing connectors.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Germany, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Visio: Extend interoperability between the Visio web and desktop apps
Details: Users will be able to open files that were previously not supported for editing in Visio for the web and edit shapes with 1D and 2D protection, and additional shape properties. However, some interactions will be blocked or optimized.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Visio: Pictures for organizational charts in Visio for the web [Visio Plan 1, Plan 2]
Details: Users with a Visio Plan 1 or Visio Plan 2 license will be able to add pictures of team members directly to new org chart shapes in Visio for the web.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Advanced eDiscovery – Collections and processing enhancement
Details: We're enhancing the Advanced eDiscovery Collections and Processing experience with three core updates, including updates to embedded items handling, a new collection setting to include partially indexed items, and additional document metadata for SharePoint content.

Description: Microsoft Project: Allow Microsoft 365 users to provide progress updates on their assigned tasks
Details: Users with Microsoft 365 licenses can mark their Project for the web tasks complete and change the percent complete for their tasks, without a Project license.

Description: Outlook: Delegate access control on protected emails
Details: Outlook will provide consistent access control on protected emails for delegates and shared mailbox members. For delegates or shared mailbox members, when they have full access of the owner's mailbox but are not allowed to read encrypted email, Outlook will have a new setting to block the owner's protected email access which covers ad-hoc encrypted email as well as email with protected MIP sensitivity labels.

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Exact Data Match updated UI wizard
Details: An updated Exact Data Match (EDM) UI wizard will replace the current wizard in the Microsoft 365 compliance center, offering both an improved manual configuration as well as a new guided experience.
Tags - Product: Microsoft Information Protection, Microsoft Compliance center
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: SharePoint: Easily create Power Automate flows from built-in list templates
Details: Lists ready-made templates are getting a boost. You can install Power Automate flows whenever you create a list from select list templates. The following templates will have reminder flows available to use as you create your list: Work progress tracker, Content scheduler, and Recruitment tracker.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft 365 admin center: Tenant-level analytics for Power Automate
Details: Admins can use out-of-box reports to monitor usage and track inventory of Cloud Flows used for automation procedures across the organization at the tenant and environment level.

Description: OneDrive: Activity column in My Files
Details: When you navigate to the "My Files" page in OneDrive for Business Web, you'll see an Activity column that shows which of your shared documents have unseen edits and comment.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Visio: New stencil for shapes in your document in Visio for the web for GCC, GCC-High, and DoD [Visio Plan 2]
Details: This release extends the availability of the new stencil for shapes in your document in Visio for the web (feature ID 68375) to GCC, GCC-High, DoD, and other sovereign clouds. The new Shapes in the Document stencil automatically saves the shapes you've added to your diagram, so you can quickly access them and use them again without having to search through multiple stencils. This feature will be available for users with a Visio Plan 2 license.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Virtual Visits usage report in Teams Admin Center
Details: The Virtual Visits usage report in the Microsoft Teams admin center gives you an overview of Teams Virtual Visits activity in your organization for Global Admins and Teams Admin. Customer can view detailed activity for virtual appointments scheduled through the Bookings app and the Microsoft Teams Electronic Health Records (EHR) connector.

Description: Microsoft Stream: Configure Stream tile in M365 app launcher to go to new Stream app on Office.com
Details: SharePoint tenant admins can configure Stream tile in M365 app launcher to go to Stream (Classic) or to the new Stream app on office.com.
Tags - Product: Microsoft 365 Admin Center, Microsoft Stream, Office app
Tags - Release phase: General Availability, Targeted Release (Entire Organization), Targeted Release (Select People)

Description: Microsoft Viva: Shared focus plan in Viva Insights
Details: The shared focus plan enables managers and team leads to foster mutual productivity norms and drive a positive team culture by inviting teams to book focus time for uninterrupted work.

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Teams data in Content explorer (US Government clouds)
Details: With the availability of Teams data in Content Explorer, customers will be able to display Sensitive information and Sensitivity labels detected on Teams data within the Content explorer.

Description: SharePoint: Manage apps using the App Catalog
Details: As a SharePoint or global admin in Microsoft 365, you can distribute custom apps that can be used across SharePoint, Microsoft Teams, and Viva Connections using the modernized App Catalog.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Visio: New shapes, stencils, and templates in Visio for the web
Details: Create diagrams for various scenarios like business frameworks, infographic timelines, prioritization matrices, flowcharts, and more with new shapes, stencils, and templates available in Visio for the web.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Germany, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: OneDrive: Sync admin reports - Windows support
Details: New dashboard to check sync app versions, sync status, top sync errors on individual devices, and monitor deployment progress of Known Folder Move.

Description: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Differentiated protection for Priority accounts
Details: We are introducing differentiated protection for Priority accounts, which will provide users tagged as Priority accounts with a higher level of protection. As part of this release, we are introducing a Context filter within Threat Explorer and the Threat Protection Status report through which you can search for emails where Priority account protection is involved. In addition, the Threat Detection Details tab on the Email Entity page will be updated to show the threats, corresponding detection details, and whether these detections were identified as part of Priority account protection.

Description: Visio: Improved interoperability between the Visio web and desktop apps
Details: This feature will enable users to open files that were previously not supported for editing in Visio for the web. Users will be able to edit shapes with certain properties like gradients, fills, and INK objects. However, some interactions will be blocked or optimized.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Updates to URL Protection Report
Details: We're making some updates to the URL protection report to make the report easier to use and give admins more insight. The action view will be updated to include four new action types, including Admin allowed, Admin block, pending scan, and Admin blocked with clickthrough. We're also consolidating the application view to classify all Office apps (Word, PowerPoint, Excel, OneNote, Visio) as Office rather than individual products.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Yammer: Admin enhancements for the new Yammer
Details: Yammer admins can enable the new Yammer for all users while being provided an opt-out option solely for admins. Admins will have the ability to toggle the classic Yammer experience if they need to validate user feedback or access features only available in classic Yammer.

Description: Forms: Direct share forms to people in your organization and get email notification
Details: Enable customers to share a form directly to people in their organization and receive form status by periodic email notification.

Description: Microsoft Project: Labels on Tasks
Details: Add up to 25 different colored labels to your tasks in Project for the web for better visual organization.

Description: SharePoint: Create and manage Power Apps from Microsoft Lists within Microsoft Teams
Details: Build low-code, mobile-friendly apps from Lists directly inside of Teams via a new integration with Power Apps. A published app can be added as a tab in a Teams channel and shared with the rest of your team, while maintaining its connection to the list as a source of data.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft 365 admin center: Inform users on how to reload a page in IE mode
Details: We're adding a new email template to the "Get fast, secure browsing with Microsoft Edge" feature on the admin center Setup page. Admins can send their users a quick reference on how to reload older sites in Internet Explorer mode when browsing in Microsoft Edge.

Description: Office app: Support for add-in metrics on Microsoft 365 Apps health dashboard
Details: A new view about add-in health is being added to the Microsoft 365 Apps health dashboard in the Microsoft 365 Apps admin center. The view will provide information about the reliability and performance of COM and VSTO add-ins used by Office apps in your organization.

Description: OneDrive and SharePoint: Access your Teams standard and private channel files
Details: When you navigate to a site in SharePoint or OneDrive, you'll be able to access the files stored in the Teams standard and private channels associated with that site.
Tags - Release phase: General Availability, Targeted Release (Entire Organization), Targeted Release (Select People)
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: OneDrive: Easily navigate to all your Teams files from OneDrive
Details: In OneDrive, we are adding a "Your Teams" section to the "More Places" page to allow you to easily find and work with all your files in Teams.
Tags - Release phase: General Availability, Targeted Release (Entire Organization), Targeted Release (Select People)
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Core and Advanced eDiscovery - Enhanced Keyword Query Language (KQL) editor experience (US Government clouds)
Details: The new Keyword Query Language (KQL) editor experiences improves the ability to quickly create an effective query with autofill of common properties and parameters, as well as highlights for potential and breaking errors with recommended mitigations. The KQL editor experience will be available across Core eDiscovery searches and Advanced eDiscovery collections experiences.

Description: Visio: Visio web app in Microsoft 365 for GCC, GCC-High, and DoD
Details: This release extends the availability of the Visio web app in Microsoft 365 to GCC, GCC-High, DoD, and other sovereign clouds. To help make diagramming more accessible, we’ve brought core Visio capabilities to Microsoft 365 commercial subscribers, enabling anyone to create, edit, share, and coauthor professional diagrams with team members across the organization.

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Endpoint data loss prevention (DLP) for macOS
Details: Currently available in public preview, Endpoint DLP for macOS extends the activity monitoring and protection capabilities of DLP to sensitive items that are on macOS devices. Once the Mac devices are onboarded into device management, the information about what users are doing with sensitive items is made visible in activity explorer and you can enforce protective actions on those items via DLP policies.

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Advanced eDiscovery – Communication templates and issuing officer settings
Details: Create communication templates and then simply select one to quickly draft your hold notifications. Add attorneys as issuing officers for your organization to send hold notifications on behalf of, without adding them as case members.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Advanced eDiscovery – Enhanced import custodians wizard experience
Details: The new import custodians wizard empowers eDiscovery managers to quickly validate and remediate any errors in their CSV file before submitting custodian import jobs.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Information governance: Retention label deletion behavior change in SharePoint for Government clouds
Details: Improved consistency of user experience between OneDrive and SharePoint, allowing users to “delete” files labeled with a retention label configured to “retain items for a specific period” as this operation is no longer blocked with an error message. When deleted, these files will still be preserved for compliance purposes by moving a copy of them to the “Preservation Hold Library” of the site where they can be accessed by eDiscovery and other compliance solutions.

Description: Visio: Self-service trials
Details: Users can explore all the capabilities of Visio Plan 1 or Visio Plan 2 for free using the self-service trial experience to sign up for a trial plan.

Description: SharePoint Syntex and SharePoint: Add taxonomy columns from modern library views
Details: Allows users to add taxonomy columns directly to library views in modern SharePoint and Syntex libraries.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Viva: Briefing Email support for Japanese and Simplified Chinese
Details: This personalized, actionable briefing email from Microsoft Viva, automatically delivered to your Outlook inbox to help you start the day on track and stay on top of tasks, will support Japanese and Simplified Chinese.

Description: Yammer: Support for EU members to be invited to External Networks hosted in the US
Details: Members from Yammer Networks hosted in the EU can be invited to and participate in Yammer External Networks hosted in the US.

Description: Outlook: New Outlook for Mac becomes the recommended default
Details: After a year as an opt-in preview, the new Outlook for Mac will become the recommended default experience for new and current customers. Customers will still be able to switch between the new and classic experience in the Help menu.
Tags - Release phase: Beta Channel, Current Channel, Current Channel (Preview)
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Viva: Enable search to add files or pages in Topic Pages
Details: Editors can pin files or pages to a topic page by searching for it in the resource picker.

Description: SharePoint: Microsoft Lists Customizable Command Bar
Details: You can personalize a list to suit your needs by customizing the command bar. Like how you can customize form headers and footers, the JSON based feature will allow basic changes to the command bar, including modification of icon or text, hiding existing options or repositioning commands.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Germany, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Outlook: Expands support for suggested replies in Japanese, Thai, and Turkish
Details: Outlook on the web, and Outlook for iOS and Android are extending support suggested replies in the following languages: Japanese, Thai, and Turkish.

Description: Bookings: Notification for new feature released
Details: A “new” pill and an “info (an icon)” tool tip have been added to discover new features, SMS notifications, and mobile browser join.

Description: Microsoft 365 admin center: Microsoft 365 Apps admin center Servicing Profile rollback capability
Details: This feature allows you to roll back devices to the previous version within Microsoft 365 Apps admin center - Servicing profiles. Servicing profiles helps your environment stay secure and UpToDate with most recent versions of Microsoft 365 Apps.

Description: SharePoint Syntex: Contract management accelerator
Details: Manage contracts in Syntex with automatic tagging and approval workflows, automatic clause generation and lifecycle management,

Description: SharePoint: Quick chart webpart for doc libraries
Details: Enables customers to create charts in the quick chart webpart leveraging metadata in a SharePoint document library.

Description: SharePoint Syntex: Content assembly
Details: Convert your existing docs into templates and generate new docs from list data or manual entries.

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Built-in filters in Activity explorer
Details: We are releasing built-in filters for use within Activity explorer to allow easy access to the most used filters.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft 365 admin center: Advanced Deployment Guides with Self-Service Automation focusing on Compliance Administration
Details: Updated step by step advanced setup wizards and automation to help tenant admins deploy services.
Tags - Product: Microsoft 365 Admin Center, Microsoft Information Protection, Microsoft Compliance center

Description: SharePoint Syntex: Content type to advanced metadata search
Details: Use content type classification to find files using advanced metadata search.

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Advanced eDiscovery – Historical versions for Government clouds
Details: Now eDiscovery admins can designate specific SharePoint Online or OneDrive for Business sites to enable for historical versions functionality. This capability will enable organizations to quickly search across not only the current version of documents, but all the versions of the document.

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Information governance - Apply retention label action at end of retention period
Details: When an item reaches the end of its retention period a new label can be automatically applied. This feature is useful for multi-stage retention when there are different retention settings in each phase of a file's lifecycle.

Description: OneDrive and SharePoint: Edit High Value Control (HVC) - High Efficiency Image Format (HEIC) File Support
Details: Users can edit (Crop or rotate, adjust, filter and markup) the High Efficiency Image Format (HEIC) files through the Edit HVC. After editing the image, if the user wishes to save the changes, the file would be copied as a new jpg file.
Tags - Release phase: Targeted Release, Targeted Release (Entire Organization), Targeted Release (Select People)

Description: OneDrive: New OneDrive Learning Tools Interoperability (LTI) Tool
Details: The new Microsoft OneDrive Learning Tools Interoperability (LTI) Tool allows K-12 and higher education institutions to integrate OneDrive and Office 365 with their learning management system (LMS). This tool allows educators and students to add and create OneDrive files, collaborate on Office 365 documents, and create and submit assignments within their learning management system. It brings the latest and greatest of OneDrive and Office 365 to our learning management system customers.

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Advanced eDiscovery – Hold reports (US Government clouds)
Details: Out-of-the-box reports that contain information about all legal holds associated with eDiscovery cases in the Microsoft 365 compliance center. Sort and filter your view based on various criteria and download the aggregated information for further analysis.

Description: Office app: Add apps and use them inside Office.com and Office app for Windows
Details: Apps built for Teams can run in Office.com and Office app for Windows. Users will be able to acquire and use these updated Teams apps (with personal tabs) without leaving Office.com and Office app for Windows.

Description: Microsoft Graph: Teams Device management Graph APIs (Preview)
Details: These APIs provide access to information about the Teams devices and options to manage them and enable easy integration with other workflows.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Information Protection: New Credential SITs
Details: The addition of new Credential Sensitive Information Types (SITs) will allow your company to detect individual credential patterns (access keys, tokens, general passwords, etc.). Additionally, we will be offering a SIT which bundles all individual credential types for more holistic detection.

Description: PowerPoint: Organization Fonts in PowerPoint for Mac and mobile
Details: This feature will allow organizations to add their custom fonts into PowerPoint.

Description: Azure Active Directory: CloudKnox Permissions Management enters Public Preview
Details: CloudKnox Permissions Management is a cloud infrastructure entitlement management (CIEM) solution that provides comprehensive visibility into permissions assigned to all identities like over-privileged workload and user identities, actions, and resources across multi-cloud infrastructures in Microsoft Azure, Amazon Web Services (AWS), and Google Cloud Platform (GCP).  CloudKnox Permissions Management detects, automatically right-sizes, and continuously monitors unused and excessive permissions.

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Data loss prevention (DLP) support for trainable classifiers
Details: Trainable classifiers can be added as a condition for data loss prevention (DLP) policies, and enhanced templates and default policies will leverage trainable classifiers. Additionally, classifier-related information and alerts will appear within Activity explorer.

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Data purge capabilities for Microsoft Teams content (US Government clouds)
Details: Extend data purge functionality to Microsoft Teams content to facilitate purge of sensitive or misplaced data.

Description: Access: Inconsistent Database Error Fix
Details: This feature encapsulates several components of helping to solve a challenging, ongoing issue of inconsistent database states reported by our customers.

Description: Microsoft Edge: PDF support for JavaScript and XML Forms Architecture (XFA) based forms
Details: Support for JavaScript and XML Forms Architecture (XFA) based forms added for PDFs viewed in Microsoft Edge.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Background Blur for VDI on Azure Virtual Desktop/Windows 365
Details: Users on Teams on VDI on Azure Virtual Desktop/Windows 365 can blur their background in your video meeting and call.

Description: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Quarantine support for shared mailboxes
Details: Users who have been granted delegate access to shared mailbox either through direct access or security group access will be able to triage the quarantine folder items of those mailboxes. This makes managing the quarantine for shared mailboxes easier for users.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Activity explorer user experience improvements (US Government clouds)
Details: We're improving the user experience of the Activity explorer in the Microsoft 365 compliance center. New functionality includes a refresh button to allow refreshing the data without reloading the page, and a new option for "Sensitive info type" added to the list of customizable columns.

Description: Microsoft Information Protection: Configure Teams DLP policies to automatically protect files shared in Teams messages (US Government clouds)
Details: New and existing Teams DLP policies can be configured to automatically protect files shared in Teams private chats and channel messages.

Description: Microsoft Information Protection: Auto-labeling policies support overwriting manual label and encrypting mail received from any organization (US Government clouds)
Details: New and existing Exchange auto-labeling policies can be configured to apply encryption to email received from outside the organization. In addition, policies can be configured to enforce classification on any email by replacing existing manual labels that have the same or lower label priority.
Tags - Product: Microsoft Information Protection, Microsoft Compliance center

Description: Microsoft 365 Admin center: Office cloud policy service for Government cloud
Details: The Office cloud policy service lets you enforce policy settings for Microsoft 365 Apps for enterprise on a user's device, even if the device isn't domain joined or otherwise managed.

Description: Microsoft 365 admin center: Software updates page (Windows)
Details: The Windows tab in the Software Updates page will provide admins with a high-level update status for all devices in the organization.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Detect Music Automatically
Details: The previously released ML-based noise suppression is now enabled by default for most of our customers. ML-based noise suppression considers any non-speech signal picked up by the microphone as noise which should be suppressed.  To avoid suppressing music and to allow users to enable the new high-fidelity music mode, we have built an ML-based music detector which will inform the user whenever music is present through a notification. This will give the end user the choice whether music is indeed an unwanted background noise, such as when calling into a meeting from a coffee shop, or if music is a desired signal, such as when participating in a music lesson.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Teams: Roaming bandwidth control for GCC-High and DoD
Details: Admins will now be able to set a bandwidth control policy to disable video calls when users are working in bandwidth constrained areas – this protects the reliability of the connection, automatically just based on where the users are located.  Once users return to a location with better bandwidth, their video calling is restored. Initially two settings from the Teams Meeting Policy will be included - AllowIPVideo, and MediaBitRateKb.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Approvals PCF controls for Power Apps
Details: Developers are able to plug in Approvals PCF controls when creating a new Power App.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Dynamic Caller ID for Voice enabled channels, now available for Government clouds
Details: Last year we enabled the capability where agents can use Dynamic Caller ID to call on behalf of a Call Queue from within Voice Enabled Channels.  We are now bringing this capability to Government clouds including GCCH and DOD.

Description: PowerPoint: Organization Fonts in PowerPoint for Windows
Details: This feature will allow organizations to add their custom fonts into PowerPoint.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Teams device store in Teams admin center
Details: Teams device store provides direct procurement through Teams admin center, where admins can discover, purchase and provision Teams certified devices. The functionality will be available to small and medium sized organizations in US and Canada. This will be extended to more customers in the future.

Description: Microsoft Edge: Enhance your security on the web improvements
Details: We will add more control when browsing the web and visiting unfamiliar sites. With this update, we bring more information and more control to enhance your security through the site flyout.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Disable or Enable all Attendees' Video for DoD
Details: Ability in DoD to disable and enable videos for all attendees before or during a Microsoft Teams meeting.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Disable or Enable a Single Attendee's Video for DoD
Details: Ability to disable and enable a single attendee's video in a Microsoft Teams meeting.

Description: Microsoft Project: Guest users in Project for the web
Details: Add guest users to your projects to allow them to view project information.

Description: Outlook: Support Cross Profile Calendar Data Sync
Details: If you are an Android Work Profile user, this one's for you! Through Connected Apps, you will be able to show your personal calendar events on your work profile calendar. Say goodbye to juggling your work and personal calendars in two separate apps and hello to easier scheduling management.

Description: Microsoft Teams: New default settings when opening Office files For Government clouds
Details: Users can set a default of browser, desktop or Teams when opening Office files (Word, Excel, and Power Point) that are shared in Teams.  The desktop setting can be selected, if the user has Office version 16 or newer installed and activated.

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Activity explorer user experience improvements
Details: We're improving the user experience of the Activity explorer in the Microsoft 365 compliance center. New functionality includes a refresh button to allow refreshing the data without reloading the page, and a new option for "Sensitive info type" added to the list of customizable columns.

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Endpoint DLP – Advanced classification scanning and protection
Details: Advanced classification scanning and protection allows the Microsoft 365 cloud-based data classification service to scan items, classify them, and return the results to the endpoint device. This enables admins to include more advanced classification techniques, such as exact data match and named entities, into data loss prevention policies. Admins will also have the flexibility to set a per-device bandwidth limit for a 24-hour period to regulate bandwidth usage.

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Default classification for content matching trainable classifiers
Details: Admins can view items that match trainable classifiers in Content explorer without first needing to create a policy.

Description: SharePoint Syntex: Use taxonomy term set or term as input source in placeholders for modern templates
Details: You can associate pre-defined term sets or terms as an input source to the placeholders you create in modern templates. When users fill the placeholder for creating a document from the template, you can only choose values from the configured term set for that placeholder.

Description: Microsoft Stream: Improve audio quality with Noise suppression for Stream (on SharePoint)
Details: Noise suppression helps both creators and viewers isolate speech from ambient noise, music, and other sounds, making voice more intelligible. Noise suppression significantly reduces ambient noise, bringing more clarity to speech in videos.

Description: SharePoint: Site owners manage app requests in SharePoint Store
Details: Site owners can manage requests for store apps in a streamlined process and track the status in a modern view of My requests page under SharePoint Apps.

Description: SharePoint Syntex: Refinement rules for document understanding extractor models
Details: New refinement option to edit model extracted values before saving to the library column.

Description: Yammer: Bookmarks in Yammer
Details: Bookmark threads in Yammer to easily find and read them later.

Description: Microsoft Viva: Top news card on Viva Connections Dashboard
Details: Set up Top news card in Viva Connections Dashboard to surface boosted news from SharePoint. News that has been boosted will prominently display in the Top news card.
Tags - Platform: Android, iOS, Web, Desktop, Teams and Surface Devices

Description: Microsoft Viva: Enroll in Focus plan from the Microsoft Viva Insights app in Teams
Details: Viva Insights is introducing updates to better enable users to protect time for focus from the Viva Insights Teams app. These updates to the protect time page will allow users to enroll in a focus plan and adjust preferences to auto book focus time on one's calendar from within the Insights app in Teams. Users enrolled in a focus plan will also see insights about their progress towards their focus time goals.

Description: Microsoft Viva: Briefing email support for 16 additional languages
Details: The daily Briefing email from Microsoft Viva helps users start their day on track by surfacing information to prepare for upcoming meetings, follow up on outstanding tasks, and protect time for independent work. With this update, the Briefing email will be available in the following additional languages: Dutch, Swedish, Danish, Finnish, Russian, Norwegian (Bokmal), Korean, Chinese Traditional, Polish, Turkish, Portuguese (Portugal), Thai, Hebrew, Czech, Arabic, and Hungarian.

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Microsoft 365 data loss prevention on-premises scanner (US Government clouds)
Details: Microsoft 365 DLP on-premises scanner relies on a full implementation of the Azure Information Protection (AIP) scanner to monitor, label, and protect sensitive items. It crawls on-premises data-at-rest in file shares and SharePoint document libraries and folders for sensitive items that, if leaked, would pose a risk to your organization, or pose a risk of compliance policy violation. This gives you the visibility and control you need to ensure that sensitive items are used and protected properly, and to help prevent risky behavior that might compromise them. The information about what the users are doing with sensitive items is made visible in Activity explorer and you can enforce protective actions on those items via DLP policies.
Tags - Product: Microsoft Information Protection, Azure Information Protection, Microsoft Compliance center

Description: SharePoint: Updates to channel site layouts and parent team site settings
Details: Every team in Microsoft Teams is connected to a team site in SharePoint. This is also true for private channels in Teams. Private channels are connected to their own unique team site. This update includes improvements to the private channel site home page layout and the way site settings apply to the parent site and associated channel sites.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Out-of-the-box assessments for non-Microsoft 365 assets (US Government clouds)
Details: Introducing pre-configured templates that extend Compliance Manager capabilities beyond Microsoft 365 assets.

Description: Yammer: Dark mode in Yammer
Details: Dark mode can be enabled to view lighter text on a dark background.

Description: Microsoft Information Protection: Auditing and Analytics in Outlook for iOS, Android, and Mac (GCC, GCC-H)
Details: Outlook for iOS, Android, and Mac will send user label activity data to the Audit Log and Activity Explorer for admins to search and review.
Tags - Product: Microsoft Information Protection, Microsoft Compliance center

Description: OneDrive: Large folder delete in OneDrive and SharePoint Document Libraries on web
Details: Users will be able to delete large folders (10k items) on OneDrive and SharePoint Document Libraries on web.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Viva: Viva Connections Multilingual Dashboard
Details: You can create a Viva Connections Dashboard that can be viewed in multiple languages.
Tags - Platform: Android, iOS, Web, Desktop, Teams and Surface Devices

Description: Yammer: Communities app in Teams - notification for when you've been added to a community
Details: You will receive a notification in Microsoft Teams when someone adds you to a Yammer community.

Description: Microsoft Teams: LinkedIn Integration in Teams
Details: Users will be able to see LinkedIn profiles of their colleagues in 1:1 chat. The LinkedIn profile is available via the LinkedIn tab in the 1:1 chat panel.

Description: Microsoft Teams: End-to-end encryption for one-to-one Teams calls for GCCH and DoD
Details: End-to-end encryption is the encryption of information at its origin and decryption at its intended destination without the ability for intermediate nodes to decrypt. End-to-end encryption would be an optional mode of real-time media collaboration where one-to-one Teams calls between two parties would be end-to-end encrypted.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Chat filter for non-meeting chats
Details: There will be a new chat filter within the Chat app which filters out meeting chats and chats with bots. It filters in one on one and group chats.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Teams: Career Coach - Student activity insights
Details: Faculty and staff license holders will now be able to view insights for aggregated student activity insights in Career Coach. Insights include student skills, career interests, and progress on career-related activities in Career Coach.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Pinned apps for frontline workers
Details: We are providing a tailored experience for frontline workers in Teams! With this feature users with an F license will get frontline worker apps such as Tasks, Shifts, Walkie Talkie and Approvals pinned out of the box. Organizations can further configure the apps pinned, but this feature provides a foundation for a Teams environment purpose-built for frontline workers.

Description: Outlook: Room Finder during meeting bookings for Android
Details: Need to book a space? Outlook Mobile is here to make your transition to hybrid work easier. Search and book conference rooms when you need to collaborate with colleagues or book a workspace when you need some focus time.

Description: Outlook: Room Finder during Meeting Bookings for iOS
Details: Need to book a space? Outlook Mobile is here to make your transition to hybrid work easier. Search and book conference rooms when you need to collaborate with colleagues or book a workspace when you need some focus time.

Description: Microsoft Edge: Preview PDF files in Outlook and File Explorer
Details: Users will be able to view a PDF file in a lightweight, rich,?read-only?preview.  Available for Outlook Desktop PDF attachments or for local PDF files using File Explorer.

Description: Microsoft Edge: Improvements to the Enterprise Site List Manager
Details: Support added to configure session cookies between Microsoft Edge and Internet Explorer for IE Mode in the Enterprise Site List Manager.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Walkie Talkie on iOS in GCC
Details: Walkie Talkie, a push-to-talk experience that enables clear and secure voice communication over the cloud, enables teams to communicate instantly and always stay on the same page. This native built-in app in Teams turns employee or company-owned iOS smartphones and tablets into a walkie-talkie, reducing the number of devices employees must carry and lowering costs for IT.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Teams webinar capabilities in GCC
Details: Schedule and deliver 1,000 person webinars with the same Teams app you use for meetings! Webinar capabilities support registration page creation, email confirmation for registrants, host management for attendee video and audio, attendee reporting, plus interactive features like polls, chat, and reactions.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Message extension entry point for Workflows in Teams
Details: Chat/Channel/Teams based workflows are a powerful tool for collaboration and efficiency. With message extension based entry point, users can view/search for applicable workflows as well as trigger pre-configured workflows from the message extension menu.

Description: Microsoft Edge: Bidirectional Cookie Sharing for IE mode
Details: This feature expands on the cookie sharing capability already available and allows users to sync specific session cookies from Internet Explorer/IE mode to Microsoft Edge.

Description: Microsoft Edge: Ability to set default profile
Details: The EdgeDefaultProfileEnabled policy will allow you to set a default profile to be used when opening the browser rather than the last profile used. This policy will not be applicable if the "--profile-directory" parameter has been specified.

Description: Excel: Argument Assistance
Details: Argument assistance is a card that shows up when the user is writing a formula and accompanies the user during the arguments insert/edit. The Argument Assistance helps the user to be more efficient while writing formulas and reduces risk for errors, without needing to look for help in external resources. It includes descriptions of the formula and the different arguments, as well as an example. The relevant argument (according to caret’s position) will be highlighted for better orientation. The user can collapse the card and see only the top formula signature (like the tooltip today) in case he/she prefers not to hide much of the grid (we’ll save that preference).

Description: Excel: Multiline Formula Bar
Details: Users can resize the formula bar and easily navigate.

Description: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Streamlining the submissions experience in Microsoft Defender for Office 365
Details: We are updating the submissions experience to allow you to submit emails, URLs, and email attachments from one easy to use location.

Description: Office app: Account Switching in Office mobile app
Details: With Account switching, users can switch from one account to another through the Profile icon and have a single account view throughout the app.

Description: Microsoft Stream: Report a playback issue to Microsoft
Details: This feature enables users with permissions to Microsoft Feedback to report technical issues to Microsoft on a video they're playing and allows all users to access public help documentation about the video player from the same entry point.

Description: Forms: Portal Page Experience Improvement
Details: Microsoft Forms will not only surface it portal page on office hub, but we will also reroute partial traffic to forms.office.com and forms.microsoft.com. Then user will be able to find Collection on the portal page with some other minor improvements.

Description: Forms: Enable templates for commercial users
Details: Microsoft Forms will not only surface it portal page on office hub, but we will also reroute partial traffic to forms.office.com and forms.microsoft.com. Then user will be able to find Collection on the portal page with some other minor improvements. All Forms users could easily find and explore high quality 1st party templates on portal page through different business categories like build better events, grow product success, improve employee satisfaction, digitalize business process and create engaging learning environment (for EDU).

Description: Forms: Brand new first-run experiences for Forms new users
Details: For those new-to-forms users, we will help them understand through branded new first-touch experience about Forms capability, where they can use Forms and how. Users can navigate through the Forms templates categories through several selected business scenarios and pre-populated grab-and-go solutions.

Description: SharePoint: Enable Content types from modern library views
Details: If you have SharePoint site collection administrator access, you can enable management of content types directly in your library from modern SharePoint and Syntex libraries and lists.

Description: OneDrive: Sync Activity Center Visual Update
Details: The Activity Center has received a visual update to more align with the Fluent Design language. This visual update applies a modern look to the Activity Center.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Yammer: Enhancements to Yammer's interactive email notifications
Details: The enhancements would include user experience changes to help with information density of the content for ease of consumption and engagement within Yammer's the interactive emails as well as enable users to discover recommended conversations within these emails.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Updated Cortana iconography on front of room display and console in a Microsoft Teams Room
Details: Update to the Cortana iconography that appears on the front of room display and console UI in a Microsoft Teams Room.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Career Coach - edX learning content
Details: Career Coach will now feature edX content, an online course provider, within the learning experience.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Career Coach - Job market trends
Details: Faculty and staff license holders will now be able to view location-based job market trends from LinkedIn.

Description: Microsoft Project: Self-serve trials
Details: Users can explore all the capabilities of Project Plan 1 or Project Plan 3 for free using the self-service trial experience to sign up for a trial plan.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Education policy wizard - Multiple group support
Details: Admins can now add up-to three groups, instead of one previously, of educators and staff for applying the specialized custom set of policies.

Description: Outlook: Multiple Time Zones
Details: Users can add multiple time zones to their calendar in Outlook on the web so they can see how their events stack across those time zones.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Outlook: Custom Calendar Colors
Details: In Outlook on the web, users can select custom colors for their calendar events using hexadecimal values, RBG values, or a color picker control.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Edge v.98: Enhance your security on the web
Details: A browsing mode in Microsoft Edge where the security of your browser takes priority, giving you an extra layer of protection when browsing the web. Administrators can apply group policies to end-user desktops (Windows, macOS, and Linux) to help protect against zero days. This feature is a step forward because it lets us mitigate unforeseen active zero days.

Description: Microsoft Edge v.99: Personalize multi-profile experiences with profile preferences for sites
Details: Users can personalize their multi-profile experience with the ability to create a customized list of sites for automatic profile switching in Microsoft Edge.

Description: Microsoft 365 admin center: Creating more granular email notifications for Service issues
Details: Adding the ability to separate email notifications for the different types of service issues that show up on the Service Health dashboard. Currently admins can enroll in email notifications for incidents and advisories, we are adding additional granularity for admins to subscribe to Microsoft service issues and issues occurring within your organization that require admin action.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Teams: Message action entry point for Workflows in Teams
Details: Message based workflows are powerful for collaboration and efficiency. With message action based entry point, users can view/search for applicable workflows as well as trigger pre-configured workflows from the message action overflow menu.

Description: SharePoint: Section Templates for SharePoint Pages
Details: When you add a new section to a page, you can select a blank template with popular image and text combinations for a quick start.

Description: Visio: Enhanced context menus in Visio for the web
Details: Quickly access relevant shape formatting options with additional content and enhancements made to the floating context menu that appears after right clicking on an object in your diagram.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Germany, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: OneDrive: Sharing experience - Copy Link in command bar
Details: We are updating the copy link command to give customers the ability to change their link type and permissions prior to generating a new link and pasting it into the app of their choice.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Germany, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Teams: Mirror my video
Details: Mirror my video feature provides the user the option to un-mirror their video and thereby have the same view as the other users(s) in the meeting. By un-mirroring their video, the user will see the text correctly. No more flipped text in backgrounds or while holding a small whiteboard while teaching primary school kids. This feature is helpful in gallery, large gallery, ppt-content only sharing, and ppt-live scenarios.
Tags - Cloud instance: GCC High, DoD, GCC, Worldwide (Standard Multi-Tenant)

Description: Microsoft Teams: Front row layout for Teams Rooms on Windows
Details: Front row is a new layout for Microsoft Teams Rooms, designed to enhance hybrid meetings and provide in-room participants with greater context of what is happening across various aspects of the meeting. With front row, remote attendees are seen in the room at eye level and additional meeting experiences including chat, and a rostered view of participants with raised hands, are brought to the front of room screen. Users can select the front row layout from the layout chooser experience on the Teams Rooms console. It can also be set as the default layout or turned off altogether by device admins. Front row will be available for all Teams Rooms on Windows and across all display sizes.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Meet now support for Teams Rooms on Windows
Details: Teams Rooms on Windows are making an alignment for Meet now experience to Teams desktop replacing New meeting control on the Teams room console with Meet (aka Meet now). With Meet, users can start an ad-hoc meeting with a single tap and invite participants to it. This change is only applicable if the Teams rooms is running in Microsoft Teams only or Microsoft Teams (default) and Skype for Business modes. With this change, all P2P calling and group calling functionality is moved under calling application.

Description: Microsoft Teams; AAD conditional access support for Teams rooms on Windows
Details: Microsoft Teams rooms on Windows now support Azure Active directory conditional access support. Admins can configure Teams rooms device's access to Microsoft Teams and Microsoft Exchange online services based on device compliance status. In addition, to make it simpler for our customers, Azure Active Directory Premium 1 license is added to the Room System Standard and Room System Premium and variations of these SKUs for education, government customers. Detailed documentation on how to configure Teams rooms on Windows to use AAD conditional access feature will be published to give IT admins head start for configuring it.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Calling app update for Teams Rooms on Windows
Details: Teams Rooms on Windows are making an alignment for calling experience to Teams desktop replacing Dial pad control on the Teams room console with Call. Calling app provides users functionality to dial PSTN calls where available as well as enable entry point for P2P Teams calls, group Teams calls and P2P federated user calls. This change is only applicable if the Teams rooms is running in Microsoft Teams only or Microsoft Teams (default) and Skype for Business modes. With this change, all P2P calling and group calling functionality that was previously under New meeting button is moved under Call. For customers that use SIP URI calling through Skype for Business, Enter SIP URI entry point is available in Microsoft Teams (default) and Skype for Business mode.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Add a group of approvers to your approval request
Details: Users are able to select Office 365 groups as approvers when creating a new approval request within the Teams Approvals App.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Enable Cortana voice activation by default in out-of-box-experience of newly imaged Microsoft Teams Rooms
Details: Cortana voice activation will be enabled by default on newly imaged Microsoft Teams Rooms solutions. If desired, IT Admins can adjust the setting to turn off voice activation at that time.

Description: Microsoft Teams: Cortana support expansion to additional languages in Microsoft Teams Rooms
Details: Cortana will support additional languages on Teams devices that are set to different locale languages. The locale supported today are: en-us, en-ca, en-au, en-in, en-gb (US, Canada, Australia, India, Great Britain)

Description: SharePoint: New vertical site templates - Nonprofit, Retail and Healthcare
Details: New vertical site templates coming to SharePoint including nonprofit volunteer center, retail management, store collaboration and healthcare hospital collaboration.

Description: Microsoft Information Protection: AIP client and scanner data available in Audit and Activity explorer for Government customers
Details: Azure Information Protection (AIP) customers can now access data in Microsoft 365 compliance center Audit logs and Activity explorer, in addition to the AIP Analytics portal. This means that all data logged via AIP client and AIP scanner can be witnessed along with the rest of the Microsoft Information Protection (MIP) and Data Loss Prevention (DLP) data sets from native Office apps and other cloud resources.
Tags - Product: Microsoft Information Protection, Azure Information Protection

Description: Microsoft Search: Customize out of box verticals and add verticals for SharePoint content
Details: New support for custom verticals in Microsoft Search allows you to customize out of the box verticals for Microsoft Search and add new verticals based on SharePoint content.
